







BIBEL VURU.
Narogorogoana maga go
navasaana pota seara ni
navasasokiana tuai.
Old Testament Narratives and other
portions, in Scripture Words, in the
Tongoa-Nguna language, New Hebrides.
DUNEDIN, N.Z.:
Printed by the Otago Daily Times and Witness Newspapers Co., Ltd.

BIBEL YUBXJ.
NATAWAKIANA.
1 Ragi ni natalakeana Sup© e
dawanaki nakoroatelagi go mara-
2'mana. Go maramana e pinovinoi
go e palo; go namaligo e doko
narae ni epua: go naata ni Supe
e darakovakovagoro narae ni noai
3 maga. Go Supe e noa, Nama-
rama ega vaki lina: go e pakilina.
4 Go Supe e punusi namarama
naga e pia: go Supe e dapotae
namarama padua ki namaligo.
5 Go Supe e soso namarama ki
Aleati, go namaligo e soso e ki
pogi. Go ragi melu e doko go
. malipogi e doko, naaleatia a
naaleatia sikai.
6 Go Supe e noa Namalopa sikai
ega toko ihaleoputo ni noai maga,
go ega tapotae noai maga padua
7 ki noai maga. Go Supe e mari
namalopa po dapotae noai maga
waina eu doko etano ni namalopa
padua ki noai maga waina eu
doko elagi ni namalopa: go e
8 dapale nogoe. Go Supe e soso
namalopa ki nakoroatelagi. Go
ragi melu e doko go malipogi c
doko, naaleatia kerua.
9 Go Supe e noa, Noai maga ni
etano ni nakoroatelagi euga vei
tea saisaikiana paki tokora sikai-
maau, go tea garagara ega vaki
10 lina: go e dapale nogoe. Go
Supe e soso tea garagara ki- nava-
nua; go nasaisaikiana ni noai
niaga e soso e ki Natasi maga :
11 go Supe e punusi naga e pia. Go
Sup© e noa, Navanua ega sai ki
namenau, nataputea waina e
pitua ki napatina, go nakau ni
nawa 'waina e daui ki nawana
visarasara, waina napatina e doko
napalauna, elagi ni navanua: go
12 e dapale nogoe. Go navanua e
sai ki namenau, nataputea waina
e pitua ki napatina visarasara,
go nakau waina e daui ki
nawana, waina napatina e doko
napalauna, e pisarasara; go Supe
13 e punusi naga e pia. Go ragi
melu e doko go malipogi e doko,
naaleatia ketolu.
14 Go Supe e noa, Nasulu maga
euga toko namalopa ni nakoro-
atelagi naga euga tapotae aleati
padua. ki pogi; go euga vei
navaivaiana maga go ragi maga,
go naaleatia maga, go natau
15 maga: go euga vei nasulu maga
namalopa ni nakoroatelagi naga
euga marama lagati maramana:
16 go e dapala nogoe. Go Supe e
mari nasulu lapa dua; nasulu
waina e lapalapa liu naga ega
maraki aleati, go’ nasulu waina
e parua rua naga ega maraki
pogi: go e mari niasoe maga.
17 Go Supe e lawo ki-da namalopa
ni nakoroatelagi naga euga
18 marama lagati maramana, go
naga euga maramara dapau aleati
go pogi, go naga euga tapotae
namarama padua ki namaligo:
go Supe e punusi naga e pia.
19 Go ragi melu go malipogi e doko,
naaleatia kevati.
20 ' Go Supe e ’ noa, Noai maga
euga vura ki navata ni nalo vari-
vaxi maga waina eu mauri, go
manu maga euga riri elagi ni
maramana narae ni namalopa ni
21 nakoroatelagi. Go Supe e
dawanaki nalo lalapa maga ni
: natasi go sara nalo mauri visara-
sara waina eu cakaraka waina


noai maga eu dape ra eu laapa,
go sara manu visarasara waina eu
22 pilake ualivaruda: go Supe e
punusi naga e pia. Go Supe e
pasa mataki da po naga, Kuga
vavaka wora, po laapa, po mari
noai maga ni natasi euga vura,
go manu euga laapa navanua.
23 Go ragi melu e doko go malipogi
e doko, naaleatia kelima.
24 Go Supe e noa, Navanua ega
tape nalo mauri visarasara maga,
katel maga, go tea kakaraka
maga, go nalo mila visarasara
maga ni navaua: go e dapale
25 nogoe. Go Sup© e mari nalo mila
visarasara maga ni navanua, go
katel visarasara maga, go sara
nalo visarasara waina eu cakaraka
natano: go Supe e punusi naga e
26 pia. Go Supe e noa, Tuga mari
naatamoli euga vei nunugida
euga takiusi gida: go euga mara-
mara dapau naika maga ni natasi,
go manu maga ni namalopa go
katel maga, go navanua namau,
go dapau sara nalo kakaraka
27 waina eu cakaraka navanua. . Go
Supe e dawanaki naatamoli e pei
nununa, © dawanaki nia e pei
nunu ni Supe; e dawana ki-da
28 ero pei naaonai go nagoroi. Go
Supe e pasa fnata ki-da: go Supe
e noa kida, e naga, Koroga
vavaka wora, po laapa, po mari
navanua ega vura, po mari
matua ki nia; go Koroga mara-
mara dapau naika maga ni natasi,
go manu maga ni namalopa, go
sara nalo mauri waina eu caka-
29 raka navanua. Go Supe e noa,
Kuga leo, a dua mu sara nata-
putea waina e pitua ki napatina,
waina e doko narae ni navanua
mamau, go sara nakau waina
nawa ni nakau e doko asa waina
© pitua ki napatina; ega vei navi-
30 naga animu: go sara nalo tua
vati ni navanua, go sara manu
ni namalopa, go sara nalo waina
©u cakaraka navanua, waina
naatana mauri e doko ara, a dua
ra sara natapulea malakesa ega
vei navinaga adeara: go e dapale
31 nogoe. Go Supe © punusi sara
naleo waina, e sua ra, go,
kuga leo, eu pia lua. Go ragi
melu e doko go malipogi e doko
naaleatia kelasesa.
1 Go nakoroatelagi go maramana
ero pei tea marisuaana, go tagona
2 laapa kakada. Go naaleatia
• kelaru Supe e mari sua nawosiana
aneana waina e mari a; go e
maromaro naaleatia kelarua ki
nawosiana laapa aneana waina e
3 mari a. Go Supe e pasa mataki
naaleatia kelarua, po dapugoro
e: nalakena e maromaro asa ki
nawosiana laapa aneana waina e
dawanaki da po mari ra.
4 Tea maga waia eu pei nava-
kilinaana maga ni nakoroatelagi
go maramana ragi waina ero pei
tea tawanakiana, naaleatia waina
Yehova Supe e mari maramana
sgo nakoroatelagi. Go te nakau
seara ni namalasi e ko da doko
navanua mau, go te nataputea
seara ni namalasi e ko da pisou
mau; nalakena Yehova Supe e
ko da mari usa e powo navanua
mau, go naatamoli sikai waina
ega kili natano e ko da doko mau ;
6 ma namavu sikai e sake melu dua
ki maramana pano, po pue narae
7ni natano mamau. Go Yehova
Supe e mari-dawanaki naihota-
inota seara ni natano e pei naata-
nioli, po maro dua naagisuna
namerona ni namauriana; go
naatamoli © po pei naatana
mauri.
8 Go Yehova Supe e lawo roara
sikai Eden mateli ni ist kakana;
go tokora wanogoe e doropus’
naatamoli asa waina e mari a.
9 Go Yehova Supe © mari sara


nakau waina e pei tea loihata-
kiana go waina eu pia ki navi-
naga eu ulua pae natano; nakau
ni namauriana ma ihaleoputo
ni roara, go nakau naataeana
ni uawiaana go ui nasaana.
15 Go Yehova Sups e piragi
naatamoli po doropusi a roara ni
Eden naga ega wosiwosi asa po
16 pavaigoro e. Go Yehova Supe e
dipaki naatamoli po naga, Sara
17 nakau ni roara pa to gani a: ma
nakau ni naataeana ni nawiaana
go ni nasaana, pa ta gani a mau :
nalakena naaleatia waina ko pe
kani a pa wo mate lomau.
18 Go Yehova Supe e noa, Eda
pia mau naga naatamoli ega
masikinia doko : aga wo maneana
19 mari tea silae sikai. Go Yehova
Supe e mari dawanaki natano
seara kakana e pei sara, nalo tua
vati ni namalasi, go sara manu
’. ni namalopa ; go e piragi ra umai
punusi naatamoli, naga ega
vunusi tea waina nae ega soso ra
asa: go tea waina naatamoli e
soso sara nalo mauri asa, tea
20 wanogoe e pei nagisana. Go
naatamoli e salagisa ni sara katel,
go ni sara manu ni namalopa, go
ni sara nalo mila ni namalasi;
ma tea silae agi naatamoli waina
e patakana e da doko mau.
21 Go Yehova Supe e mari nama
turuana lapa sikai e dowo naata-
moli ; go e maturu; go e dape
vidina sikai kakada, po mari
ponoti napokasina c doko oli a;
22 go vidina waina Yehova Supe e
dape a hielu naatamoli e davagi
a e pei nagoroi sikai, po piragi
23 a umai punusi naatamoli. Go
naatamoli c noa, Sala waia tea
waia e pei navatu ni navatugu
maga, go napokasi ni napo-
kasigu: ega vei tea sosoana ki
Nagoroi, nalakena e pei tea
24 tapeana hielu Naanoai. Nala-
kena tea wanogoe naauoai ega
toropusi tamana go pilana, go ega
vuluti anagoroi: go eroga wo pei
napokasi sikaiman. Go ero dua
malafnala, naatamoli go anogoroi,
go era da malieri mau.
NAROWOANA KI NAATAMOLI.
1 Go maata e mari manumatua
liu sara nalo mila ni namalasi
waina Yehova Supe e mari ra.
Go e noa ki nagoroi, e naga, Supe
e noa naga, Koroga ta gani sara
nakau ni roara, kita ?
2 Go nagoroi e noa ki mata, e
naga, Nawa ni nakau maga ni
3 roara aroga kani a: ma nawa ni
nakau waina e doko ihaleoputo
ni roara, Supe e noa, Koroga ta
gani a mau, go koroga ta kisidogo
e mau, koro pe mate.
4 Go fhaata e noa ki nagoroi, e
naga, Koroga wo da mate lomau
5 mau: nalakena Supe e atae naga
naaleatia waina koro pe kani a,
namatamu eu pe wo pei tea wola-
gatiana, go koroga wo dakiusi
Supe, koroga wo- atae nawiaana
go nasaana.
6 Go ragi waina nagoroi e punusi
naga nakau wanogoe e pia ki
navinaga, go naga e pei tea
lomatakiana, go naga e pei nakau
masauana raki namanumatuaana,
e dape nawana seara, po gani-
kani; go e moro dua ananoai e
. sikoti a, go nae e ganikani. Go
namata ni tea rua eu pei tea
wolagatiana, go ero po atae naga
ero inalamala; go ero turi saisai
ki uaulu ni napuliva, po dumada
madeara mari namasere maga
asa.
8 Go ero dogo nadaleo ,ni Yehova
Supe e surata roara nasau ni
naaleatia: go naatamoli nja ana-
. goroi, ero curukuru padua ki


narae ni Yehova Sup© maleoputo
ni nakau maga ni roara.
9 Go Yehova Supe © pioso paki
naatamoli, po noa ki nia, e naga,
Nigo wai ?
10 Go e naga, A dogo nadaleoma
roara, go a mataku, nalakena a
11 inalafnala ;go a curukuru. Go e
naga, Sei e noakisai ko naga ko
malaihala? Nigo ko po gani
nakau waina a dipagoro ko asa,
naga pa ta gani a mau, kita ?
12 Go naatamoli e noa, Nagoroi
waina ko pitua ki nia naga ega
sikoti au doko, nae e dua au
nakau wanogoe, go a ganikani.
13 Go Yehova Sup© e noa ki
nagoroi, e naga, Nasava waia
waina ko po mari a ? Go nagoroi
e noa, e surue au, go a
ganikani.
14 Go Yehova Supe e noa ki
maata, e naga, Nalakena ko po
mari tea waia, ko pei tea vasasa-
kiana lapalapa liu sara katel, go
sara nalo mila ni namalasi; pa
wo solesol© ki napeleiha, go pa wo
gani namotamota sara naaleatia
15 ni namauriana anigo; go aga wo
lawo ki navivilosiana namawota
kakamu ma nagoroi go namawota
ni naworaiha go ni naworana:
na© ega wo pa porusi napauma,
go nigo pa wo cati porusi namago
ni -natuana.
16 E noa ki nagoroi, © naga, aga
wo mari narogokitesaana anigo
go nadienaana anigo eroga wo
laapa; pa wo dap© pipia maga
pilake narogokitesaana ; go nama-
sauana anigo ega wo paki ama-
wota,. go nae ega wo maramara
dapau ko.
17 Go e noa ki Adam, © naga,
nalakena ko po dogo parati ki
nadalecj ni amagoroi, po. gani
nakau waina a dipagoro ko asa,
po noa, pa ta gani a mau;
natano © pei tea vasasakiana
nalakena nigo; pa wo posiwosi
asa raki nakaniana sara naaleatia
18 ni namauriana anigo; go ega wo
manigo dap© tea vivitipa maga go
tea makalikali maga; go pa wo
19 gani nataputea ni namalasi; pa
wo gani navinaga pilake natoro-
toroana ni naraema pa pa pa wo
liliu paki natano, waina ko pei
tea tapeana melu asa umai; nala-
kena ko pei namotamota, go pa
wo' liliu paki namotamota.
20 Go naatamoli e • soso nagisa ni
nagoroi ki Eva; nalakena e pei
pila ni tea mauri mamau puti.
21 Go Yehova Sup© © magi Adam
ma anagoroi mari sugoro maga
ni nawili, po sugoro ra asa.
22 Go Yehova Supe e noa, Kuga
leo, naatamoli © po dakiusi gida
sikai, e atae nawiaana go
nasaana; go ragi waia, e pe sai
ki nahielearuna po moro dape
nakau ni namauriana, po gani-
kani, po mauri pa pa ega tu du
23 po du mau du: go Yehova Supe
e dipaki lua © meludua ki roara
ni Eden, naga ega kili natano
waina © pei tea tapeana melu
24 asa umai. Go © capasi naata-
moli paki edaku; go e mari
Kerub maga eu doko matele ni
ist ni roara ni' Eden, go lova
sikai ni mena ni nakapu, waina
e do duihana doa e naga ega
vavaigoro napua ni nakau ni
namauriana.
NAMARIPUNUEANA NI
ABEL.
1 Go (Eva © magi Adam dap©
natuna naanoai po soso nagi-
sana Kain) e noa, A po dalua
naatamoli naanoai sikai, Yehova
2 © silae au asa. Go e moro dap©
taina Abel. Go Abel © pei tea
lo parati ki shiip ma Kain e pei
tea wosiwosi natano.


3 Go e doko edaku ni ragi seara
naga Kain e dape ' nawa ni
natano seara umai © pei navi-
4 tuaana paki Yehova. Go Abel
nae ma e dap© takalapa seara ni
navata aneana, go tea manopu-
nopu kakada. Go Yehova e 1010
(pia) paki Abel go navituaana
5 aneana, ma © da 1010 (pia) paki
Kain go navituaana eneana mau.
Go Kain e maeto sa, go naraena
e datanako.
6 Go Yehova © noa ki Kain,
Ecasana ko maeto ? go ecasana
7 naraema © datanako ? E da
dapale nea, waina ko midoaki tea
wia, naga pa 1010 sake, kita?
Ma ko pe ta midoaki tea wia,
namarinalosaana e pavaegoro
namata; go namasauana aneana
e paki-go, go pa wo maramara
8 dapau sa. Go Kain © pasa ki
taina Abel asa. Go ragi waina
ero doko vanua, Kain e duleana
dipa taina Abel, po mari punu©
a.

naga, Taifha Abel wai? Go ©

11 paki nau. Go ragi waia nigo

natano, waina © po polagati
nagolena naga ega tap© nada ni
12 taima pa© naih©learuma. Ragi
waina pa wo kili natano ega wo
da moro pitua ki nakasuaana

naga,' Navarati-au-ana e lapa-

eu p© wo mari punu© Kain euga
wo pei tea sikoana paka laxua.

navaivaiana sikai, naga te naata
e pe vasal a ega ta pokati a mau.
Go Kain e melu dua ki nara©
ni Yehova pana, po doko
navanua ni Nod, m a tele .ni ist
ni Eden. (Go Kain © pesi
Enok.) Go e da vagi natokoana
sikai, po soso nagisa ni natokoana
wanogoe, pa© nagisa ni natuna,
Enok. Go Irad © magi Enok
paki ■ lina: go Irad © pesi
Mehuyael, ; go Mehuyael e pesi
Methusael; go Methusael © pesi
Lamek.
Go Lamek e piragi nagoroi
dua: nagisa ni tea sikai Ada,
go nagisa ni kerua Zilla. Go
Ada e dape Yabal; na© e pei
tama ni tea maga waina eu doko
tapaupau maga, po peani katel.
Go nagisa ni taina e pei Yubal:
nae e pei tama ni tea maga
waina eu puati harp go nau.
Go Zilla nae ma e dape Tubal-
kain, tea mari sara naleo totova
ni bras go ni airou.

naanoai sikai, po soso nagisana
ki Seth. Nalakena (© noa) Sup©

NATAPE.
1 Go e doko, ragi waina naata-
moli eu dalake nalaapaana narae
ni natano, go natuda nagoroi
2 maga -eu madeara paki lina,
uaga Supe natuna naanoai maga
«u punusi naatamoli natuda
nagoroi maga naga eu pei rae
wia; go eu piragi nagoroi maga
kaka ni tea laapa waina eu
matadoa ra.
3 Go Yehova e noa, Naatagu ega
wo da pilulu ki naatamoli pa pa
ega vatoko mau, nalakena nae
ma o pei napokasi: ma naaleatia
aneana maga euga wo pei natau
ponotia sikai rualima takuna
5 dua. Go Yehova e punusi naga
nasigisigileona ki naatamoli e
lapalapa maramana, go naga sara
naleo ni namidodoaana ni na-
popona eu sa mau sa sara
6 naaleatia. Go Yehova e midoaki
piri naga e mari naatamoli doko
maramana, go napopona e dogo-
7 ki-te esa asa. Go Yehova e noa,
Aga wo casi lua naatamoli maga
waina a dawanaki da meludua
ki narae ni natano; naatamoli
maga, go nalo tua vati maga,
go tea kakaraka maga, go manu
maga ni namalopa; nalakena a
midoaki piri naga a mari ra.
8 Ma Noa e sua nasaupiaana
namata ni Yehova.
9 Tea maga waia eu pei navakili-
naana maga ni Noa. Noa e pei
naatamoli leana, tea wia lua
tagona aneana maga: Noa e
10 surata sikoti Supe. Go Noa e
pesi natuna naanoai dolu, Sem,
Ham, go Yafet.
11 Go maramana e mesu narae ni
Supe, go maramana e pura, ki
12 namaripavakotoana. Go Supe e
punusi maramana, go kuga leo,
e mesu; nalakena sara napokasi
eu mari sa ki napua adeara mara-
mana.
13 Go Supe © noa ki Noa, e naga,
Nanopuana ni sara napokasi e po
umai naraegu; nalakena mara
mana o pura ki namaripava-
kotoana nalakena nara; go, pa
leo, aga wo mari sa kida, nara
14 ma maramana. pa manigo mari
ark sikai ni nakau cofer; pa
mari emago maga ark, go pa
vuluti a ekopu go natakuna ki
15 napulu. Go pa mari a ega tapale
waia; navarauana ni ark ega vei
kubit ponotia dolu (550 feet),
naweleweleana kakana ega vei
kubit rualima lima (92 feet), go
navakilagiana kakana kubit
16 ruali dolu (55 feet), pa mari
namarama sikai ark, go pa mari
a ega sake paki lagi kubit sikai ;
go pa doro namata ni ark ega
toko namagona; pa mari a ega
vei tagona ni elano, go kerua,
go ketolu.
17 Go kinau, pa leo, kinau aga
viragi natape ni noai maga umai
paki maramana, naga ega mari
punuvunue sara napokasi. waina
namero ni namauriana e doko
asa, melu dua ki etano ni nakoro-
atelagi; sara naleo waina eu
18 doko navanua ega mate. Ma aga
mari navasasokiana aginau ega
toko ako; go pa wo umai paki
ekopu ni ark, nimu ma natuiha
naanoai maga, go amagoroi, go
sulirha maga, kuga mamau puti.
19 Go pa viragi ruarua ni sara
naleo mauri ni sara napokasi
paki ekopu ni ark, naga pa
mauti ra euga mauri sikoti ko;
euga vei tea anoai go tea goroi.
20 Manu visarasara, go nalo tua
vati visarasara, sara nalo kaka-

raka visarasara ni natano tea
ruarua kakada euga umai punusi
ko, naga pa mauti ra euga mauri.
Go pa tape sara navinaga seara
waina e pei tea kaniana, go pa
saisai ki nia paki ekopu; go ega
wo pei navinaga anigo, go
22 adeara. Noa e mari dapale
nogoe ; e mari pataka ni sara
naleo waina Supe e dipaki nia
asa.
1 Go Yehova e noa ki Noa,_ e
naga, Nimu ma tea laapa ni
nasurna anigo kuga umai paki
ekopu ni ark; nalakena a punusi
ko ko leana naraegu tagona waia.
2 pa viragi tea ni sara nalo tua
vati waina eu dautau euga laru-
larua kakada, tea anoai go
anagoroi; go nalo tua vati waina
eu da dautau mau, euga ruarua,
3 naanoa go anagoroi; go manu ma
ni namalopa, tea larularua
kakada, tea anoai go tea goroi;
naga pa mauti tea vavaka wora
euga mauri narae ni maramana
4 mamau. Nalakena naaleatia
larua eu ko puoli, go kinau aga
wo mari usa ega wowo mara-
mana naaleatia rualima pati go
napogiana rualima pati; go sara
nalo mauri waina a mari ra aga
wo casi lua ra ihelu dua ki narae
5 ni natano. Go Noa e mari
pataka ni sara naleo waina
6 Yehova e dipaki nia asa. Go Noa
e pei tea ni natau ponotia latesa
ragi waina natape ni noai maga
eu doko maramana.
7 Go Noa e paki ekopu, nara
ma natuna naanoai maga, go
anagoroi, go sulina maga, eu
mamau puti paki ekopu ni ark,
nalakena noai maga ni natape.
8 Nalo tua vati maga waina eu
dautau, go nalo tua vati maga
waina eu da dautau mau, go
manu maga, go sara nalo waina
9 eu kakaraka natano, tea ruarua
kakada, eu paki ekopu ni ark
punusi Noa, tea anoai go tea
goroi, dakiusi waina Supe e
dipaki Noa asa.
10 Go e lolomana ragi waina
naaleatia larua eu nopu naga
noai maga ni natape eu doko
11 maramana. Natau ponotia kela-
tesa ni namauriana ki Noa,
atelagi kerua, naaleatia kerua-
lima tamate kelarua ni atelagi,
naaleatia wanogoe namata noai
maga ni epua lapa eu mamau
puti masai, go namata tugoro
noai maga ni nakorotelagi eu pei
12 tea savagiana. Go usa e powo
lapa maramana naaleatia rua-
lima pati go napogiana rualima
13 Naaleatia sikaimaau wanogoe
Noa go Sem, go Ham go Yafet,
Noa natuna naanoai maga, go
Noa anagoroi, go natuna naanoai
maga adagoroi dolu, eu mamau
14 puti paki ekopu ni ark; nara
ma sara nalo mila visarasara go
sara katel visarasara go sara nalo
cakaraka visarasara waina eu
cakaraka natano, go sara manu
visarasara, sara nalo riri, sara
naleo waina eu pilaki nalivaruda.
15 Go eu paki ekopu ni ark punusi
Noa, tea ruarua ni sara napo-
kasi waina namero ni namauriana
16 e doko ara. Go tea maga waina
eu paki ekopu eu paki ekopu
tea anoai go tea goroi ni sara
napokasi, dakiusi waina Supe e
dipaki nia asa: go Yehova e
cokoro e paki ekopu.
17 Go natape e doko maramana
naaleatia rualima pati; go noai
maga eu do sake, po salea ki ark,
go e pei tea tapeana sake elagi
18 ni navanua. Go noai maga eu
mari matua, po disu, po lapa-
lapa navanua; go ark e sale pano
19 narae ni noai maga. Go noai
maga eu po mari matua lapalapa


navanua; go sara tava lapa
mamau etano ni nikoroatelagi eu
■2O pei tea muagoroana. Noai maga
eu mari matua asa kubit rua
lima sikai tamate lima pakilagi;
go tava lapa maga eu pei tea
muagoroana.
"21 Go sara napokasi waina eu
parivari navanua eu mate, manu
maga, go katel maga, go nalo
mila maga, go sara nalo cakaraka
waina eu cakaraka navanua, go
’22 sara naa.tainoli; tea laapa waina
namero ni naatana ni namauri-
ana e doko nagisuda, ni tea laapa
waina eu doko navanua garagara,
■23 eu mate. Go sara nalo mauri
waina eu doko narae ni natano
eu pei tea kasiluaana, natamoli
maga go nalo tua vati go tea
cakaraka maga, go manu maga
ni nakoroatelagi; go eu pei tea
kasiluaana melu dua ki mara-
mana: go Noa e masikinia doko,
nara ma tea maga waina eu
'24 sikoti a doko ekopu ni ark. Go
noai maga eu mari matua mara-
mana naaleatia ponotia sikai
rualima takuna lima.
NOAI MAGA EU DO DOSA.
1 Go Supe e midoaki Noa, go
sara nalo mila, go katel laapa
waina eu sikoti a doko ekopu ni
ark; go Supe e mari nalagi ‘e
sau pae maramana, go noai maga
"2 eu dosa; go namata noai maga
ni epua go namata tugoro noai
maga ni nakoroatelagi eu pono,
go usa waina e pae nakoroatelagi
.3 umai e sina; go noai maga eu do
liliu melu dua- ki navanua pano:
go waina naaleatia ponotia sikai
rualima takuna lima eu nopu
noai maga eu po kiki.
-4 Go atelagi kelarua, naaleatia
kerualima sikai tamate kelarua
ni atelagi, ark e gona tava maga
5 ni Ararat. Go noai maga eu do
disu po kiki pa pa atelagi kerua-
lima: atelagi kerualima, naaleatia
vea ni atelagi, naihasua ni tava
6 maga eu po pisi goro. Go e doko
ragi waina naaleatia rualima pati
eu nopu, Noa e savagi namata
7 leo ni ark waina e maria; go
e dipaki lua reven sikai paki
katama, go e dave pano po do
liliu doa, pa pa noai maga eu
8 dapa melu dua ki navanua. Go
e dipaki lua manu kavina sikai
paki katama melu dua ki nia
pano, naga ega vunusi, masa
noai maga eu po dosa melu dua
9 ki narae ni natano, kita ? ma
manu kavina e da pasai te tokora
waina namelena ega maro asa
mau, go e liliu umai punusi a
paki ekopu ni ark, nalakeha noai
maga eu doko narae, ni navanua
mamau; go e sai ki naaruna paki
katama, po puati a, po .piragi a
umai punusi a paki,ekopu ni ark.
10 Go e ko doko naaleatia larua
pota sikai; go e moro dipaki lua
manu kavina paki katama inelu
11 dua ki ark pano; go manu kavina
e umai paki ekopu punusi a ragi
melu; go, kuga leo, naulu ni
oliva sikai waina e dae lua e e
doko nagolena: go Noa e atae
naga noai maga eu po siwo melu
12 dua ki navanua. Go eko moro-
doko naaleatia larua pota sikai;
po dipakilua manu kavina paki
katama; go e da moro liliu umai
punusi a mau.
13 Go .e doko natau ponotia kela-
tesa tamate sikai, atelagi vea,
naaleatia vea ni atelagi, noai
maga eu po dapa melu dua ki
navanua: go Noa e dape lua
nawogoro ni ark, po 1010 punusi,
go kuga leo, narae ni natano e
14 garagara. Go atelagi kerua,
naaleatia rualima kerua tamate


kelarua ni atelagi, navanua e
lologara.
15 Go Sup© e pasa ki Noa, e
16 naga, pa tava melu dua ki ark,
nimu ma amagoroi, go natuma
naanoai maga, go sulifna maga,
17 kuga marua. pa viragi paki
katama sara nalo mauri ni sara
napokasi, waina eu sikoti ko
doko, manu maga, go katel maga,
go sara nalo kakaraka waina eu
cakaraka navanua; naga euga
visola lapalapa navanua, naga
euga vavaka wora po laapa
18 navanua. Go Noa e paki
katama, nara ma natuna naanoai
maga, go anagoroi, go sulina
19 maga, eu marua: sara nalo tua
vati, sara nalo kakaraka go sara
manu, £ea laapa waina eu pari-
vari navanua, pae v naworada
maga, eu dave melu dua ki ark.
20 Go Noa e magi Yehova davagi
wodo ni naviriana sikai; po dape
seara ni sara nalo tua vati tau-
tau, go seara ni sara.manu tau-
tau, po pitua ki naviriana tapara-
jkiana maga wodo ni naviriana.
21 Go Yehova e sii dogo damo lolo;
go Yehova e noa napopona, e
naga, aga wo da moro pasa sa
ki natano nalakena naatamoli
mau, nalakena namidodoana ni
nopopo ni naatamoli e pei
tea sa pa© ragi waina © pei
nakariki pa pa pa; go aga wo
da moro mari punu© sara nalo
mauri mau, dakiusi waina a po
22 mari a. Ragi waina navanua ega
wo doko, ragi ni nalalawoana go
ragi ni lolovaeana, go namaladia
go navivitinuana, go somer go
winter, go naaleatia go napogiana
euga wo da makoto mau.
1 Go Sup© e pasa ihataki Noa go
natuna naanoai maga po noa ki-
da, © naga, kuga vavaka wora,
po laapa, po moro paka vuro
2 navanua. Go namatau-ki-mu-

ni namalopa, go tea laapa waina

3 Sara nalo varivari waina eu
mauri euga wo pei navinaga
animu; dakiusi uataputea mala-

namauriana kakana, nadana,

pei) namauriana animu, aga wo

waina. eu dav© fnelu dua ki ark,

NT AT A VAGI ANA VARAU SAKE
NI BABEL.
1 Go maramana mamau e pei
nagole sikaimaau go navasaana
sikaimaau.
2 Go © doko, ragi waina eu do
surata paki matele ni ist, naga
eu pasai napalea sikai navanua
ni Shinar ; go eu doko tokora
3 wanogo© doko. Go eu duinada
noa ki-da, eu naga, Ita, tuga
mari brik, go tuga taoni ihataki
nia. Go eu peani brik © pei vatu
adeara, go eu peani bitumen e
4 pei laim adeara. Go eu naga,
Ita, tuga tumagida tavagi nato-
koana sikai, go nasuma varau
sake sikai, go nafhasuana ega
sake paki nakoroatelagi, go tuga
tumagida mari nagisa sikai; naga
tuga ta pei taperavera paki narae
ni maramana mamau mau.
5 Go Yebova © siwo- umai naga
ega vunusi natokoana go nasuma
varau sake, waina naatamoli
6 natuda maga eu davagi a. Go
Yehova e noa, kuga leo, Eu pei
narei sikaimaau, go eu marua sua
peani nagole sikaimaau, go tea
waia © pei tea waina eu dalake
naga euga maria: go ragi waia
te navatuna sikai waina eu
midoaki nia naga euga mari a,
ega wo da pei tea ta© luaana ki-
7 ara mau. Ita tuga siwo pano,
po mari nagol©da ega vinovinoi
tokora wanana, naga euga ta
duinada dogo ata© nagoleda mau.
8 Go Yehova © daperavera ki-da
fnelu dua ki tokora wanogo© paki
narae ni maramana mamau: go
eu makoto ki natavagiana ni
9 natokoana. Nalakena tea wano-
goe nagisana © pei tea sosoana ki
Babel ; nalakena Yehova © mari
nagole ni maramana mamau e
pinovinoi tokora wanogoe: go
Yehova © taperavera ki-da fnelu
dua ki tokora wanogo© paki narae
ni maramana mamau.


NASOSOANA NI ABRAHAM.
27 (Go Abram © pei natu ni Tera,
waina e pei nawora ni Sem.) Go
Tera © pesi Abram, Nahor, go
Haran; go Haran e pesi Lot.
28 Go Haran © mate nara© ni
tamana Tera navanua waina e.
paki lina asa, Ur ki tea ni
29 Kaldea maga. Go Abram go
Nahor ero piragi nagoroi: nagisa

SARA GO ISAAK (9)


1 Go ragi waina Abram e pei tea
ni natau rualima lovita tamate
loviti Yehova e pisigoso ki
Abram, po noa ki nia, © naga,
Kinau a pei Supe Kasua Mau;
pa surata naraegu, go pa wia lua.
2 Go aga wo raari navasasokiana
aginau uamawota kakagida, go
3 aga wo mari ko pa wo laapa sa.
Go Abram e dowo dapolo siwo:
4 go Sup© e pasa ki nia, po noa,
Kinau, pa leo, navasasokiana
aginau e sikoti ko doko, go pa
wo pei tama ni nalauna laapa.
5 Go nagisaina ega ta moro pei tea
sosoana ki Abram mau, ma nagi-
saina ega vei Abraham ; nalakena
a po mari ko ko pei tama ni
6 nalauna laapa. Go aga wo mari
ko pa wo pavakawora lapalapa
sa, go aga wo mari ko pa wo pei
nalauna maga, go nawota maga
7 euga wo melu ako umai. Go aga
wo lawo soki navasasokiana
aginau namawota kakagida go
namawota. kakagu ma nawora-
worama waina euga wo ©daku
kigo sara tagona adeara, ega wo
pei navasasokiana vatoko sikai,
naga aga vei Supe anigo go agi
naworaworaiha waina euga wu
8 edaku kigo. Go aga wo dua mu
ma naworaworaiha waina euga
wo edaku kigo, navanua ni
namenakiatatokoana anigo maga,
navanua mamau ni Kanaan, ega
wo pei naveaniana vatoko; go
9 aga wo pei Sup© adeara. Go
Supe e noa ki Abraham, e naga.
Go nigo, navasasokiana aginau
pa vavaigoro e, nimu ma nawora-
woraiha, waina euga wo ©daku
10 kigo sara tagona adeara. Tea
waia e pei navasasokiana aginau,
waina kuga vavaigoro e, nama
wota kakagida go namawota
kakagu ma naworaworaiha waina
euga wo edaku kigo; sara
naanoai kakamu euga vei tea
tovataviviana.
15 Go Sup© e noa ki Abraham,
© naga, Amagoroi Sarai, pa ta
soso nagisana ki Sarai mau, ma
16 nagisana ega vei Sara. Go aga
wo pasa mataki nia, go aga wo
dua ko natuma naanoai sikai
asa: io, aga wo pasa mataki nia,
go ega wo pei pila ni nalauna
maga; nawota maga ni nalauna
17 maga euga melu asa. Go
Abraham e dowo dapalo siwo, po
mum, po noa napopona, e naga,
Naata sikai, waina natau aneana
e ponotia ega vati nakariki,
kita ? go Sara, waina e pei tea
ni natau rualima loviti, ega wo
18 pisola, kita? Go Abraham © noa
ki Supe, e naga, pa suasua naga
Ismael ega mauri doko naraema!
19 Go Supe e noa, 10, ma ama-
goroi Sara ega wo manigo dap©
natuma naanoai sikai; go pa wo
soso nagisana ki Isaak: go aga
wo lawo soki navasasokiana
aginau paki nia ega wo pei nava-
sasokiana vatoko agi nawora-
worana waina euga wo edaku ki
20 nia. Go nalo ni Ismael, a dogo
ko asa: pa leo, a pasa mataki
nia, go aga wo mari © ega wo
pavaka wora, aga wo mari a ©ga
wo laapa ’ sa; ega wo pati tea
maraki rualima sikai tamate dua,
go aga wo mari a ega wo pei
21 nalauna lapa. Ma (nalo ni)
navasasokiana aginau aga wo
lawo soki a paki Isaak, waina
Sara ega wo manigo dap© a ragi
waia ni natau ©daku.
23 Go Abraham e puati natuna
Ismael, go tea laapa waina eu
pakilina nasuma aneana, go tea
laapa waina eu pei tea vako-
toviana ki moni aneana, sara
naanoai kaka ni naatamoli maga
ni nasuma ki Abraham, po
tovadavivi ara naaleatia sikai-
maau wanogoe.


NAMARISASAKIANA NI
SODOMA.
1 Go Yehova e pisi goro ki
(Abraham) melu ni terebint
maga ki Mamr©; go nae e do
natano namata ni tapaupau ragi
2 ni sui ni aleati; go e sikenama-
tana po 1010, go, kuga leo, naata-
moli dolu eu lawodu naraena:
go ragi waina e punusi ra e sava
dua ki namata ni tapaupau pano
naga ega sua ra, go e colo suai
3 natano, po noa, Nawota aginau,
waina a p© sua nasaupiaana
namataiha, pa ta liu dua ki tea
suasua anigo mau, a pavarani ko
4 asa: pa suasua naga noai kiki
sikai ega vei tea tapeana umai,
go kuga saru© natuamu, po
5 maromaro melu ni nakau : go aga
wo dape matele navinaga kiki
umai, go kuga sila© napopomu;
kuga wo edaku surata pano, nala-
kena ku po umai punusi tea sua-
6 sua animu. Go eu noa, pa mari
dapale waina ko noa e. Go
Abraham e paki ekopu mara-
verave punusi Sara, po noa, pa
iharaverav© pa tape totowo ni
flour wia ega tolu, pa moli a ega
vei kek© seara, go pa taoni ra.
7 Go Abraham e sava paki navata
ni kau, po puati kaf sikai waina
© manaimai go e pia, go © dua tea
suasua asa; go e mari maraverave
8 mari usi peni a. Go e dape butter,
go milk go kaf waina © mari usi
peni sua e, po doropusi a
naraeda; go e lawo du pisari ra
melu ni nakau, go eu ganikani.
16 Go (ragi waina eu ganikani sua)
naatamoli maga wanogoe eu
duleana melu dua ki tokora
wanogoe, po 1010 paki narae ni
Sodoma: go Abraham © muri-
-17 muri ra pano. Go Yehova e noa,
Kinau aga magi Abraham dasura
ki tea waina a naga aga xnari a,
18 kita? Go Abraham ega wo pei
nalauna lapa go casua lomau, go
sara nalauna laapa ni maramana
euga wo pei tea vasamatakiana
19 asa. Nalakena a atae a, naga
ega wo dipaki natuna maga go
tea ni nasurna aneana maga
waina euga wo edaku ki nia,
naga euga vavaigoro napua ki
Yehova, naga euga mari namari-
naloleanaana go navasapotaeana;
naga Yehova ega viragi umai
paki Abraham tea waina e noa
© asa.
20 Go Yehova © noa, Nalakena
nakuapiosoana ni Sodoma go
Comorra © lapalapa, go nala-
kena namarinalosaana adeara e
21 madaga sa; aga wo siwo pano,
po punusi eu mari dapale nakua-
piosoana kakana, waina © umai
paki nau;' go e pe tika, go aga
22 wo atae. Go naatamoli wanogoe
ero duinada doa ra melu dua ki
tokora wanogoe, po surata paki
Sodoma pano; ma Abraham ©ko
23 lawo du nara© ni Yehova. Go
Abraham © umai paki ihaladigi,
po noa, pa wo mari puoli ki tea
leana maga sikoti tea sigisigileo
24 maga, kita? Ep© wo doko naga

tokora wanogoe nalakena tea

noa ki nia, pa toro napura noai
anigo, a pavarani ko asa, naga
aga munu; go nae ega wo noa,
pa munu, go aga wo dua kamel
anigo maga nara ma euga munu:
nae ega vei tea waina ko
magi tea suasua anigo Isaak noa
potae a; go aga wo atae pae tea
wanogoe naga ko mari nado-
dumiana paki master aginau.

ko da pasa sua mau, naga, kuga

19 dua e e munu. Go ragi waina
o dua e e munu sua, e noa, Aga

pa pa nara ma euga munu sua.

waina e dogo.navasaana maga ki

mataki nasutna, go tokora sikai
agi kamel maga.

sua ki Abraham. Go Yehova e

YAKOB GO ESAU.
(Isaak ma Rebeka natuda ero pei
Jakob go Esau. Ero pei tedue,
go Esau e paki lina pea, go e)
miala, © samasaina usuraki
dakiusi sugoro kovagoroana sikai
ni namau. Go nakariki naanoai
wanogoe ero atumaki: go Esau e
pei naatamoli mari matua navala-
koana, naatamoli ni namalasi; go
Yakob © pei naatamoli matemate,
e doko tapaupau maga. Go
Isaak e dodumi Esau, nalakena
© do gani tea valakokiana aneana.
Ma Rebeka © dodumi. Yakob.
Go Yakob e peni tea veniana
ni pot: go Esau © pa© namalasi
umai go e mawosa sa; go Esau
e noa ki Yakob, e naga, pa tua
au aga kani seara ni tea miala,
tea miala waia, a pavarani ko


asa; nalakena a mawosa sa ; nala-
kena tea wanogoe nagisana e pei
31 tea sosoana ki Edom. Go Yakob
e noa, pa sori paki nau masoso tea

Esau © noa, pa leo, kinau a mala-
digi mate: go aga kasa ki na-vei-

noa, pa vasa sokisoki paki nau
masoso; go © pasa sokisoki paki
nia: go e sori paki Yakob tea ni
34 navei-takalapaana aneana. Go
Yakob © dua Esau bred go lentil
veniana ni pot: go e ganikani po
xnunu, po duleana, po pano:
dapale nogoe Esau e midoaki palo
ki tea ni na-vei-takalapaana
aneana.

NAVAKILINAANA NI
BENYAMIN.
1 Go Supe e noa ki Yakob, e
naga, pa tuleana, pa sake paki
Bethel pano, po doko asa doko:

aneana maga, go ki tea laapa
waina eu sikoti a doko, e naga

mu kuga tautau, go kuga suni

na'Viriana sikai asa agi Supe,

ni nariesoki-au-ana, po sikoti au

eu dua Yakob sara sup© pota

eu doko uadaligada: go Yakob
e dasuru kida nalake ni
. terebint waina e doko pisari

natokoana maga waina eu doko
davivi ki da, go eu da sava dausi

kena Simeon go Levi ero mari

liioii laapa waina eu sikoti a doko.

YAK OB GO AGELO (16)


18 naanoai waia. Go ragi waina
naatana e do melu (nalakena e
mate) e soso nagisana ki Ben-oni:
ma tamana e soso e ki Ben-yamin.
19 Go Rakel e mate, po pei tea
ovakiana napua ni Efrath (nae
20 e pei Beth-lehem). Go Yakob e
sike ki tea lawodu sikai tanoma
aneana: nae e pei tea lawodu
ni tanoma ki Rakel pa pa paki
21 masoso waia. Go Israel e surata
pano, po pukesi tapaupau aneana
matele kerua ni nasuma varau
23 paki elagi ni Eder. Go Yakob
natuna naanoai eu pei rualima
sikai tamate dua: Lea natuna
naanoai maga; Reubin, Yakob
natuna takalapa, go Simeon, go
Levi, go Yuda, go Issakar, go
24 Sebulun: Rakel natuna naanoai
25 maga; Yosef go Benyamin: go
natuna naanoai maga ki Bilha,
tea suasua nagoroi ki Rakel;
26 Dan go Naftali: go natuna
naanoai maga ki Zilpa, tea sua-
sua ki Lea ; Cad go Asher: tea
maga wanogoe eu pei Yakob
natuna naanoai maga, waina eu
maneana paki lina Paden-Aram.
27 Go Yakob e umai paki Mamre
punusi tamana Isaak, paki nato-
koana ni Arba (nae e pei
Hebron), tokora waina Abraham
go Isaak ero menaki-ata-toko asa.
28 Go naaleatia maga ki Isaak eu
pei natau ponotia sikai rualima
29 takuna latolu. Go Isaak e
marodua ki namerona, po mate,
po pei tea saisaikiana paki
namatarau aneana maga, e pei
tea matua po pura ki naaleatia
maga: go natuna naanoai dua
Esau go Yakob ero ovaki nia.
6 Go Esau e puati nagoroi
aneana maga, go natuna naanoai
maga, go natuna nagoroi maga,
go naatamoli mamau puti ni
nasuma aneana, go katel aneana
maga, go nalo tua vati lapa
aneana mamau puti, go sara
naleo waina e peani ra, waina e
dalua ra navanua ni Kanaan; po
paki navanua sikai pa dua ki
7 taina Yakob pano. Nalakena
nalo veaniana adeara e lapalapa
dapale ero pe ta dua doko tokora
sikaimaau mau; go navanua ni
nainenakiatatokoana adeara maga
e mari sa silae ra nalakena katel
8 adeara maga. Go Esau e doko
tava ni Seir doko: Esau e pei
Edom.
17.
YOSEF MA TAINA MAGA.
1 Go Yakob e doko navanua ni
nainenakiatatokoana ki tamana.
2 navanua ni Kanaan. Tea maga
waia eu pei navakilinaana ni
Yakob. Yosef, waina e pei tea
ni natau rualima sikai tamate
larua, e lo parati ki navata
sikoti taina maga; go e pei
natureai sikoti Bilha natuna
naanoai dua, go Zilpa natuna
naanoai dua, tamana anagoroi
dua; go Yosef e dape narogo-
rogoana sa adeara umai paki
3 tamada. Go Israel e dodumi
Yosef lapalapa liu natuna pota
laapa, nalakena e pei natu ni
naveiteamatuaana aneana: go e
maneana mari sugoro oraoraua
4 sikai. Go taina maga eu punusi
naga tamada e dodumi a lapalapa
liu taina laapa; go eu pilosi a,
go eu mari sa pasa damate paki
5 Go Yosef e punusi naperea
sikai, go e noakisai taina maga
asa: go eu moro sokari
6 navilosiana adeara paki nia. Go
e noa ki-da, e naga, Kuga rogo,
a pavarani mu asa, naperea waia

go e lawodu; go, kuga leo, napu

Farao.

ki nawota aginau; te navatuna

ni namatama, kinami go natano
aginami 1 pa vacotovi garni go

wo pei tea suasua ki Farao: go

puti ni Ecipt; nalakena nakani

vanua adeara sarasara ra, nala-
kena navitoloana e lapalapa ara:
go navanua e po pei tea ki Farao.

pa pa paki namata pagona

ni tamana, po dagi asa, po
2 dimoli a. Go Yosef e dipaki tea

18 maga eu mauri. doko. ,Go kig
ni Ecipt e soso nasisiki maga, po
noa ki-da, e naga, Ecasana ku
mari naleo waia, po mauti naka-
riki naanoai maga eu mauri doko ?
19 Go nasisiki maga eu noa ki
Farao, eu naga, Nalakena
nagoroi Hebru eu da dakiusi


nagoroi maga ni Ecipt man;
nalakena eu mari inarave-
rave, po pisola sua ragi waina
nasisiki e ko da umai punusi ra
20 man. Go Supe e mari inataki
nasisiki maga: go narei eu do
22 laapa, go eu do casua liu. Go
Farao e dipaki narei laapa ane-

naanoai waina euga wo paki lina
kuga madi ki-da paki noai sara,
go sara natuda nagoroi kuga
mauti ra euga mauri doko.
1 Go naatamoli sikai ni nasuma
ni Levi e pano, po piragi nagoroi
sikai waina e pei Levi natuna
2 nagoroi sikai. Go nagoroi wano-
goe e diena, po dape natuna
naanoai sikai: go ragi waina e
punusi a naga e pei nakariki
wia, e dasuru ki nia atelagi dolu.
3 Go ragi waina e mari sa moro
dasuru ki nia, e maneana dape
ark ni papiro sikai, po puluti a
ki bitumen go ki tar; go e doro-
pusi nakariki wanogoe asa, po
doro e maleoputo ni flac ni
4 nadigi ni noai sara. Go gorena
e lawo du uvea, naga ega atae
tea waina ega wo paki lina ki
nia.
5 Go Farao natuna nagoroi e
siwo umai naga ega loloso noai
sara; go nagoroi atara aneana
maga eu surata pae nadigi ni
noai sara; go e punusi ark wano-
goe e doko maleoputo ni flac, go
e dipaki lua nagoroi suasua ane-
-6 ana naga ega tape a umai. Go
ragi waina e lagai a, e punusi
nakariki wanogoe, go, kuga leo,
nakariki naanoai sikai e do cai.
Go e dodumi a, po noa, Tea waia
e pei sikai kaka ni nakariki maga
7 ni Hebru. Go gorena e noa ki
Farao natuna nagoroi, e naga,

ki nia, e naga, pa vano. Go
naatara wanogoe e pano po soso
9 nakariki wanogoe pilana. Go

nia, e naga, pa tape lua naka-
riki waia, po maginau paka-susu

namoriana anigo. Go nagoroi
wanogoe e dape nakariki wano-
-10 goe, po paka susu ki nia. Go
nakariki wanogoe e atumaki, go
e piragi a umai punusi Farao
natuna nagoroi, go e po pei
natuna. Go e soso nagisana ki
Moses, po noa, Nalakena a puati
lua e e melu dua ki noai.

FARAO NAT UNA NAGOROI E PASAI
MOSES (24).


16 Go tea viri ni Midian e peani
natuna nagoroi lama; go eu
rumai po pautu noai, po paka
vuro rarua maga naga euga tua
navata ni shiip go ni naninani
17 ki tamada euga niunu. Go tea
lo parati ki maga eu rumai po
capasi lua ra: ma Moses e
duleana po silae ra, po dua
navata ni shiip go nananani
18 adeara eu munu. Go eu rumai
punusi tamada Reuel, go nae e
noa, Ecasana ku po umai
19 maraverave masoso ? Go eu noa,
Naatamoli ni Ecipt sikai e pua
lua garni melu dua ki namelearu
ni tea lo parati ki maga, go e
magi nami pautu noai, po dua
navata ni shiip go ni naninani
20 eu .munu. Go e noa ki natuna
nagoroi maga, e naga, Go nae
wai ? ecasana ku doropusi naata-
moli wanogoe e madoko ? kuga
soso e, naga ega kani navinaga.
21 Go Moses e suasua naga ega
toko sikoti naatamoli wanogoe
doko: go e dua Moses natuna
22 nagoroi Zippora. Go e da

keha e noa, A pei namenaki-ata-
t'oko sikai navanua pota.
23 Go e doko te ragi ni naaleatia
laapa wanogoe, naga kig lii Ecipt
e mate, go Israel natuna maga
eu marousu nalakena nawosiana,

adeara © sake paki Supe nala-

dogo nagigiana adeara, go Supe

paki Abraham, paki Isaak, go
25 paki Yakob. Go e punusi Israel
natuna maga, go Supe e dodumi
atae ra.
Go Moses e do lo parati ki
navata ni shiip go ni naninani
ki mona Yethro, tea viri ni
Midian: go e piragi navata paki
nataku ni malo palo, go e umai
paki tava ki -Supe, paki Horeb.
2 Go agelo ki Yehova e paki lina
ki nia mena. nakapu pae ihaleo-
puto ni nakau makalikali sikai:
go e leo punusi, go kuga leo,

makalikali wanogoe e da pei tea
3 kaniana man. Go Moses e noa,

paki nia pae maleoputo ni nakau
makalikali, po noa, Moses,
5 Moses. Go e noa, Kinau nea.
Go e noa, pa ta umai paki mala-
digi mau: pa sawo lua shoe anigo
maga ki naiheletha, • nalakena
tokora waina ko lawo du asa e
6 pei natano tapu. Go e noa,

go Supe ki Yakob. . Go Moses
e kulugoro naraena, nalakena e
mataku leo punusi Supe.

lomau ki narogo-ki-te-esa-ana ki
narei aginau waina eu doko Ecipt

maga; nalakena a atae nasusue-

sake umai paki navanua wia go
warua paki navanua waina e sara
9 ki milk go ki honi. Go ragi waia
pa leo, nakuapiosoana ki Israel
natuna maga e po' umai paki
nau: go a punusi nariesokiana
waina naka ni Ecipt eu do

pa umai, go aga wo dipaki lua

viragi lua narei aginau Israel

NAVEINAYITIANA ECIPT.
1 Go Moses go Aaron ero cdaku
umai, po noa ki Farao, ero naga,

dapale waia, e naga, pa suasua
ki narei aginau naga euga vano,
naga euga maginau mari nasai-
-2 sajana sikai malo palo. Go Farao
, e noa, Yehova' e pei sei, waina
aga rogo parati ki nadaleona
naga aga suasua ki Israel naga
euga vano? A da atae Yehova
mau, go aga wo da suasua ki
3 Israel naga euga vano mau. Go
ero noa, Supe ki Hebru maga e
po sua garni: pa suasua ki garni,
au pavarani ko asa, naga augs
vano nasurataana ni naaleatia
dolu paki malo palo, po mari

nami; naga ega ta mari garni ki
nasasanaana, kita ki lova mau.
4 Go kig ni Ecipt e ■ noa ki-da, e
naga, Ecasana nimu Moses go
Aaron, koro kakaro narei eu
melu dua ki nawosiana adeara
maga? kuga vaki natapetapeana
5 animu maga pano. Go Farao e
noa, Koroga leo, narei m

go nimu koro mari ra eu maro-
maro melu dua ki natapetapeana
6 adeara maga. Go naaleatia
wanogoe Farao e dipaki tea sua-

•go tea maraki adeara maga, p<J
7 noa, Kuga ta mom dua narei
stro waina euga mari brik mag*

euga vano po duihada madeara
8 pila taua ki stro. Go totow®

ta doropusi seara kakana maU

9 Nawosiana waina e one naata-

e naga, Aga wo da dua mu stro
11 mau. Nimu. kuga vano, kuga
duniamu manimu dape stro

pasai a: ma te navatuna ni
nawosiana animu ega wo da pei

navanua ni Ecipt mamau naga
euga vila taua ki nalake maga

maga eu suatoro ki-da, po noa,
Kuga, mari sua nawosiana animu
maga, tea ni naleatia sikai ega
nopu naleatia kakana, ega
takiusi ragi waina stro e doko.

natuna maga, waina tea suatoro

waina ko peani ra vanua euga
vaki ekopu iharaverav©; nala-
kena sara naatamoli go sara nalo
tuavati waina euga wo doko
vanua, go waina euga wo da pei
tea saisaikiana paki nasuma mau,
heel ega wo powo. ara, go euga
wo mate.

ISRAEL XATUXA MAGA EU
MELU ECIPT (33).


da ki naleo maga waina eu
datago ara. Go eu puti lua ki
naka ni Ecipt.
37 Go Israel natuna maga eu
surata pae Ramases paki Sukoth
(naveveana kakada) © pisari
ponotia ni manu latesa waina eu
* surata waina eu pei naanoai, go
38 nakariki maga eu sokari ra. Go
taua sikai ni naatamoli sarisari
eu mamau sake sikoti ra pano;
go navata ni shiip go ni nani-
nani maga, go navatani ni kau
39 maga, katel laapa parua sa. Go
©u daoni nakoau ni flauer waina
©u dape pa© Ecipt, e pei bred
waina leven © dika asa, nalakena
eu da mari a © pei leven mau;
nalakena eu pei tea kapasiluaana
inelu dua ki Ecipt pano, po mari
sa .mari daliali, go eu da dumada
madeara mari mataki navinaga
seara mau.
40 Go namenaki-atatokoana ki
Israel natuna maga, waina eu
rhenaki atatoko Ecipt, e pei
natau ponotia pati rualima
41 takuna dolu. Go e doko ragi
waina natau ponotia pati rua-
lima takuna dolu eu nopu, e doko
naaleatia sikaimaau wanogoe,
naga taua mamau puti ki Yehova
eu melu dua ki navanua ni Ecipt
42 pano. E pei napogiana ni nava-
vaigoroana ki Yehova nalakena
© piragi lua ra melu dua ki
navanua ni Ecipt umai:
napogiana wanogoe e pei napogi-
ana ni navavav'aigoroana ki
Yehova agi Israel natuna mamau
puti usuraki tagona adeara maga.
°1 Go e doko naaleatia sikaimaau
wanogoe, naga Yehova e piragi
lua Israel natuna maga melu dua
ki navanua ni Ecipt umai pae
taua adeara maga.
1 Go Yehova e pasa paki Moses,
2 po noa, pa maginau dapugoro
takalapa mamau puti,
naatamoli go nalo tua vati maga ;
eu pei tea aginau.
3 Go Moses e noa ki narei, c
naga, Kuga midoaki naaleatia
waia, waina ku melu dua ki
Ecipt, nasuina ni naviti maga
umai asa; nalakena Yehova e
piragi lua mu melu dua ki tokora
waia ki nakasuaana ni namelea-
runa: bred waina leven e doko
asa ega ta pei tea kaniana mau.
5 Go ©ga wo doko ragi waina
Yehova ega wo piragi ko paki
navanua waina e sara ki milk
go honi, pa wo mari nawosiana
6 waia atelagi waia. Naaleatia
larua pa kani bred waina leven
e dika asa, go naaleatia kelarua
nasaisaiana sikai ki Yehova ega
wo doko asa.
8 Go pa wo noakisai natuma
naanoai naaleatia wanogoe, po
noa, Nalakena tea waina Yehova
© maginau mari a ragi waina a
9 inelu dua ki Ecipt umai. Go ega
wo manigo pei navaivaiana sikai
doko namelearuma, go namido-
akiana sikai namawota ni nama-
tama, naga nawotaeana ki
Yehova ega toko nagolema ; nala-
kena Yehova e piragi lua ko ki
ihelearu kasua sikai melu dua ki
10 Ecipt umai. Nalakena tea
wanogoe pa vavaigoro natawana-
kiana waia ragi kakana sara
natau.
11 Go ega wo doko ragi waina
Yehova ©ga wo piragi ko paki
navanua ki naworawora in
Kanaan dakiusi waina e pasa
sokisoki paki-go go paki tamaiha
maga, go ragi waina ega wo dua ko
12 asa, naga pa magi Yehova doro-
>pusi tea mamau puti waina e pea
paki lina, go tea vea mamau puti
ni nalo tua vati waina ko peani
ra; tea anoai maga kakana euga
13 vei tea ki Yehova. Go tea vea
mamau puti ni ass pa wo daulua


ra ki shiip natuna sikai; go ko
pe ta daulua e mau, pa mari
pori nano-ana : ga pa taulua taka-
lapa mamau puti ni' naatamoli
maleoputo ni natuma naanoai
maga.
NAM ARTS AS AKIA N A NI
FAR AO.
17 Go e doko, ragi waina Farao
e suasua ki narei naga euga vano,
naga Supe e da maraki ra pae
napua ni navanua ki Filistine
maga mau, nalakena nae e pei
maladigi; nalakena Supe e noa,
E pe doko narei eu pe midoaki
piri ragi waina eu pe vunusi
navakalo, go eu pe liliu paki
18 Ecipt pano: ma Supe e maraki
doa narei pae napua ni malo palo
pae Natasi Miala; go Israel
natuna maga eu puati nalikau
sake pano ihelu dua ki navanua
19 ni Ecipt. Go Moses e dape
navatu maga ni Yosef eu sikoti
a pano: nalakena e mari Israel
natuna maga eu pasasokisoki
casua, e noa, Supe ega wo umai
punusi mu lomau; go kuga tape
navatugu maga sikoti mu ihelu
dua ki tokora waia pano.
20 Go eu dakai po surata pae
Sukoth pano, po fhenaki Etham,
nadigi ni malo palo. Go Yehova
e pea ki-da pano aleati e doko
napopouru ladowu, naga ega
maraki ra napua; go pogi e doko
nakapu lawodu, naga ega mara-
malagati ra; naga euga surata
22 aleati go pogi: napopouru lawodu
aleati, go nakapu lawodu pogi,
ero da melu dua ki narae ni narei

atae naga kinau a pei Yehova.
Go eu mari dapale nogoe.

NALEGAANA KI MOSES.

natuna maga ©u lega ki Yehova :

6 vatu. Namelearuiha ni matua,

nakasuaana, namelearuiha ni

V wora© tea kokona maga. Go ko

eu duleana dipa ko ki nawa-

ko dipaki lua namaetoana anigo,

NAWORAWORA NI ISRAEL
EU PEI TEA VAKALEANA
KI MANNA.
22 Go Moses e piragi Israel inelu
dua ki Natasi Miala pano, go
eu paki malo palo ni Shur pano;
go eu surata malo palo naaleatia
dolu, go eu da pasai te noai mau.
23 Go eu rumai paki Mara, go eu
mari sa mumu moai maga ni
Mara, nalakena eu kokona : nala-
kena .tea wanogoe nagisana e pei
24 tea sosdana ki Mara. Go narei
eu dauruuru dipa Moses, po noa,
25 Tuga wo munu nasava? Go nae
pioso paki Yehova; go Yehova
e pisei ki nia nakau sikai, go e
nadi ki nia paki noai maga, go
noai maga eu po mami. Tokora
wanogoe e madeara mari nata-
wanakiana sikai go navasa-
potaeana sikai asa, go. tokora
26 wanogoe e mari dogo ra asa 5 go
e noa, Waina ko pe dogo parati
ki nadaleo ni Yehova Supe anigo,
po mari tea waina e leana nama-
tana, po daki dorogo natipakiana
aneana maga, po‘ pavaigoro
natawanakiana mamau puti ane-
ana, nasasanaana maga waina a
doropusi ra naka ni Ecipt, aga
wo da dorpusi ra ako mau;
nalakena . kinau a pei Yehova
waina a mari pauri ko.
27 Go eu rumai paki Elam, waina
uamata noai rualima sikai tamate
dua, go .paam rualima larua eu
doko asa: go eu menaki tokora
wanogoe pisari noai maga.

ni Israel natuna maga eu rumai
paki malo palo ni Sin, waina e

17 Go Israel natuna maga eu
. mari dapale nogoe, po >pila daua
ki, seara eu pila daua ki lapalapa
go seara eu pila daua ki kiki-
-18 Go ragi waina eu dowogi a ki
omer sikai, tea waina e pila daua
ki lapalapa e dika tea tu pele,

e da dika mau ; sara haataiholi
eu pila daua ki tea waina e pataka

ni nakaniana aneana: go rag l
waina elo e po susui e sara.

PUTA MELU VATU LAKE-
TOKO UMAI.

natuna maga eu surata melu dua

39.
MOSES E PEI TEA SOSOANA
SAKE PAKI TAYA.
1 Go (Supe) o noa ki Moses, e
naga, pa sake umai punusi
Yehova, nimu ma Aron, Nadab
go Abihu, go rualima larua ni
2 elder maga ni Israel; go kuga
lotu uvea ; go Moses ega masikinia
umai paki maladigi ki Yehova;
ma nara eiiga ta umai paki mala-
digi mau; go narei euga ta sake
sikoti a mau.
3 Go Moses e umai po dogo-
rogo paki narei ki navasaana

NAREI EU 'LOTU KI KAF NI
.COLD.
1 Go ragi waina narei eu punusi
naga Moses e mari daliali si wo
pae tava umai, narei eu saisai
pa punusi Aaron, po.noa ki nia,
pa. tuleana, pa maginami mari

mamau ni Israel natujia maga,

asa, eu dape umai somori go

gi.ana miala, go nawili, ni takas

naatamoli waina eu pei popo-

TEA WAIN A E DA TAUTAU
GO LEPERO.

mari potae nalo mauri maga

ni natokoana. Go lepero sikai

IS Go naata waina e poka punue

ki tea ni maladigi ki nia te nava-

namatana dipa namatana, napa-
tina dipa napatina; dakiusi

ega tapale nogpe ega wo moro pei
tea mariana paki nia.
21 Go naata waina e mari punue
te tua vati, ega oli a: go naata
waina e mari punue naataiholi
sikai ega vei tea mari punueana.
22 Navasadawanakiana animu
sikaimaau, tea ki namenaki go
tea ki tea vakilina kiamu ega
vataka sikai: nalakena kinau a
pei Yehova Supe animu.

natuna maga, go eu piragi naata-
tholi waina e pasa palo ki (Supe)
paki etaku ni malo menakiana po
nadi punue aki vatu. Go Israel
natuna maga eu mart a pataka
ni waina Yehova e pitipaki Moses
asa.

NATAU KELARUA GO NATAU
NI YUPILI.
1 Go Yehova e pasa ki Moses
2 tava ni Sinai, e naga, pa vasa ki

ni navasasokiana: go kuga wo
pei tea saisaikiana natokoana
animu maga: go aga wo dipaki

kakamu; go kuga wo pei tea
vituakiana paki namelearu ni tea
kokona. Go ku pe ko da nalo
ni tea mamau waia dogo parati
ki nau, ma ku pe surata liliua
paki nau, kinau aga wo surata

pavaga; go kinau ma aga wo
.parati mu paka larua nalakena
namarinalosaana animu maga.
Go nimu kuga wo gani napokasi
ni natumu naanoai maga, go
kuga wo gani napokasi ni natumu
nagoroi maga. Go aga wo mari
pirisi malo paki elagi animu

maladi; go tea kokona ki mu
waina eu doko asa euga wo maaga

pei malo maladi, gO taun animu

N AVITU AAN A KI NAWOTA
MAGA.
1 E doko naaleatia waina Moses

nakel.

SURATA.

PEI TEA TIP AKILU AAN A.
1 Go Yehova e pasa ki Moses,
2 e noa, pa tipaki lua naatamoli
maga, naga euga lo pavaraka
navanua ni Kanaan, waina a dua

dipaki lua naataiholi sikai maau
ni sara nawora ni tamada ; sara

dipaki lua ra pae ! raalo palo ni

ki Yehova ; tea laapa kakada eu
pei naatafhbli' •waina eu pei tea
• maramarani Israel natuna maga.

cuga lo pavaraka navanua ni
Kanaan, go e noa ki-da, Kuga
sake pae napua waia paki South,

vunusi navanua e pei nasava, go
naatamoli waina eu doko asa, eu
pe kasua kita eu pe manainai, eu
pe visa maau kita eu pe laapa;

e dapale saVa, waina e pe wia
kita epe sa; go natokoana maga
waina eu doko asa, eu pe vei
malo menakiana kita malo vava-
20 tuana; go navanua e pei tea
tapale sava, e pe vei malo tawi
pia kita e pe sa, kita waina nakau
e pe toko asa, kita e pe tika.
Kuga viviari pia go kuga tape
umai nawa nakau ni navanua.
Ragi wanogoe e pei tau matua ni
crep.

22 eu do para ki Hamat. Go eu
sake pae South, po umai paki

napalea ni Eskol, go eu dae lua

asa, go naatamoli dua ero pausi
a ; go eu moro piragi umai pome-
granat seara, go napuliva se.ara.

raka sua navanua edaku ni
naaleatia e rualima path

. navanua eii casua, go eu doko

MAATA NI BRAS.
4 Go eu melu tava ni Hor pano,
po surata pae napua ni Natasi

Israel e dape parati ki taun laapa
waia: go Israel e doko taun laapa
ki Amorite maga, doko Heshbou
31 go taun laapa kakana. Dapale
nogoe Israel e doko navanua ki
33 Amorite maga. Go eu dawasi
po sake napua paki Bashan; go
Og, kig ni Bashan e dave pano
sua ra, nara ma naatamoli laapa
aneana, e dipa navakalo (tokora
34 sikai, nagisana) Edrei. Go Ye-
hova e noa ki Moses, pa ta matau
ki nia: nalakena kinau a pitua
ki nia paki namelearuma, go
naatamoli laapa aneana, go nava-
nua aneana; go pa wo mari a
paki nia dakiusi ko mari a paki
Sihon kig ki Amorite maga,
35 waina eu doko Heshbon. Dapali
nogoe eu atugi a go natuna maga,
go naatamoli laapa. aneana pa pa
tea aneana seara eu da moro
maneana doko : go eu dape parati
ki navanua aneana.
BALAK GO ‘BALAAM.
1 Go Israel natuna maga eu
surata pano, go eu sike tapaupau
adeara naoneone maga ni Moab,
matele kerua ni Yordan doko ki
vea ki Yeriko.
2 Go Balak natu ni Zippor e
punusi tea laapa waina Israel e
3 mari a paki Amorite maga. Go
Moab e matau ki sa ki narei,
nalakena eu laapa: go Moab e
durururu nalakena Israel natuna
4 maga. Go Moab © noa ki elder
maga ni Midian, Ragi waia taua
naatamoli lapa waia euga menae
sua sara naleo waina e davivi-goro
gida dakiusi bulok e menae garni
namenau ni vanua. Go Balak
natu ni Zippor e pei kig ni Moab
5 ragi wanogoe. Go e dipaki lua
tea tautauana pa punusi Balaam
natu ni Beor, paki Petor, waina
e doko pisari river, paki vanua
ki natu ni naataijioli aneana,
naga euga soso e, po noa, pa leo,
narei sikai eu fnelu Ecipt umai:
pa leo, eu kovagoro navanua, go
6 eu doko ki vea ki nau; tea waina,
■ pa umai, a pavarani ko, asa pa
maginau pasa sa ki narei waia;
nalakena eu casua sa ki nau: e
pe wo lolomana a pe wo mari
matua ara, a pe wo meri ra, go
a pe kapasi lua ra pa dua ki
navanua: nalakena a atae naga
tea waina nigo ko pasa mataki
nia e pei tea vasa ihatakiana, go
tea waina nigo ko pasa sa ki
nia e pei tea vasasakakiana.
7 Go elder maga ni Moab go
elder maga ni Midian eu davo
pano, namoriana ni nasairukuana
e doko namelearuda, go eu rumai
punusi Balaam, po noa. ki nia.
8 navasaana maga ki Balak. Go
nae e noa ki-da, Kuga ko maturu
tokora waia pogi ni masoso, go
aga wo moro dua mu navasaana
pataka ni waina Yehova ega wo
pasa ki nau asa: go nawota maga
ni Moab eu maturu sikoti
Balaam.
9 Go Supe e umai punusi
Balaam, go e noa, seve Naata-
moli maga waina eu sikoti ko
10 doko ? Go Balaam e noa ki Supe,
Balak natu ni Zippor, kig ni
Moab, e pitipaki paki nau, e noa,
11 pa leo, narei waina e fnelu Ecipt

maginau pasa sa ki-da; a pe wo
mari atae mari matua ki-da P°
12 digo lua ra pano. Go Supe o
noa ki Balaam, pa ta sikoti ra
pano mau; pa ta pasa sa ki
narei: nalakena eu pei tea vasa-
matakiana.

eu noa ki nia, Balak natu ni

navatuna ega tugoro ko umai

ISRAEL EU PEI TEA VEVEPA-
kATIKIANA SALA KERUA.
1 Go e doko edaki ki nawokatiana
»aga Yehova e pasa ki Moses go
K Eleazar natu ni Aarch tea
v iri, e noa, Koroga tape liaveve-
paratikiana' rti ' nasaisaiana ni
Israel natuna maga, tea ni natau
rualima dua sake, pae nasuhia
maga ni tamada, tea laapa ni
Israel waina eu mari atae dave
51 paki navakalo. (Go) tea waia eu
pei tea veveparatikiana ni Israel
natuna maga, ponotia ni manu
latesa, manu sikai ponotia larua,
63 rualima takuna dolu. Tea maga
waia eu pei tea maga waina eu
pei tea veveparatikiana ki Moses
go ki Eleazar, tea viri, waina
ero peve parati ki Israel natuna
maga naoneone ni Moab pisari
64 Yordan maladigi ni Yeriko. Ma
naatamoli sikai e da sari tea maga
waia waina Moses go Aaron, tea
viri, ero peve parati ki da ragi
waina ero peve parati, ki Israel
natuna maga malo palo ni Sinai.
65 Nalakena Yehova e noa ra, e
naga, lomau euga wo mate malo
palo. Go nara sikai e da doko
ma Kaleb natu ni Yefunne, go
Yosua natu ni Nun.
12 Go Yehova e noa ki Moses, pa
sake tava ni Abarim waia, go pa
vunusi ' navanua waina a dua
13 Israel natuna maga asa. Go ragi
waina ko punusi sua e, nigd ma
pa wo pa sikoti naatamoli anigo
maga, dakiusi Aaron taima e pa
14 sikoti ra: nalakena koro sigisigia
clipa navasaana aginau malo palo
ni Zin, naviluluana ki nasaisai-
ana, waina koro pe tapugoro au
naraeda pisari noai, (noai ni
Meriba, Kadesh, malo palo ni
Zin).
15 Go Mcses e pasa ki Yehova, e
16 noa, E pia Yehova Supe ki naata
ni tea mauri laapa, ega toro
naatamoli sikai dapau nasaisai-
-17 ana, waina e pe tave pea ki da
maraki pano, go waina e pe viragi
ra sili, go waina e pe tamaraki
ra pano, go waina e pe viragi
ra liliu: naga nasaisaiana ki Ye-
hova euga ta dakiusi shiip waina


18 tea lo parati ki da e dika. Go
Yehova e noa ki Moses, pa vua
Yosua natu ni Nun, naatamoli
sikai waina naatana e doko asa,
go pa toro namelearuma ega toko
19 asa, go pa toro e ega toko narae
ni Eleazar, tea viri, go narae ni
nasaisaiana mamau; go pa wo
20 dua © natipakiana narae da. Go
pa wo doro navei tea tapetape-

ko pe mari atae mari a.

1 Go Moses e sake pae naoneone
maga ni Moab paki tava Nebo,

vitua ki nia paki naworama: a
po mari ko ko punusi a ki nama-
tama, ma pa wo da duagoto paki
asa.

hova e mate tokora wanogoe
navanua ki Moab, pae navasaana
6 ki Yehova. Go e ovaki nia
napalea navanua ki Moab ki vea
ki Beth-peor: ma te naata e da
atae tanoma aneana paki masoso
waia.

da do maligo, go nakasuaana
8 aneana e da do kiki. Go Israel
natuna ir.aga eu dagisi Moses

-9 ana ni Moses e nopu. Go Yosua

asa: go Israel natuna maga e

mamau.

ki Moses tea suasua, ki Yehova,

o mate ; tea waina ragi waia pa

dipaki lua panako naatamoli dua

ra mau.

64.
ISRAEL NATUNA MAGA EU
DUAGOTO YORDAN.
1 Go Yosua e duleana malipogi
sa; go eu surata rhelu dua ki
Shittim pano, po umai paki
Yordan, nae ma Israel natuna
laapa; go eu menaki tokora
wanogoe e pea ki eu duagoto.
2 Go e doko edaku ki naaleatia
dolu, naga tea maraki maga eu
surata dua duru usuraki tokora
3ni nafhenakiana; go eu dipaki
narei, po noa, Ragi waina kuga
wo punusi ark ni uavasasokiana
ki Yehova Sup© animu, go tea
viri maga tea ni naworawora ni
Levi eu do pan vausi a, nimu ma
kuga ihelu dua ki tokora animu,
4 po dausi a pano. Ma namasova
sikai ega toko namawota kakamu
ma nae dapale kubit manu dua
pae totowo; kuga ta paki mala-
digi ki nia mau, naga kuga atae
napua waina kuga wo surata pae
asa; nalakena ku da pae napua
5 waia pano sala vea mau. Go
Yosua e noa ki narei, kuga
tumamu mari mu kuga tau-
tau: nalakena Yehova ega wo
mari tea ni namagaana ihaled-
-6 puto kakamu matamai. Go
Yosua e pasa ki tea viri maga,
e naga, Kuga tape dakati ark ni
nanoasokiana, go kuga tuagoto
pea ki narei. Go eu dape dakati
ark ni nanoasokiana, po surata
pea ki narei.
7 Go Yehova e noa ki Yosua, e
naga masoso waia, aga wo dalake
mari ko pa vei tea warua namata
ni Israel laapa, naga euga atae
naga dakiusi waina a sikoti Moses
dapale nogoe aga wo do sikoti
8 ko. Go pa wo dipaki tea viri
maga waina eu pauvausi ark ni
navasasokiana, po noa, Ragi
waina kuga wo umai sua paki
nadigi ni uoai ni Yordan, kuga

wo lawodu dorogo doko Yordan.
9 Go' Yosua e noa ki Israel
natuna maga, Kuga umai paki
maladigi, go kuga rogo nava-
saana maga ki Yehova Sujie
10 auimu. Go Yosua e noa, Kuga
wo atae ki tea waia naga Sujie
mauri e doko maleoputo kakamu.
11 Kuga leo ark ni navasasokiana
ki Nawota ni maramana mamau
e do duagoto pea ki mu paki
12 Yordan. Tea waina pa vua
naatamoli ralima sikai tamate
dua pae naworawora maga ni
Israel naatamoli sikasikai agi sara
naworawora sikasikai sarasara ra.
13 Go ega wo lolomana ragi waina
naihele ni natua ni tea viri maga
waina eu do pauvausi ark ki
Yehova, Nawota ni maramana
mamau euga wo lawodu noai
maga ni Yordan naga noai maga
ni Yordan euga wo makoto, noai
maga waina eu siwo pae elagi
umai; go euga wo lawodu pei
taua sikai.
14 Go e lolomana ragi waina narei
eu melu dua ki tapaujiau adeara
maga pano, naga euga tuagoto
Yordan, go tea viri maga waina
eu pauvausi ark ni nanoasoki-
-15 ana eu pea ki narei; go ragi
waina tea maga waina eu do
pauvausi eu rumai paki Yordan,
go natua ui tea viri maga waina
eu pauvausi ark eu pei tea pupu-
giana nadigi ni noai (nalakena
Yordan e puragoro nadigina
mamau kakana ragi mamau ni
16 nalolovaeana) naga noai maga
waina eu pae elagi siwo umai eu
lawodu, po duleana pei taua
sikai eu madu uvea pisari Adam,
natokoana waina e doko pisari
Zarethan: go tea maga waina eu
siwo pano paki natasi ni Araba,
Natasi ni Natasimena, eu makoto
lua: go narei eu duagoto leana
dipa Yeriko. Go tea viri maga
waina eu pausi ark ni nanoasoki-
ana ki Yehova eu lawodu casua
natano garagara maleoputo ni
Yordan, go Israel laapa eu dua-
goto pae natano garagara pa pa
nalauna mamau eu duagoto sua
Yordan.
1 Go e doko ragi waina nalauna
mamau eu duagoto sua Yordan,
2 naga Yehova e pasa ki Yosua, e
noa, Kuga vua naatamoli rualima
sikai tamate dua melu narei,
naatamoli sikai ni sara nawora-
wora, go kuga tipaki-da, po noa,
3 Kuga tape pae maleoputo ni
Yordan pano, melu tokora waina
natua ni tea viri maga eu lawodu
casua asa, vatu rualima sikai
tamate dua, go kuga vuati ra
duagoto sikoti mu, go kuga toro-
pusi ra tokora ni namenakiana,
tokora waina.kuga wo menaki asa
4 pogi ni masoso. Go Yosua e soso
naatamoli rualima sikai tamate
dua ni Israel natuna maga, waina
e pasa dawanaki sua ra, naata-
moli sikai ni sara naworaworada:
5 go Yosua e noa ki da, Kuga tua-
goto pea ki ark ki Yehova Sujie
auimu paki maleoputo ni
Yordan, go sara ■ naata kakamu
kuga tape dakati vatu sikai paki
paumu e pataka ni naveveana ni
naworawora ui Israel natuna
8 maga. Go Israel natuna maga
eu mari a dapale nogoe pataka
ni waina Yosua e pitipaki asa.
9 Go Yosua e sike vatu rualima
sikai tamate dua maleoputo ni
Yordan, tokora waina natua ni
tea viri maga waina eu pausi ark
ni navasasokiana eu la wo du asa:
go eu doko tokora wanogoe pa pa
10 paki masoso waia. Nalakena tea
viri maga waina eu pausi ark eu
lawo du maleoputo ni Yordan,
pa pa sara naleo waina Yehova
e dijiaki Yosua naga ega vasa
ki narei asa e pei tea marisuaana,
e pataka ni sara naleo waina


Moses e dipaki Yosua asa: go
narei-eu mari maraverave po dua-
-12 goto. Go Reubin natuna maga,
go Cad natuna maga, go nama-
govai ni naworawora ni Manasse,
eu duagoto pea ni Israel natuna
maga eu pua nearu, dapale waina
13 Moses e pasa ki da asa: e dapale
rualima pati ni manu waina eu
marl niataki raki navakalo eu
duagoto narae ni Yehova paki
navakalo, paki naoneone maga ni
Yeriko.
14 Naaleatia wanogoe Yehova e
mari Yosua e pei tea warua
namata ni Israel mamau; go eu
matau ki nia, dakiusi waina eu
matau ki Moses, naaleatia laapa
16 ni namauriana aneana. Go Ye-
hova e pasa ki Yesua, e naga,
16 pa tipaki tea viri maga waina
eu do pausi ark ni nanoasokiana,
naga euga sake melu dua ki
18 Yordan umai. Go e lolomana
ragi waina tea viri maga waina
eu pausi ark ni navasasoHana
ki Yehova eu sake sua melu dua
ki maleoputo ni Yordan umai,
go namele ni natua ni tea viri
maga eu pei tea tape dakatiana
paki natano garagara, naga noai
maga ni Yordan eu liliu paki
tokora kakada, go e puragoro
nadigina mamau dakiusi sala vea.
19 Go narei eu sake melu dua ki
Yordan umai naaleatia kerualima
ni atelagi vea, po menaki Cilcal,
20 matele ni ist ni Yerika. Go vatu
rualima sikai tamate dua wano-
goe, waina eu dape ra melu dua
ki Yordan, Yosua sike ki da
21 Cilcal. Go e noa ki Israel natuna
maga, e naga, Ragi waina
natumu maga euga wo pisusu
paki tamada maga ragi edaku,
22 po noa, Vatu maga waia eu pei
nasava? kuga wo mari natumu
. maga euga atae, kuga wo noa,
Israel e duagoto Yordan -waia
23 natano garagara. Nalakena Ye-
liova Supe animu e mari noai
maga ni Yordan waia eu gara-
gara pa dua ki naraemu, pa pa
ku duagoto sua, dakiusi waina
Yehova Supe animu e mari a
paki Natasi Miala, waina e mari
a e garagara pa dua ki narae-
gami, pa pa au duagoto sua:
24 naga naatamoli laapa ni mara-
mana euga ata© namelearu ni Ye-
hova, naga e casua; naga kuga
matau ki Yehova Supe animu
sara naaleatia.
1 Go e doko, ragi waina nawota
laapa ni naworawora ni Amor,
waina eu doko matele kerua ni
Yordan paki west, go nawota
laapa ni naworawora ni Kanaan
waina eu doko pisari natasi, eu
dogo naga Yehova e mari noai
maga ni Yordan eu garagara pa
dua ki narae ni Israel natun.<
maga, pa pa au duagoto sua,
naga napopoda e sara, go
naviviariana e da moro doko ara
mau, nalakena Israel natuna
maga.
10 Go Israel eu menaki Cilcal, go
eu mari navacalawiana naaleatia
kerualima sikai tamate pati ni
atelagi ragi melu naoneone maga
11 ni Yeriko. Go eu gani korn tuai
ni navanua matamai ki nia edaku
H navacalawiana, kek maga
waina leven e dika ara, go korn
daragiana, naaleatia sikaimaau
12 wanogoe. Go manna e makoto
matamai ki nia edaku ki eu gam
korn tuai ni navanua; go Israel
natuna maga eu da moro peani
manna mau; ma eu do gani nawa
ni navanua ni Kanaan natau
wanogoe.
13 Go e doko, ragi waina Yosua
e doko pisari Yeriko, naga e sik®
namatana po 1010 punusi, g°>
kuga leo, naatamoli sikai e law®
du ki vea ki nia, go leva


sailuaana aneana e doko nainelea-
runa: go Yosua e pa sua e, po
noa ki nia, e naga, Nigo ko pei
tea aginami, kita agi tea kokona
14 ki garni ? Go e noa, Ee, ma a
umai naga aga vei tea maraki
ki tana ki Yehova. Go Yosua
dapolo siwo paki natano, po lotu,
po noa ki nia, Nawota aginau
ega noa ki tea suasua aneana
15 nasava ? Go tea maraki ki taua
ki Yehova e noa ki Yosua, pa
sawo lua shu anigo ega ihelu
namelema, nalakena tokora waina
ko la wo du asa e dapu. Go
Yosua e mari a dapale nogoe.
NAVUAKORO-YERIKOANA.
1 (Go Yeriko e pei tea kokoro-
ana casua nalakena Israel natuna
maga: te naata e da dave, go te
2 naata e da sili mau.) Go Ye-
' hova e noa ki Yosua, pa vunusi,
a po pitua ki Yeriko paki
naraelearuma, go nawota kakana
go naatamoli casua maga ni nava-
-3 kalo. Go kuga wo davivi goro
natokoana, nimu ma naatamoli
laapa ni navakalo, kuga surata
davivi ki natokoana paka sikai-
maau. pa mari a ega dapale
4 nogoe naaleatia latesa. Go tea
viri larua euga vuati paiga larua
ni napati ni ram euga vea ki ark
go naaleatia kelarua kuga wo
davivi-goro natokoana paka
larua, go tea viri maga euga sui
5 paiga maga. Go ega wo lolo-
mana, naga, ragi waina euga wo
sui dosagi napati ni ram, go ragi
waina kuga dogo nadaleo ni
paiga, narei laapa euga wowoa ki
nawowoaana lapa sikai ; go paka
ni natokoana ega wo dowo pae
nalakena kakana, go narei euga
sake pano, sara naata ega (sake)
leana ki vea ki nia.
6 Go Yosua natu ni Nun e soso
tea viri maga, po noa ki da,
Kuga tape dakati ark ni nava-
sasokiana, go tea viri larua euga
vua paiga larua ni napati ni ram
7 euga vea ki ark ki Yehova. Go
eu noa ki narei, Kuga surata
pano po davivi goro natokoana,
go tea vua nalikau maga euga
surata pano pea ki ark ki Ye-
-8 hova, Go e dapale nogoe, ragi
waina Yosua e pasa ki sua narei,
tea viri larua waina eu pua paiga
larua ni napati ni ram pea ki
Yehova eu surata pea, po sui
paiga maga: go ark ni navasaso-
kiana ki Yehova eu dausi ra
9 pano. Go tea vua nalikau maga
eu surata pea ki tea viri maga
waina eu sui paiga maga, go tea
viragi saisai ki tea edaku maga
eu dausi ark pano, tea viri maga
eu do pano po do sui paiga maga.
10 Go Yosua e dipaki narei, po noa;
Kuga ta powoa, go kuga ta mari
nadaleo ega vei tea rogoana mau,
go te navasaana sikai ega ta dave
nagolemu mau pa pa paki naale-
atia waina aga wo noa ki mu
naga kuga wowoa; ragi wanogoe
11 kuga wowoa. Go e mari ark ki
Yehova e davivi goro natokoana,
e davivi goro e paka sikai maau:
go eu rumai paki tokora ni name-
nakiana, po menaki tokora ni
naraenakiana.
12 Go Yosua e duleana malipogi
sa, go tea viri maga eu dape
13 dakati ark ki Yehova. Go tea
viri larua waina eu pua paiga
larua ni napati ni ram eu pea
ki ark ki Yehova eu do surata,
po sui paiga lelesala: go tea vua
nalikau eu do nea ki da pano ;
go tea viragi saisai ki tea edaku
maga eu dausi ark ki Yehova
pano, tea viri maga eu do pano;
14 po do sui paiga. Go naaleatia
kerua eu davivi goro natokoana
paka sikaimaau, po liliu paki
tokora ni namenakiana: eu mari
a dapale nogoe naaleatia latesa.


15 Go e doko naaleatia kelarua,
, naga eu duleana malipogi sa ragi
ni namakotokotoana, go eu davivi
goro natokoana dapale namariana
wanogoe paka larua: ma naale-
atia wanogoe eu davivigoro e
paka larua.
16 Go e lolomana ragi ni sala
kelarua, waina tea viri maga eu
sui paiga, Yosua e noa ki narei,
Kuga wowoa; nalakena Yehova
17 e po dua mu natokoana. Go
natokoana ega vei tea sailuaana
paki Yehova, nae go sara naleo
waina e doko asa; Rahab nagoroi
napua ega masikinia mauri, nara
ma tea laapa waina eu sikoti a
ekopu ni nasuiha, nalakena e
dasuru ki tea tautauana dua
18 waina tu dipaki lua ra. Go nimu
kuga tuniamu pavaigoro mu pa
dua ki naleo sailuaana wanogoe;
ku pe wo dumamu mari mu kuga
vei tea sailuaana, waina ku pe
vua seara ni naloriki siluaana
kakana, po mari taua ni Israel
eu pe vei tea sailuaana, go
19 namarisakiana. Ma sara silver,
go cold, go naloriki maga ni bras
go ni airon, nara eu pei tea tapu
ki Yehova: euga umai paki
ekopu ni natauakiana ni nalo
casua maga ki Yehova.
20 Go narei eu powoa go tea viri
maga eu sui paiga : go e lolomana
ragi waina narei eu dogo nadaleo
ni paiga, naga narei eu powoa
ki nawowoana lapa sikai, go
paka e duwo pae nalakena
kakana, go narei eu sake paki
natokoana, sara naata e (sake)
leana ki vea ki nia, go eu pua
21 parati ki natokoana.
25 Ma Yosua a mouti Rahab
nagoroi napua a mauri doko, go
tea ni nasuma ki tamana, go sara
naleo waina e peaui ra ; go e doko
fhaleoputo ni Israel doko pa pa
paki masoso waia; nalakena e
dasuru ki tea tautauana dua
waina Yosua e dipaki lua ra naga
eroga lopavaraka Yeriko.
26 Go Yosua e pasa sokisoki ra
ragi wanogoe, ki navasasokisoki-
ana casua e naga, Naatamoli
waina ega wo duleana po davagi
natokoana ni Yeriko waia ega vei
tea vasasakiana narae ni Yehoya:
ega wo dae nalakena kakana doko
natuna takalapa, go ega wo lawo
ki namata pua kakana maga
natuna takariki.
27 Go Yehova edo silae Yosua,
go narogorogoana kakana e doko
usuraki navanua mamau.
NATAPIRIANA KI AKAN.
1 Ma Israel natuna maga eu
mari natapiriana sikai nalo ni
naleo vasaduaana: nalakena
Akan, uatu ni Karmi, ni nawora-
wora ni Yuda, e dape tea vasa-
duaana seara kakana ; go namae-
toana ki Yehova e pavaga dipa
2 Israel natuna maga. Go Yosua
e dipaki lua naatamoli seara melu
dua ki Yeriko paki Ai, waina e
doko pisari Beth-aven, matele ni
ist ni Beth-el, go e noa ki .da e
naga, Kuga sake pano po lo pava-
raka navanua. Go naatamoli
maga wanogoe eu sake pano po
3 lo pavaraka Ai. Go eu liliu umai
punusi Yosua, po noa ki nia,
Narei euga ta Ynarua sua sake
pano mau; ma naatamoli maga
dapale manu dua kita dolu euga
sake pano po mari Ai; go pa ta
mari narei laapa euga mawosa
paki asa mau ; nalakena nara eu
4 pisa maau. Go naatamoli dapale
manu dolu kaka ni narei eu sake
paki asa pano: go eu sava pa
dua ki narae ni naatamoli maga
5 ni Ai. Go naatamoli maga m
Ai eu pokati ra dapale naata-
moli rualima dolu tamate latesa
kakada: go eu capasi ra pa dua
ki narae ni namata pua pa pa


paki Shebarim, po pokoti ra
tokora ni nasiwosiwoana: go
napopo ni narei eu sara,. go- eu
po da pale noai.
6 Go Yosua e sie porae sugoro
aheana maga, po dowo dapolo
siwo paki tano narae ni ark ki
Yehova pa pa paki ragi mein,
nara ma elder maga ni Israel eu
mama, go eu do doro naihota-
-7 hiota doko napauda. Go Yosua
e noa, Awi, Nawota Supe, 0,
ecasana ko piragi narei waia dua-
goto Yordan umai, naga pa vitua
ki garni paki namelearu ni
naworawora ni Amor, naga euga
mari sa sa ki garni ? au pe doko
do matele kerua ni Yordan po
pei popo maro asa e pe wia!
8 pa rogo, Nawota, O, aga wo
moro noa nasava waina Israel eu
po doa natakuda paki tea kokona

Kanaan, go tea laapa waina eu
doko navanua euga wo dogo e, go
euga wo davivi goro garni, go

iiielu dua ki maramana: go pa
wo magi nagisama warua, mari
nasava 2
10 Go Yehova e noa ki Yosua,
pa tuleana; ecasana ko do dowo

da asa: eu dape tea vasaduaana
seara kakana: eu panako,-go eu

po doropusi a e sari . naloriki
12 adeara maga. Nalakena tea
vvanogoe Israel natuna maga eu

natakuda paki tea kokona ki da
maga, nalakena navasaduaana e
po one ara: ku pe ta mari puoli
ki ualo vasaduakiana melu dua
ki ihaleoputo kakamu, go kinau

mau. pa tuleana, pa mari narei

tuniamu mari mu kuga tautau

wo pei tea viragiana paki hiala-

-15 nioli maga. Go ega wo doko,
naga tea waina e pei tea vuatiana

ra: nalakena e dapiri navasasoki-

posi napakamalamalaana doko
Israel.

67.
NAVUA PAVAKOTOANA
NI AI.
1 Go Yehova e noa ki Yosua,
pa ta mataka man, go pa ta
manaunau mau: pa viragi narei
ni navakalo 'laapa euga sikoti ko,
go pa tuleana, pa sake paki Ai:
pa vunusi, a po pitua ki
nawota ni Ai paki namelearuiha,
go narei aneana, go taun aneana.
2 go natano aneana: go pa mari
paki Ai go paki nawota kakana
ega tapale waina ko mari a paki
Yeriko go paki nawota kakana:
ma naleo vutiluapavakotoana
maga, go katel kakana maga,
kuga tumarnu manimu dape
pavakoto ara: pa manigo lawo
ki tea kusugoro maga raki taun
natakuna.
3 Go Yosua e duleana, go narei
laapa ni navakalo naga euga sake
paki Ai pano: go Yosua e mata-
doa naataiholi mari matua maga
ni navakalo eu pei rualima dolu
ni manu. Go e dipaki lua ra
4 pogi. Go e dipaki da, e noa,
Kuga vunusi, nimu kuga kusu-
goro dipa taun, nataku ni taun:
kuga ta paki uvea sa ki taun mau,
ma kuga mamau puti pei tea
5 mari matakiana sua: go kimau,
goi narei laapa waina eu sikoti,
auga wo paki maladigi ki taun:
go ega wo doko, ragi waina euga
wo dave umai naga euga sua
garni, dapala sala vea, naga auga
6 sava pa dua ki naraeda; go euga
wo dave dausi garni, pa pa auga
wo pua lua sua ra melu dua k*
taun pano; nalakena euga w o
noa, Eu sava pa dua ki narae-


gida dapale sala vea; go auga
7 wo sava pa dua ki naraeda: go
nimu kuga wo duleana melu dua
ki nakusugoroana pano, po dape
taun: nalakena Yehova Supe
animu ega wo pitua ki nia paki
8 namelearumu. Go ega doko, ragi
waina kuga wo dape sua taun,
naga kuga tokoni taun ki
nakapu; kuga mari ega tapala
navasaana ki Yehova. . Kuga
vunusi, a po dipaki mu asa.
9 Go Yosua e dipaki lua ra pano :
go eu pano kusugoro, po doko
namawota ni Beth-el go ni Ai,
taleva' ni west ni Ai, Yosua e
inenaki napogiana wanogoe
maleoputo ni narei.
10 Go Yosua e duleana malipogi
sa, po pev© parati ki narei, po
sake pano, nara ma elder maga ni
Israel, eu pea ki narei paki Ai
11 pano. Go narei laapa, naata-
moli maga ni navakalo waina eu
•® - .
sikoti a, eu sake pano, po paki
ihaladigi, po umai paki narae ni
taun, po menaki matele ni north
ni Ai; go napalea e doko nama-
-12 wota kakana go ni Ai. Go e pila
lua naatamoli maga eu dapale
manu lima, po lawo ki da eu
kusugoro namawota ni Beth-el go
ni Ai, matele ni west ni taun.
13 Go eu lawo ki narei, taua mamau
ni navakalo waina eu doko
matele ni north ni taun, go tea
kusugoro adeara maga waina eu
doko matele ni west ni taun; go
napogiana wanogoe Yosua e paki
maleoputo ni napalea pano.
14 ‘Go e doko, ragi waina nawota
ni Ai e punusi a, naga eu mari
maraverave po duleana malipogi
sa go naatamoli maga ni taun
eu dave naga euga sua Israel paki
navakalo, nara ma narei aneana
mamau, tokora ni natatutakiana
narae ni Araba; ma nae eda atae
mau naga tea kusugoro maga eu
doko raki nia nataku ni taun.
15 Go Yosua go Israel mamau eu
mari dapale eu pei tea mari
matuakiana naraeda, go eu sava
pae napua waina e paki malo
16 palo pano. Go narei mamau
waina eu doko taun eu pei tea
soso-saisaikiana naga euga sava
dausi ra : go eu sava dausi Yosua,
go eu pei tea vuatiluaana melu
17 dua ki taun. Go naatamoli sikai
e da doko Ai kita Beth-el mau,
waina e da dave dausi Israel mau,
go eu doropusi taun e dapolaga
18 doko, po sava dausi Israel. Go
Yehova © noa ki Yosua, pa sai
ki naio waina e doko namelea-
rufna paki Ai, nalakena aga wo
pitua ki nia paki namelearuina.
Go Yosua e sai ki naio waina
e doko nafnelearuna paki taun.
19 Go tea kusugoro maga eu dule-
ana maraverave melu dua ki
tokora adeara, go eu sava ragi
waina © sai ki nafnelearuna; go
eu sili paki taun, po dape a; go
eu mari maraverave po dokoni
20 taun ki nakapu. Go naataiholi
maga ni Ai eu 1010 ki taku, po
punusi, go kuga leo, naasua ni
taun e sake paki nakoroatelagi
pano, go eu da peani nakasuaana
naga euga sava paki nea kita
nana man: go narei waina eu
sava paki malo palo pano eu
dumada doa ra paki tea sava
21 dausi ra maga. Go ragi waina
Yosua go tea laapa ni Israel eu
punusi naga tea kusugoro maga
eu dape sua taun, go naga
naasua ni taun e sake, ragi wano-
goe eu liliu po mari punue naata-
-22 moli maga ni Ai. Go tea pota
maga eu dave melu dua ki taun
naga euga sua ra; go eu doko
maleoputo ni Israel, seara eu
doko matele waia, go seara eu
doko matele kerua, go eu pokati
ra, pa pa pa eu da madeara doro-
pusi tea sikai waina e mauri
doko kita waina e sava pano mau.


23 Go eu puati nawota ni Ai e mauri
doko, po piragi a umai punusi
24 Yosua. Go e doko, ragi waina
Israel eu mari punue sua tea
laapa waina eu doko Ai (eu mari
ra) malo, palo, waina eu sava
dausi fa asa, go tea laapa eu dowo
ki namena ni lova pa pa eu dika,
naga tea laapa ni Israel eu liliu
paki Ai'po pdkati a ki namena
25 ni lova. Go tea laapa waina eu
dowo naaleatia wanogoe, naanoai
maga go nagoroi maga, eu pei
rualima ni manu dolu tamate
kakana e dua. Naatamoli laapa
26 ni Ai. Nalakena Yosua © da
dosagi liliu ki naaruna mau,
waina e sai ki naio asa, pa pa

27 eu doko Ai. Ma katel maga go
nalo vutiluapavakotoana maga in

pale navasaana ki Yehova waina-
-28 e dipaki Yosua asa. Go Yosua
e daparaki Ai, po mari a e pei
taua palo patoko sikai, go malo
maladi sikai pa pa paki masoso
29 waia. Go e likoti nawota ni Ai
e dau nakau dau paki ragi melu ;
go ragi waina elo e musu Yosua e
pitipaki, naga euga dape napa-
tokona siwo melu dua ki nakau,
po nadi ki nia pisari namasova
ni namata pUa ni taun po sike
daua ki dapaugoro e taua lapa
sikai ni vatu maga asa (waina e
doko), pa pa masoso waia.

wodo sikai agi Yehova, Supe ki
31 Israel, doko tava ni Ebal, dapale
waina Moses tea suasua ki Ye-
liova e dipaki Israel natuna maga
asa, dapale waina e pei tea
midiriana tusi ni nawotaeana ki

maga, waina te naata e da dape
dakati te karau paki ara mau ; go
eu pitua ki naviriana taparakiana
maga asa paki Yehova, po mari
punue naviriana maga ni nata-
-32 mateana. Go e midiri tokora
wanogoe doko vatu maga tea
vataka sikai ni nawotaeana. ki
Moses, waina e midiri a narae
33 ni Israel natuna maga. Go
Israel laapa, go elder adeara
maga, go tea vasa. potae adeara
maga, eu lawodu matele waia go
matele kerua ni ark narae ni tea
viri maga naworawora ni Levi,
waina eu pauvausi ark ni navasa-
sokiana ki Yehova, nafnenaki ma
naata toko eu marua; namagovai
kakada paki kivea ni tava
Cerizim, go namagovaii' kakada
paki kivea ni Ebal; dapale waina
Moses tea suasua ki Yehova ©
pitipaki sua asa, naga euga vasa
mataki narei ni Israel ega vea.
34 Go edaku ki tea wanogoe e pove
sara navasaana laapa ni navotae-

sakiana, dapale sara naleo waina
e pei tea midiriana tusi ni
35 nawotaeana. Navasaana e da
doko mau ni sara naleo waina
Moses e pitipaki asa, waina

nasaisaiana mamau ni Israel, go
nagoroi maga go nakariki maga,
go namenaki maga waina eu
surata maleoputo kakada.
