YOSUA E GOKOI NAVANUA.
1 Go tea maga waia eu pei tea
veani-piolikiana waina Israel
natuna eu dape ra navanua ni
Kanaan, waina Eliezar tea viri,
go Yosua natu ni Nun, go napau
ni tea matua maga ni nawora-
wora maga ni Israel natuna
2 maga, eu madeara dapotae ra,
pae gole ni tea veani-piolikiana
adeara, dapale waina Yehova e
pitipaki asa pae naru ni Moses,
agi naworawora , loveti, go agi
namagovai ni naworawora sikai.
3 Nalakena Moses e pitua ki sua
tea veanipiolikiana ki nawora-
wora dua go ki namagovai ni na-
worawora sikai matele kerua ni
Yordan: ma e da pitua ki
tea veanipiolikiana sikai paki
nawofawora ni Levi maleoputo
4 kakada mau. Nalakena Yosef
natuna maga eu pei naworawora
dua, Manasse go Efraim ; go eu
da pitua kite matele sikai doko
navanua paki naworawora ni
Levi, ma taun maga mau, naga
euga toko ara, go napega kakada
maga agi kattel maga go agi tea
5 veaniana adeara maga. Dapale
'waina Yehova e dipaki Moses
asa, Israel natuna maga eu mari
dapale nogoe, eu dapotawotae na-
vanua.
6 Go Yuda natuna maga eu
rumai paki maladigi ki Yosua
Cilcal: go Kaleb natu ni Yefunne
nawora ni Kenez e noa ki nia,
Nigo ko atae naleo waina Yehova
e pasa ki Moses, naataiholi ki
Supe, asa, nalo' kakagu go nalo
kakarna ragi waina toro doko
7 Kadesli-barnea. Natan aginau
e pei rualima pati ragi waina
Moses tea suasua ki Yehova ®
dipaki lua au hielu dua ki
Kadesh-barnea, naga aga 1®
pavaraka navanua: go a mane-
ana dape navasaana liliu urnai
dapale waina e doko napo-
-8 pogu. Ma taigu maga waina
eu marua sake pano eu roan
napopo ni narei e sara;
kinau a dausi Yehova Sup®
9 aginau ki napopo mamau.
Moses e pasa sokisoki naaleatia
wanogoe, e noa, Lomau navanua
waina nafneleT’ha e pasi a ega vei
tea veani-piolikiana anigo go agi
natuiha maga pa pa ega vatok®>
nalakena ko dausi Yehova Sup®
10 aginau ki napopo mamau.
ragi waia, pa leo, Yehova e sil® 6
au a mauri doko dapale waiua ®


pasa asa, natau rualima pati
tamate lima waia, pae ragi
waina Yehova e pasa navasaana
wanogoe paki Moses pa pa, ragi
waina Israel e surata malo palo ;
go ragi waia, pa leo, natau agi-
nau eu pei rualima latolu tamate
lima masoso waia.
11 A casua doko masoso dapale
naaleatia waina Moses e dipaki
lua au asa: dapale waina naka-
suaana aginau e doko ragi wano
goe, nakasuaana aginau e dapale
nogoe doko ragi waia, nalo ni

12 go naga aga liliu umai. Go tea
wanogoe pa tua au tava waia,
waina Yehova e pasa asa naale-
atia wanogoe: nalakena nigo ko
dogoe naaleatia wanogoe naga
naatamoli domo lapa maga eu
doko asa, go taun lapa maga
waina eu pei tea paka-goroana;
waina Yehova e pe sikoti au, go
aga wo capasi lua ra, dapale
13 waina Yehova e pasa asa. Go
Yosua e pasa mataki nia ; go e
pitua ki Hebron paki Kaleb natu
ni Yefunne naga ega vei tea
14 veanipiolikiana sikai. Nalakena
tea wanogoe Hebron e po pei tea
veanipiolikiana ki Kaleb natu ni
Yefunne nawora ni Kenez pa pa
laaleatia waia; nalakena e dausi
Yehova Supe ki Israel ki napopo
15 mamau. Go sala vea nagisa ni
Hebron e pei Kiriat-arbe, Arbe
wanogoe e pei naatamoli lapa
sikai maleoputo ni naatamoli
domo lapa maga. Go natamate
& on© navanua.
1 Go gole agi naworawora ni
Yuda natuna maga pae naworada
maga e doko paki kokoi ki Edom,
Paki malo palo ni Zin paki south,
pisari namata pago ni uvea ni
‘ south. Go kokoi ni south adeara
© doko pae namata pago ni .uvea
ni ’ Natasi ni Natasemena pae
napolulua waina e 1010 paki
5 south.: Go kokoi ni ist e pet
Natasi ni Natasimena pa pa paki
namata pago ni Yordan. Go
kokoi ni matele ni north e pae
napolulua ni natasi pisari
8 namata pago ni Yordan; go
kokoi e sake pae napalea ni
natu ni Hinnom paki matele
ni naworawora ni Yebus paki
south (nae e pei Yerusalem).
12 Go kokoi ni west e paki natasi
lapa go kokoi kakana. Tea wano-
goe e pei kokoi ni Yuda natuna
maga davivi pae naworada maga.
63 Go nalo ni naworawora ni Yebus
waina eu doko Yerusalem doko,
Yuda natuna maga eu mari sa
capasi lua ra mau: ma nawora-
wora ni Yebus eu doko sikoti
Yuda natuna maga Yerusalem
doko pa pa paki masoso waia.

1 Go Yosua e soso naworawora
ni Reubin, go naworawora ni
Cad, go namagovai ni nawora-
wora ni Manasse, po noa ki da,
2 Nimu ku pavaegoro tea laapa
waina Moses tea suasua ki Ye-
hova e dipaki mu asa, go ku dogo
parati ki nadaleogu, nalo ni tea
laapa waina a dipaki mu asa.
3 Ku da doropusi taimu naaleatia
laapa waina pa pa paki naaleatia
waia mau, ma ku pavaigoro
navavaigoroana ni natipakiana ki
4 Yehova Supe animu. Go ragi
waia Yehova Supe animu e po
pitua ki namaromaroana paki
taimu maga dapale waina e pasa
ki da asa: go tea wanogoe kuga
tuihamu doa mu, go kuga vano
paki tapaupau animu maga, paki
natano ni naveaniana animu,
waina Moses tea suasua ki Ye-
hova e dua mu asa matele kerua
sdi Yordan. Ma kuga vavaigoro
parati ki nia naga kuga mari
natipakiana go nawotaeana,
waina Moses tea suasua ki Ye-
hova e dipaki mu asa, naga kuga
dodumi Yehova Supe animu, go
naga kuga surata pae napua
laapa aneana, go naga kuga
vavaigoro natipakiana aneana
maga, go naga kuga vululi a, go
naga kuga maneana suasua ki
napopomu mamau go ki naatamu
6 mamau. Go Yosua © pasa ihataki
da, po dipaki lua ra: go eu pano
paki tapaupau adeara maga.

ISRAEL NATUNA MAGA EU
DOROPUSI SUPE.
11 Go Israel natuna maga eu mari
tea waina e sa namata ni Ye-
12 hova, po magi Baal suasua: go
eu doropusi Yehova, Supe ki
tamada maga, waina e piragi
lua ra melu dua ki navanua ni
Ecipt umai, go eu dausi supe
pota maga, supe maga seara
kakada ki nalauna maga waina
eu doko davivigoro ra, po suai
natano paki-da: go eu mari Ye-
-13 hova e maeto. Go eu doropusi
Yehova, po magi Baal go
14 Astaroth maga suasua. Go
namaetoana ki Yehova e pavaga
dipa Israel, go. e pitua ki-da paki
namelearu ni tea tapepavakoto
maga waina eu. dape pavakoto
ara, go e sori ra paki namelearu
ni tea kokona ki-da maga davivi,
go eu mari sa moro lawodu narae
15 ni tea kokona ki-da maga. Sara
tokora waina eu dave paki asa,
namelearu ni Yehova e doko ara
paki nasaana, dapale waina Ye-
hova e pasa sua asa, go dapale
waina Yehova e pasa sokisoki sua
paki-da asa; go eu pei tea
16 riesokiana lapalapa sa. Go Ye-
hova e sike tea vasapotae maga
eu doko, waina eu mauti ra
iheludua ki namelearu ni tea
maga waina eu dape pavakoto
ara.
18 Go ragi waina Yehova e
madeara sike tea vasapotae maga
eu doko, ragi wanogoe Yehova e
doko sikoti tea vasapotae, po
mauti ra meludua ki namelearu
ni tea kokona ki-da maga naale-
atia laapa ki tea vasapotae: nala-
kena Yehova e madeara midoaki
piri nalakena nagigiana adeara
maga nalakena tea maga waina
eu diesoki ra po dosivaki da.
19 Ma e doko, ragi waina tea vasa-
potae e mate, naga eu liliu, po
mari sa sa lapalapa liu tamada
maga, nalo ni waina eu dausi supe
pota maga naga euga madeara
suasua, go naga euga suai
natano paki-da; eu da makoto
ki namariana adeara maga mau,
go ki napaua kasua adeara mau.

pano po mari Israel, go eu dape
parati ki natokoana ni paam
14 maga. Go Israel natuna maga
eu magi Eclon nawota ni Moab
suasua natau rualima sikai
15 tamate latolu. Go Israel natuna
maga eu pioso paki Yehova, go
Yehova e madeara sike tea mau-
mau sikai e duleana, Ehud natu
ni Cera, nawora ni Benyamin,
naataiuoli sikai waina e pei mau.
31 Go edaku ki nia Shamcar, waina
e pokati Eilistine maga ponotia
latesa ki tea tipa ni bulok sikai.
73,
DEBORA MA BARAK ERO
MAUTI ISRAEL.
1 Go Israel natuna maga eu moro
mari tea waina e sa namata ni
Yehova ragi waina Ehud e mate.
2 Go Yehova -e sori ra paki namele-
aru ni Yebin, nawota ni Kanaan,
waina e maramara doko Hazor;
go tea maraki taua ni naataiholi
3 navakalo aneana e pei Sisera. Go

Yehova; nalakena e peani kart
ni airoh ponotia loviti ; go nae e

maga natau rualima dua.

sua anigo; go ragi waia aga wo

paki namelearu ni tea maga
waina eu da pei tea tovataviviana
19 mau. Ma Supe eda porae tokora
sikai waina e pei inoru waina e
doko Lehi, go noai e dave melu
dua ki nia; go e munu, go
naatana e liliu, go e moro mauri :
20 Go e pasapotae Israel naaleatia
maga ki Filistine maga natau
rualima dua.
1 Go Samson e paka Caza, go
2 (e pei tea noasaiana) paki naka
ni Caza, ©u noa, Samson © po
umai paki nea. Go eu davivigoro
e, po cusugoro e napogiana
mamau pisari namata-pua ni
natokoana, go eu dataihate
napogiana mamau, eu noa (Ega
toko), pa pa paki namarama ni
malipogi, go tuga wo mari punue
3 a. Go Samson e one pa pa paki
pogi matua, go e duleana pogi
matua, po puati nakokoro dua ni
namata pua ni natokoana, go
post dua ni namata pua, po paku
dokati ra pilaki tea waladagoto
po doropusi ra pauna dua, po
dape ra sake paki namasua ni
tava waina e doko ki vea ki
4 Hebron. Go e doko edaku ki tea
wanogoe naga e dodumi nagoroi
sikai waina e doko napalea ni
Sorek, waina nagisana Dalila.
5 Go nawota maga ki Filistine
maga eu sake umai punusi
(Delila) po noa ki nia, pa vasa
surusurue a, po punusi nakasua-
ana aneana e lapalapa dapale
sava, go naga auga mari atae mari
matua ki nia, naga auga soli a
naga au mari a ega rogoki teesa
ega tapale sava: go sara naata
kakagami auga wo.dua ko matele
ni silver manu sikai go ponotia
6 takuna- sikai. Go Delila e noa
ki Samson, pa noakisai au, a
pavarani ko asa, nakasuaana
anigo e lapalapa dapale sava, go
ko pe wo pei tea soliana dapale
sava naga eu pe mari ko ko pe
7 dogokiteesa. Go Samson e noa
ki nia, eu pe soli au ki natali
mata larua waina eu da pei tea
vagaraeana mau, go aga wo
manainai, go aga wo dakiusi
8 naatamoli pota sikai. Go nawota
maga ki Filistine maga eu mane-
ana dape natali mata larua sake
umai waina eu da pei tea vaga-
9 raeana mau, go e soli a ara. Go
tea kusugoro maga eu sikoti a
doko emago tukituki. Go e noa
ki nia, Filistine maga eu sigoro
ko, Samson. Go e puticotovi
natali maga, dapale tred ni linen
e pei tea vuticotoviana raga
waina e kisidogo nakapu; go


nakasuaana aneana e da pel tea
10 ataeana mau. Go Delila c noa
ki Samson, pa leo, ko paka mala-
mala ki nau, po pasa paki nau
nasalisaliana maga : ragi waia pa
noaki sai au, a pavarani ko asa,
pa wo pei tea soliana dapale
11 sava. Go e noa ki nia, Eu pe
soli soki au ki namsa vaou maga
waina te nawosiana seara e da
pea pei tea mariana -ara-mau, go
aga wo manainai, go aga wo
dakiusi naatariioli pota sikai.
12 Go Delila e dape namea vaou
maga po soli a ara, po noa ki
nia, Filistine maga eu sigoro ko,
Samson. Go tea kusugoro maga
eu doko emago tukituki. Go e
puti cotovi ra melu dua ki
naaruna dua dakiusi eu pe vei
13 tred inoli sikai. Go Delila e noa
ki Samson, Ko do paka malamala
ki nau pa pa paki ragi waia, po
do pasa nasalisaliana maga mau
paki nau: pa noakisai au, pa wo
pei tea soliana dapale sava 1 Go
e noa ki nia, Ko pe vausi navuti
lolu larua ni napaugu paki
14 navauana. Go e mari soki aki
nel, po noa ki nia, Filistine maga
eu sigoro ko, Samson. Go e leleo
• ki namaturuana aneana go e paku
15 lua nel ni bim, go navauana. Go
e noa ki nia, E dapale sava ko
noa, A dodumi ko. ragi waina
napopoma e da sikoti au mau 1
ko paka malamala ki nau paka
dolu waia, go ko da noakisai au
mau nalakena waina nakasuaana
16 anigo e lapalapa. Go e doko,
ragi waina e do diesoki pavarani
ki navasaana aneana maga sara
naaletia. po pasa die dali ki nia
asa naga naatana e pei tea pili-
-17 vilikiteana paki namateana, go
e noakisai a napopona mamau,
po noa ki nia Tea koikoi sikai e
da paki napaugu mau; nalakena
kinau e pei Nazarite sikai ki
Supe pae napale ni pilagu pa pa;
a pe vei tea koikoiana, go naka-
suaana aginau ega wo melu dua
ki nau pane, go aga wo manainai,
po dakiusi naatanioli pota maga.
18 Go ragi waina Delila e punusi
naga e po noakisai a napopona
mamau, e dipaki lua po soso
nawota maga ki Filistine maga,
e naga, paka sikaimaau waia,
nalakena e po noakisai au napo-
pona mamau. Go nawota maga
ki Filistine maga eu sake umai
punusi a, po dape moni wanogoe
19 sake e doko namelearuda. Go e
mari a e maturu one napatuana;
go e soso naatanioli sikai: go
navutilolu larua ni napauna eu
pei tea koiluaana: go e dalake
pilivilikiti a, go nakasuaana ane-
-20 ana e nielu dua ki nia pane. Go
e noa, Filistine maga eu sigoro
ko, Samson. Go e leleo meludua
ki namaturuana aneana, po noa,
Aga tave ragi waia ega tapale
sala vea maga, po dumagu paru-
varu lua au. Ma eda atae naga
Yehova e po melu dua ki nia
pano.

a, po asiri lua namatana dua;

po soli a ki natali dua ni bras:
go e do mani (korn) ekopu ni
22 nasuma ni nasolisoliana. Ma
nalolutaa e dalake moro ulua pae

-23 luaana. Go nawota maga ki

E I'UA
LUA NAKOKOKO Nl NAMATA NI CAZA PANO (76).


mari punue (naatamoli) laapa
25 kakagida. Go e doko ragi waina
napopoda e laelaea, naga eu noa,
Kuga soso Samson, naga ega
manigida mari kalakala. Go eu
soso Samson dave nasuma ni
nasolisoliana; go e mari kalakala
naraeda : go eu lawo ki nia nama-
-26 sova ni tipa maga. Go Samson
e noa ki natureai waina e do
puati a.ki namelearuna, pa toro
au naga aga tovidogo tipa maga
waina nasuma e doko asa, naga
aga ovi ara. Go nasuma e pura
ki naatamoli naanoai go nago-
roi: go nawota laapa ki Filistine
maga eu doko tokora wanogoe;
go naanoai go nagoroi (naveveana
kakada) e pisari manu dolu waina
eu doko namasua ni nasuma, go
waina eu do leo punusi ragi
waina Samson e do mari kalakala.
28 Go Samson e pioso paki Yehova,
po noa, Nawota Yehova O, pa
midoaki nau, a pavarani ko asa,
go pa mari au aga kasua, a pava-
rani ko asa, paka sikaimaau
waia, Supe O, naga aga tumagu
maginau mari nasikoana sikai
paki Filistine maga nalakena
29 namatagu dua. Go Samson e pua
soki tipa dua ni maleoputo waina
nasuma e doko ara, go e ovi ara,
sikai ki naruna ni matua go
30 kerua ni naruna ni mau. Go
Samson e noa, A masauna aga
mate sikoti Filistine maga, go e
pelu ki tipa dua ki nakasuaana
mamau ancana; go nasuma e
dowo paki nawota maga, go paki
narei laapa waina eu doko asa.
Go tea mate maga waina e mari
punue ra ragi ni namateana ane-
ana eu laapa liu tea maga waina
e mari punue ra ragi ni namauri-
-31 ana aneana. Go taina maga go
tea laapa ni nasuma ki tamana
eu siwo umai; eu dape lua e, po
dape a sake, go eu ovaki nia e
one namasova ni Zora go ni
Estaol e one matigo ki tamana
Manoa.
NATUKUNOA NI RUTH.
1 Go e doko naaleatia maga
waina tea vasapotae maga eu do
pasapotae, naga navitoloana sikai
e doko navanua. Go naatamoli
sikai ni Beth-lehem-yuda e pano
naga ega menaki-atatoko nava-
nua ki Moab, nara ma anagoroi
2go natuna naanoai dua. Go
nagisa ni naatamoli wanogoe
Elimelek, go nagisa ni anagoroi
Naomi. Go nagisa ni natuna
naanoai dua Malon go Kilion, eu
pei tea ni Efrat ni Beth-lehem-
yuda. Go eu rumai paki nava-
nua ki Moab, po doko asa doko.
3 Go Elimelek Naomi anawota e
mate ; go nae e pei tea toropusi-
duakiana, nara ma natuna
4 naanoai dua. Go ero dumada
madeara piragi nagoroi maga ni
Moab; nagisa ni tea sikai Orpa,
go nagisa ni kerua Ruth: go eu
doko tokora wanogoe doko natau
5 e alagoro pei rualima sikai. Go
Malon go Kilion ero dua mate;
go nagoroi wanogoe e pei tea
toropusi-duakiana ki natuna dua
go ki anawota.
6 Go e duleana, nara ma sulina
dua, naga ega liliu melu dua ki
navanua ki Moab pano : nalakena
e dogo navanua ki Moab, naga
Yehova e umai punusi narei ane-
ana naga ega tua ra navinaga.
7 Go e pano melu dua ki tokora
waina e doko asa doko, go sulina
dua ero sikoti a pano: go eu
surata pae napua pano naga
euga liliu paki navanua ki Yuda.
8 Go Naomi e noa ki sulina dua,
Koroga vano, koroga liliu paki
nasuma ki pilamu maga pano:
Yehova ega mari nadodumi-
ana paki mu ega tapale waina
koro mari a paki tea mate maga.


9go paki nau. Yehova ega tua
mu naga koroga vasai namaro-
maroana doko nasuma ki amu-
wota dua. Go e diinoli ra; go
10 eu sike nadaleoda, po dagi. Go
ero noa ki nia, Ee, ma aroga wo
liliu sikoti ko paki narei anigo
11 pano. Go Naomi e noa, Koroga
13 liliu, natugu nagoroi dua, eca-
sana koroga sikoti au pano ? ee
natugu nagoro dua: nalakena a
susue lapalapa nalakena nimu,
nalakena naihelearu ni Yehova e
dave dipa au.
14 Go eu sike nadaleoda po moro
dagi; go Orpa e dimili tuana;
15 ma Ruth e puluti a. Go e noa,
pa leo, taifna e po liliu paki narei
aneana go paki supe aneana
pano: pa liliu dausi taima pano.
16 Go Ruth e noa, pa ta pasa die
au mau naga aga toropusi ko, go
naga aga liliu pa-dua ki narausi-
ko-ana: nalakena tokora waina
nigo pa wo doko asa, kinau aga
wo paki asa: go tokora waina
pa wo menaki asa, aga wo menaki
asa; narei anigo euga wo pei
narei aginau, go Supe anigo e pei
17 Supe aginau: tokora waina nigo
pa wo mate asa, kinau aga wo
mate asa, go tokora wanogoe aga
wo pei tea ovaki-ana asa: Ye-
hova ega wo mari dapale nogoe
paki nau, go ega do mari a, waina
navatuna pota ma namateana ega
18 mari gida toroga vamawota. Go
waina e punusi naga e midoaki
sokisoki a naga ega sikoti a pano,
e makoti ki navasaana paki nia.
19 Go ero dua surata pano pa pa
ero umai paki Beth-lehem. Go ©
doko, ragi waina ero umai sua
paki Beth-lehem, naga natokoana
mamau e pari nalakena nara, go
nagoroi maga eu noa, Tea waia
20 e pei Naomi, kita? Go e noa
ki-da, Kuga ta soso au ki Naomi
. mau, kuga soso au ki Mara:
nalakena tea Kasua mau e mari
namauriana aginau e cokona sa.
21 Kinau a pura dave pano, go Ye-
hova piragi au a palo liliu umai:
ecasana ku soso au ki Naomi,
ragi waina Yehova e noa soki-
soki dipa au, go Tea Kasua mau
22 e pilivilikiti au ? Go Naomi e
liliu, go sulina Ruth, nagoroi ni
Moab, e sikoti a, waina e liliu
melu dua ki navanua ki Moab;
go ero umai paki Beth-lehem ragi
ni nadalakeana ni natagaucotovi-
ana ni barli.
1 Go Naomi e peani tana sikai
waina e pei namatarau ki ana-
wota, naatamoli warua sikai, ni
nawora ki Elimelek; go nagisana
2 Boaz. Go Ruth, nagoroi ni

vanua pano, a pavarani ko asa,
po pivila inaleoputo ni ihokai
maga ni korn dausi tea waina aga
wo pasai nasaupiaana namatana.
Go o noa ki nia, pa vano natugu
3 nagoroi. Go e pano, po umai
po pivila vanua dausi tea
tagaucotovi maga, go e maneana
lolomana naga e pasai matele ni

waina e pei tea ni nawora ki

waina naata sikai e lo atae tana.
Go e noa, Ega ta pei tea ataeana
mau naga nagoroi e umai paki

tape! umai 'sugoro kovagoro waina
e doko ako, go pa vuasoki a; go

latesa ni barli, po doropusi a e

tuana, go e noa, Nigo ko pei sei

a sara naleo waina naatamoli
17 wanogoe e maneana mari a. Go
© noa, Totowo latesa waia e tua
au asa; nalakena e noa, pa ta
palo pano punusi tuama man.

nagoroi, pa pa pa wo atae dapale
waina naleo waia ega wo dowo:
nalakena naatamoli wanogoe ega
wo da maromaro mau, pa pa ega
wo mari sua naleo waia' masoso.

1 Go naatamoli maga ni Kiriath-
yearim eu rumai po piragi ark
ki Yehova sake ©u puati a paki
nasuma ki Abinadab waina e
doko tava, go eu dapugoro
Eleazar, natuna naanoai, naga
ega lo pararati ki ark ki Yehova.
2 Go © doko naga pa© naaleatia
waina ark e pei tea toroana e
doko Kiriath-yearim naga e pei
ragi varau; nalakena e doko asa
natau rualima dua: go nasuma
ni Israel mamau eu marousu
dagisi Yehova.
3 Go Samuel e pasa ki nasuma
mamau ni Israel, e naga, ku pe
liliu paki Yehova ki napopomu
mamau, go kuga toropusi. supe

ihelu dua ki maleoputo kakamu,
go kuga mari iuataki napopomu
paki Yehova, go kuga xnaneana
masikinia suasua: go nae ega
wo mauti mu pa dua ki namele-
-4 aru ni Filistine maga. Go Israel
natuna maga eu dape lua Baal
maga go napea maga, go eu magi
5 Yehova masikinia suasua. Go
Samuel © noa, Kuga saisai ki

kinau aga manimu dapasavasa

Mizpa, go eu pautui noai, go eu

NAWORAWORA NI ISRAEL EU
MASAU KIG SIKAI.

sikai tokora wanogoe.
1 Go e doko ragi waina Samuel

pa maginami sike kig sikai
dakiusi naiauna laapa waina ega
vasa potae garni.

eu noa, pa tua garni kig sikai

ISRAEL EU MARI MATUA
FILISTINE MAGA PAE'
NAMELEARU NI SUPE.
1 Go e doko naaleatia sikai, naga
Jonatan, natu ni Saul e noa ki
natureai aneana waina e mane-
ana dape nearu, e naga, pa
umai, toroga tuagoto paki tapau-
pauana ki Filistine maga waina
eu doko matele kerua. Ma eda
2 noa ki tamana asa m'au. Go
Saul e doko namata pagona-mau
ni Cibea, melu ni pomegranate,
waina e doko Micron: go narei
waina eu sikoti a nalaapaana
adeara eu alagoro eu pei naata-
moli ponotia latesa.
3 Go Ahiya, natu ni Ahitub e
pilaki efod sikai. Go narei eu
da atae naga Yonatan e pane
4 sua. Go namawota waina
Yonatan e laaga naga ega
tuagot asa, paki natapaupauana
ki Filistine maga napatira sikai
e doko matele waia go napatira
sikai e doko matele kerua: go
nagisa ni sikai e pei Bozez, g°
nagisa ni kerua e pei Sene.
5 Napau ni napatira sikai ©
duleana matele ni north narae
ni Michmash, go kerua e duleana
6 matele narae ni Ceba. Go
Yonatan e noa ki natureai
waina e maneana dape nearu, ©
naga, pa umai, go toroga tuagoto
paki natapaupauana ki tea tika
natovataviviana maga waia: ©P e
wo doko naga Yehova ega wo
manigida posiwosi: nalakena Ye-
hova © da gona ki nalaapaana
kita ki navisamauana waina ©
7 mari atae mauti asa. Go tea
maneana dape nearu e noa ki
nia, e naga, pa mari sara nale©
8 waina e doko napopoma. G©
Yonatan e noa, pa leo, toroga
tuagoto pa punusi naatafhoh


maga wanogoe po doko lina ki
9 da. Eu pe noa ki-gida dapale
nea, eu pe naga, Koroga toko
dorogo pa pa auga va punusi mu ;
go nigida toroga lawodu dorogo
tokora waina toro doko asa, go
10 toroga ta sake punusi ra. Ma
eu pe noa dapale nea, eu pe naga,
Koroga sake punusi garni; go
toroga wo sake: nalakena Ye-
hova e pitua ki-da paki namelea-
rugida; go tea wanogoe ega
wo manigida pei navaivaiana
11 kakana. Go ero dua pa doko lina
ki natapaupauana ki Filistine
maga: go Filistine maga eu naga,
Kuga leo, Hebru maga eu po
dave umai melu dua ki inoru
maga waina eu curukuru ara.
12 Go naatamoli maga ni natapau-
pauana eu pasa dara Yonatan
go tea tape nearu aneana, ©u
naga, Koroga sake umai punusi
garni, go kinami auga wo pisei
ki mu navatuna sikai. Go
Yonatan e noa ki tea tape nearu
aneana, e naga, pa sake umai
dausi au; nalakena Yehova e
pitua ki-da paki namelearu ni
13 Israel. Go Yonatan © pagi sake
ki namelearuna go ki natuana:
go tea tape nearu aneana e dausi
a: go eu dowo narae ni Yonatan;
go'tea tape nearu aneana e dausi
14 a po poka punue ra. Go
nawokatiana vea wanogoe waina
Yonatan go tea tape nearu ane-
ana ero mari a, naatamoli eu
alagoro pei rualima dua (eu
mate) malo (kiki) sikai dakiusi
namagovae ni navara sisiana ni
15 eker ni natano. Go narururuana
e doko natapaupauana, vanua,
go sari narei laapa; go tea vavae
go tea tape pavakoto nara ma
eu durururu: go natano e pari-
vari; dapale nogoe e pei naruru-
-16 ruana warua sikai © doko. Go
tea vavae ki Saul waina eu doko
Cibea ni Benyamin eu leo punusi
a, go, kuga leo, nalaapaana eu
do siri puoli, eu pevera paki sara
tokora.
17 Go Saul e noa ki naatamoli
maga waina eu sikoti a, e naga,
kuga veve parati ki naatamoli,
po atae sei waina e dave pa dua
kigida pano. Go ragi waina eu
peve parati ki sua, go kuga leo,
Yonatan go tea vua nearu ane-
-18 ana ero da doko. Go Saul e
noa ki Ahiya, pa viragi ark ki
Supe umai. Nalakena ark ki
Sup© e sikoti Israel doko ragi
19 wanogoe. Go e doko, ragi waina
Saul e do pasa ki tea viri, naga
namaparaeana waina © doko
natapaupauana ki Filistine maga
e do lavulavu: go Saul e noa ki
20 tea viri, e naga, Ega toko. Go
Saul go naatamoli laapa waina
eu sikoti a eu saisai, go eu rumai
paki navakalo : go kuga leo, lova
ki sara naata e dipa tana, go c
21 pei natapiriana lapa sikai. Go
Hebru maga waina eu ko do
sikoti Filistine maga, waina eu
sake pano paki natapaupauana,
go waina eu pevera doko, nara
ma eu duinada doa ra po puluti
Israel maga waina eu sikoti Saul
22 go Yonatan. Dapale nogoe
naatamoli ni Israel laapa waina
eu curukuru malo ni tava ni
Efraim, ragi waina eu dogo naga
Filistine maga eu sava, nara ma
eu mari casua dausi ra paki nava-
-23 kalo. Dapale nogoe Yehova e
mauti Israel naaleatia waina; go
navakalo e duagoto jpano pae
24 Beth-aven. Go naatamoli maga
ni Israel eu mawosa sa naaleatia
wanogoe, ma Saul e mari ra eu
pasa sokisoki, © naga, Te naata
waina © pe kani navinaga pa pa
ragi melu ega vei tea vasasakiana,
pa pa a mari nasikoana paki tea
kokona ki nau. Go te naata
seara eu da ganikani.


47 Go ragi waina Saul 6 dape
parati ki namarakiana dapau
Israel, e dipa navakalo paki tea
kokona ki nia laapa paki sara
matele, paki Moab, go paki
Ammon natuna maga, go paki
Edom, go paki kig maga ni Zoba,
go paki Filistine maga, sara
tokora waina e dumana doa e
paki asa, e parati sa sa ki-da.
48 Go e mari casua, go e mari
Amalekite maga, go e mauti
Israel ki namelearu ni tea maga
52 waina eu mari sa ki-da. Go
navakalo paki Filistine maga e
do casua sara naaleatia ki Saul:
go ragi waina Saul e punusi
naatamoli kasua sikai, kita tea
mari matua sikai, e pua parati
ki nia.
SAUL E PEI TEA TIPA-
DOAANA.
1 Samuel e noa ki Saul, e naga,
Yehova e dipaki lua au naga
aga sasaru-pusake ko kig dapau
naatamoli aneana, dapau Israel:
tea waina pa wo daki dorogo
nadaleo ni navasaana maga ki
2 Yehova. Yehova ni nalaapaana
e noa dapale nea, e naga, A dape
sogi ni tea waina Amalek e man
a paki Israel, dapale waina e
cusu-goro e napua, ragi waina e
3 pae Ecipt sake umai. Tea waina
pa vano mari Amalek, go pa
mari sa sa ki sara naleo waina
eu peani a, go pa ta mauti ra
mau, ma pa mari punue naanoai
go nagoroi, pipia go tea eusu,
4 bulok go shiip, kamel go as. Go
Saul e soso saisai ki narei, po
peve parati ki da Telaim, eu pei
ponotia ni manu dua ni tea
surata, go tea ni Yuda eu pei
5 manu rualima sikai. Go Saul e
umai paki taun ki Amalek, go eu
7 cusu goro doko naualea. Go Saul
e mari Amalekite maga pae
Havila pa pa paki Shur waina
8 e doko ki vea ki Ecipt. Go e
pua Acac kig ki Amalekite maga

9 lova. Ma Saul go naatainoli

wia maga kaka ni shiip, go ni

go lam maga, go sara naleo waina

mari sa sa ki da: ma sara naleo

e sa, tea wanogo© eu mari sa sa
ki nia.

83.
DAVID E PEI TEA MATADOA-
ANA EGA VEI KIG.
1 Go Yehova e noa ki Samuel,
e naga, pa anu sa nalakena Saul
paki seve ragi, waina ko punusi
a piroa ki nia ega ta maramara
dapau Israel? ua vaka vuro ki
napati anigo ki naroro go pa
vano, aga wo dipaki lua ko pa
punusi Yesse, naatamoli ni
Bethlehem : nalakena a maginau
piragi kig sikai kaka ni natuna
4 naanoai maga. Go Samuel e
mari tea waina Yehova e noa e,


O o e umai ki Bethlehem. Go
elder maga ni taun eu pa sua e,
eu durururu, po noa, Ko umai
5 ki nataihateana, kita ? Go e noa,
Ki natamateana: a umai naga
aga mari naviriana paki Yehova :
kuga tumamu dapugoro mu, go
kuga sikoti au paki naviriana.
Go e dapugoro Yesse go natuna
naanoai maga, go e soso ra paki
naviriana.
6 Go e doko, ragi waina eu rumai
sua e 1010 paki Eliab, po noa, E
alagoro tea sasaru pusakeana ki
7 Yehova e doko naraena. Ma Ye-
hova e noa ki Samuel, e naga,
pa ta midoaki nalomatakiana ni
namatana, kita navarauana ni
napatokona,; nalakena a piroa ki
nia: nalakena Yehova e da lo
potae dakiusi naatamoli e lo
potae; nalakena naatamoli e 1010
paki tea waina e pisigoro, ma
10 Yehova e 1010 paki napopo. Go
Yesse e mari natuna naanoai eu
larua eu liu pano narae ni
Samuel. Go Samuel e noa ki
Yesse, e naga, Yehova e da mata-
-11 doa tea maga waia. Go Samuel
e noa ki Yesse, Natuiha ri waia,
kita? Go nae e noa, Takariki e
ko doko, go, pa leo, e do lo
parati ki shiip. Go Samuel ■ e
noa ki Yesse, pa tipaki lua po
puati a umai: tuga ta doko
davivi ni (tebel) pa pa paki waina
nae ega umai paki tokora waia.
12 Go e dipaki lua po puati a umai.
Go naraena e miala pia, go
namatana ma e pei rae wia pa,
go e pei tea 10-matatakiana. Go
Yehova e noa, pa tuleana, pa
sasaru pusake a; tea waia e pei
13 nae. Go Samuel e pua napati
ni naroro, go e sasaru pusake a
maleoputo ni taina maga: go
naata ni Yehova e puati casua
ki David pae naaleatia wanogoe
pano. Go Samuel e duleana po
paki Rama pano.
14 Ma naata ni Yehova e melu
dua ki Saul pano, go naatana
madaga sikai e pae Yehova umai
15 po mari a e mataku. Go tea
suasua maga ki Saul eu noa ki
nia, eu naga, pa leo, naatana
madaga sikai e pae Yehova umai
16 po mari ko ko mataku. E pia,
master, pa vitipaki tea suasua
anigo maga, waina au doko
naraeiha, auga manigo laaga
naatamoli sikai, waina e mari
atae dovi melei harp: go ega wo
doko ragi waina naatana madaga
pae Sup© e puati ko, nae ega
manigo mari nalegaana ki
naihelearuna, go pa wo moro pia.
17 Go Saul e noa ki tea suasua ane-
ana maga, E pia, kuga maginau
pasai naatamoli sikai waina ®
mari atae dovi melei nalegaana,
go kuga vuati a umai punusi au.
18 Go natureai sikai e pasa dara po
noa, pa leo a punusi Yesse
natuna naanoai sikai, naatainoh
ni Bethlehem waina e pei tea
dovi melei nalegaana, go e pel
naatamoli mari casua, go naata:
moli vivimeri, e pasa manu-
matua, e pei tea loihatakiana, go
Yehova e sau pia ki nia.
19 Tea waina Saul e dipaki l ua
tea tautauana pa punusi Yesse,
go e noa, pa tipaki lua natunis
naanoai David, waina e sikoti
20 shiip ega umai punusi au. Go
Yesse e pua as sikai e ova bred.
go susu sikai ni wain, go nani-
nani natuna sikai, po dipa ki-da
pae natuna David, dua Saul asa.
21 Go David e umai punusi Saul
go e lawo du naraena; go ®
dodumi parua ki nia; go ©po p e J
22 tea vua nearu aheana. Go Saul
e dipaki lua pa punusi Yesse, ®
naga, pa suasua ki David, a
pavarani ko asa, ega to naraegU;
nalakena © pasai nacitamataki;

waina naatana madaga pae Sup e

85.
DAVID GO YONATHAN.
1 Go e doko waina. e pasa sua
paki Saul, naga naata ni
Yonathan e. pel tea soli-paratiki-
ana paki naata ni David, go
Yonathan e dodumi a dakiusi e
2 dumana dodumi naatana. Go
Saul © puati a naaleatia wanogoe,
go e da suasua ega moro pano
paki kiana, paki nasuiha ki
3 tamana. . Ragi wanogoe Yona-
than go David ero mari navasa-
sokiana sikai, nalakena e dodumi
a dakiusi waina e dumana
4 dodumi naatana. Go Yonathan
© sawo lua sugoro varau • waina
e suni a, go e dua David asa, go
sugoro iholi maga aneana, go lova
aneana ma © pilaki a, go nasu
aneana, go tea sokiana aneana.
5 Go David © dave pano naio ni
sara naleo waina Saul e dipaki
nia asa, go © mari popo matua
asa. Go Saul e doro © dapau
naatamoli navakalo maga, go e
pei tea midoaki matakiana narae
ni naatamoli' laapa., go narae ni

87.
DAVID E MAUTI NAM ADRI-
AN A KI SAUL SALA KERUA.
1 Go Zifite maga eu rumai punusi
Saul Cibea, eu naga, David e
curukuru tava ni Hakila waina e
2 doko pitata ma malo palo. Go
Saul e duleana, po siwo pano paki
malo palo ni Zif, go e pua naata-
fnoli matadoaana ni Israel eu pei
manu dolu eu sikoti a naga euga
laaga David malo palo ni Zif.
3 Go Saul e inenaki tava ni Hakila
waina e pitata ma malo palo,
pisari napua. Ma David e doko
malo palo doko, go e midoaki
atae naga Saul e umai paki malo
4 palo para ki nia. Tea waina
David e dipaki lua tea lo pava-
raka maga, go e po atae naga
S Saul e umai lomau. Go David
e duleana, po umai paki tokora
waina Saul e menaki asa: go
David e punusi tokora waina Saul
e maturu asa, nara ma Abner
natu ni Ner, mau ni taua naata-
moli navakalo ki Saul: go Saul
e maturu malo paka-goroana ni
wacon, go naatamoli laapa eu
•6 maturu davivi ki nia. Go David
e noa, Sei ega sikoti au pa punusi
Saul malo ihenakiana ? Go
Abishai e noa, Kinau aga wo
7 sikoti ko siwo pano. Go David
go Abishai ero umai punusi taua
naatamoli pogi. Go, kuga leo,
Saul e maturu one roara ni
napakagoroana ni wacon, go naio
aneana e pei tea lawokiana
natano pisari napauna : go Abner
go naatamoli laapa eu maturu
■8 davivi ki nia. Go Abishai e noa
ki David, e naga, Supe e po pitua
ki tea kokona ki-go paki
naihelearuma masoso waia: tea
waina pa suasua naga aga mari
a, a pavarani ko, ki naio ega vaka
sikaimaau pei tea mari sokiana
paki natano, go aga wo da lawo
9ki nia sala kerua. Ma David e
noa ki Abisliai, e naga, pa «a
mari. punue a mau; nalakena sei
e mari atae sai ki nainelearuna
paki tea yuvuraeana ki Yehova,
10 po pei sogi dika ? Go David e
moro noa, E pei lomau dakiusi
waina Yehova e mauri doko, Ye-
hova ega wo atugi a; e pe vei
ragi waina naaleatia aneana «
umai naga ega mate, kita waina
ega siwo paki navakalo, po mate.
11 Yehova ega mari a ega toko uvea
ki-nau naga aga sai ki narhele-
arugu paki tea vuvuraeana ki Ye-
hova : ma a pavarani ko, ragi
waia pa vua naio aneana waina
e doko pisari napauna go jar ni
12 noai, go toroga vano. Go David
e pua naio go jar ni noai pae
pisari napau ni Saul; go ero ihelu
pano, go te naata 0 da punusi a,
go eu da atae a, go eu da leleo
mau: nalakena tea laapa eu
maturu; nalakena namaturuana
casua pae Yehova e lawo adeara.
13 Go David e pano paki matele
kerua, go e lawo du naihasua ni
tava uvea; namasova lapa sikai e
14 mari potae *a: go David e pioso
paki narei, go paki Abner natu
ni Ner, e naga, Abner ko da
pasa dara mau ? Go Abner e
pasa dara, po noa, Nigo ko pei
15 sei waina ko pioso paki kig ? Go
David e noa ki Abner, Nigo ko
da pei takuari sikai, kita ? go sei
e pei raka kakafna Israel ? lea
waina ecasana ko da pavaigoro
kig, master anigc 5 nalakena naata

(ni napakagoroana) naga ega
mari punue kig, master anigo.


16 Tea waia waina ko marl a e da
pia mau. E pei lomau dakiusi
waina Yehova e mauri doko, nimu
ku pataka namateana, nalakena
ku da pavaegoro master animu,
tea vuvuraeana ki Yehova. Go
ragi waia, pa vunusi naio ki kig,
go jar ni noai waina e pea doko
17 pisari napauna. Go Saul e atae
nadaleo ni David, go e noa, Tea
waia e pei nadaleoma natugu
David, kita? Go D*>vid e noa,

aginau e do kapalele tea suasua
aneana? nalakena kinau a mari
tea sa nasava? kita tea sa nasava
21 e doko namelearugu ? Go Saul e
noa, Kinau a mari naleo sa: pa
liliu, natugu David: aga wo da
mari sa ki-go, nalakena namauri-
ana aginau e pei tea tapu
naraema masoso waia: nalakena
a wosi oli namala, go a sasapo
22 nalo lapa. Go David e pasa dara
po noa, Ko punusi naio (anigo)
kig O! pa tipaki natureai sikai
23 ega umai puati a. Go Yehova
ega wo dua naataiuoli, waina e
pitua kigo paki namearuna
■ masoso waia pataka ni naleanaana
go naveilomauana aneana, go
kinau a da masauna naga aga sai
ki nahielearuga dipa tea vuvurae-
-24 ana ki Yehova. Go, pa leo, Ega
takiusi namauriana anigo e pei
tea midoaki-casua-kiana naraegu
masoso waia, ega tapale nogoe
Yehova ega wo midoaki casua ki
namauriana aginau, go ega wo
mauti au pa dua ki nariesokiaha
.25 mamau puti. Go Saul e noa ki
David, e naga, pa vei tea vasa-
matakiana, natugu David: pa wo
mari matua, go ega wo manigo
nunu pia. Go David e fuelu
pano, go Saul e paki kiana pano.
1 Go David e noa napopona, e
naga, Aga wo mate te napogi pae
nainelearu ni Saul: tea wia sikai-
maau agiuau (waina a punusi a)
e pei naga waina e pe sava paki
navanua ki . Eilistine maga: go
Saul ega wo makoto laaga au usu-
raki kokoi maga ni Israel;. dapale
nogoe aga wo doko edaku liu
2 namelearuna. Go David e.dule-
ana, go e duagoto, nara ma naata-
iholi ponotia latesa waina eu
sikoti a, pa punusi Akish natu ni
Maok kig ni Oath. Go eu noa
ki nia naga David e sava paki
Gath; go eda moro laaga asa.
SAUL E LAAGA NAGOROI NI
ENDOR WAINA E PASA
pAI PAE NATEMATE.
3 Go Samuel e mate, go Israel
mamau eu dagisi a, go eu ovaki
nia Rarna, natokoana aneana.
Go Saul e mari punue sua tea
soso naatamate maga, go tea vasa
pai pae naatamate, pa dua ki
4 navanua. Go Filistine maga eu
dumada saisai ki da go eu menaki
Shunem: go Saul e saisai ki
Israel mamau, go eu menaki
5 Cilboa. Go ragi waina Saul e
punusi nalaapaaria ni Filistine
maga e mataku, go najiopona e
6 durururu lapa. Go ragi waina
Saul e pisuusu ki Yehova, Ye-
hova e da pasa dara e mau, e da
pasa dara pae naperea, kita pae
Urim, kita pae profeta maga.
7 Go Saul e noa ki tea suasua ane-
ana maga, e naga, Kuga magi-
nau laaga nagoroi sikai waina e
do soso naatemate, naga aga va
punusi a po pisuusu a. Go tea
suasua aneana maga eu eu noa
ki nia, eu naga, pa leo, nagoroi
sikai e doko Endor waina e peani
naatana waina e mari atae soso
8 naatamate. Go Saul e dumana
mari pano pota ki nia, po suni
sugoro pota, go e pano, naata-
iholi dua ero sikoti a, go eu


rumai punusi nagoroi wanogoe
pogi: go e noa, A pavarani ko,
pa maginau alovi umai pae
naatama, tea sikai waina aga noa
9 kigo nagisana. Go nagoroi e
noa ki nia, pa leo, ko atae tea
waina Saul e mari a, dapale
waina e mari makoto ki tea maga
waina eu peani naatana soso
naatemate, go munuai maga pa
dua ki navanua, tea waina
ecasana ko doro nabatinu sikai
raki namauriana aginau naga aga
10 mate 1 Go Saul e pasa sokisoki
paki nia pae Yehova, e naga, E
pei lomau dakiusi waina Yehova
e mauri doko, sogi ega ta liko
11 ako nalakena tea wai. Go
nagoroi e noa, Aga • manigo
piragi sei umai ? Go Saul e noa,
pa maginau piragi Samuel sake
12 umai. Go ragi waina nagoroi e
punusi. Samuel, e pioso ki
nadaleona casua: go nagoroi o
pasa ki Saul, e naga, Ecasana
ko sali au 1 nalakena nigo ko pei
13 Saul. Go kig e noa ki nia, v
naga, pa ta mataku mau: ma
ko, punusi nasava ? Go nagoroi
e noa ki Saul, A punusi sujoe
sikai e. sake pae natano umai.
14 Go nae e noa ki nia E dakiusi
nasava ? Go e noa, Matiki matua
sikai e sake umai; e pei tea
sugoroana ki sugoro kovagoroana
sikai. Go Saul e ata© e pei
Samuel, go e cusu namatana paki
natano, go e dowo dapolo si wo.
15 Go Samuel e noa ki Saul, e naga
ecasana ko mari sa ki namaroma-
roana aginau ? Go Saul e pasa
dara, e naga, A pei tea riesoki-
ana sa; nalakena Filistine maga
eu dijia navakalo paki nau, go
Supe e pa dua ki-nau pano, go
e da moro pasa dara, au, e da
(pasa dara) pae profeta maga,
hita . pae naperea maga: tea
waina e pei nalakena a soso ko,
naga pa noa sai paki nau tea
16 waina aga mari a. Go Samuel
e noa (ki nia), Ecasana ko
pisuusu paki nau, waina Yehova
e pa dua ki-go pano, go e po
19 pei tea kokona ki-go ? Go Ye-
hova ma ega wo pitua ki mu
ma Israel paki nainelearu ni
Filistine maga: go matamai nimu
ma natuina maga kuga wo sikoti
au doko: Yehova ma ega wo
pitua ki nalaapaana ni Israel
paki nainelearu ni Filistine
20 maga. Go inaraverave Saul e
dowo paki natano pae navarau-
ana mamau aneana. Go e mata-
ku sa, nalakena navasaana maga
ki Samuel: go nakasuaana seara
eda doko asa; nalakena eda gani
te navinaga naaleatia mamau,
kita napogiana mamau vanogoe.
21 Go nagoroi epa punusi Saul,
go e punusi e manaunau sa, go e
noa ki nia, pa leo tea suasua
nagoroi anigo e daki dorogo
nadaleoma, go a doro namauriana
aginau e doko nainelearugu, go
a daki dorogo navasaana anigo
maga waina ko pasa ki hau asa.
22 Tea waina a pavarani ko asa,
nigo ma pa taki dorogo nadaleo
ni tea suasua nagoroi anigo, go
pa suasua aga toro matele navi-
naga sikai naraema; go pa kani-
kani, naga pa veani nakasuaana,
ragi waina pa wo surata napua.
23 Ma e carae; e'naga, Agata gani-
kani mau. Ma tea suasua ane-
ana maga eu pasa die a asa; go
e daki dorogo nadaleoda. Go e
doko leana, e fhelu dua hi natano,
24 go © doko nawewele. Go nagoroi
e peani ka£ vakaleana © doko
ekopu; go e mari inaraverave, «
mari punue a, go e dape flauer,
e dipa e, e mari a e pei bred
waina leven © dika asa: go e doro
e narae ni Saul, go narae ni te»
suasua aneana maga; go eu gam-
kani. Go eu duleana, po fi©!®
pano pogi wanogoe.


89.
NAMATEANA KI SAUL.
1 Go Filistine maga eu dipa
navakalo paki Israel: go naata-
moli ni Israel eu sava narae ni
Filistine maga, go eu pei tea
maripunueana, eu dowo tava ni
2 Cilboa. Go Filistine maga eu
capasi casua ki Saul ma natuna
maga; go Filistine maga eu mari
punue Yonatan, go Abinadab, go
Malki-shua, Saul natuna naanoai
3 maga. Go navakalo epo casua
sa dipa Saul; go tea vua nasu
4 maga eu dipe sa sa ki Saul. Go
Saul e noa ki tea dape nearu
aneana, e naga, pa sai lua lova
anigo, po puri sasama ki nau asa ;
tea tika natovataviviana maga
waia eu pe wo puri sasama ki
nau, po mari sau doa ki nau.
Ma tea vua nearu aneana e da
suasua; nalakena wanogoe Saul e
pua lova aneana, go o dowo asa.
5 Go ragi waina tea waina e mane-
ana pua nearu e punusi naga
Saul e mate, nae ma e dowo lova
6 aneana, po mate sikoti a. Dapale
nogoe Saul e mate, go natuna
naanoai dolu, go tea vua nearu
aneana go naatamoli laapa ane-
ana. eu mate naaleatia sikaimaau
wanogoe.
7 Go ragi waina naatamoli maga
ni Israel waina eu doko matele
kerua ni napalea, go tea maga
waina eu doko matele kerua ni
Yordan eu punusi ■ naga naata-
moli ni Israel maga eu sava, go ;
naga Saul ma natuna maga, eu
mate eu inelu dua ki taun maga,
po sava; go Filistine maga eu
rumai po doko ara doko.
8 Go matamai ki nia ragi waina
Filistine maga eu rumai naga
euga sawo lua sugoro ki tea mate
maga, eu pa sai Saul go natuna
dolu eu dowo tava ni Cilboa. Go
eu da cotovi napauna, go eu
sawo lua tea suni palugoroana
aneana, go eu dipaki lua pa sara
navanua ki Filistine maga, naga
euga tape narogorogoana kakana
maga paki nasuma ki idolo
adeara maga, go paki narei.
Go David e dagi ki natagiana
waia nalo ni Saul go nalo ni
natuna Yonatan.
Napoiana anigo, O Israel, e
pei tea mari punueana malo
paki elagi anigo maga!
E dapale sava takuari maga
‘eu dowo!
pa ta noa sai a Oath,
pa ta rogorogo ki nia striit
maga ni Ashkalon;
Filistine natuna nagoroi maga
eu pe wo laelaea.
Natuda nagoroi maga ki tea
tika natovataviviana eu pe
wo powoa.
Nimu tava ni Cilboa maga
Nasau kita usa ega ta doko mu,
kita vanua maga tea ni
waina eu mari naviriana
maga asa:
Nalakena tokora . wanogoe
talcva ki takuari maga eu
pei tea nadi ki lua-ana ki
naru loa,
Taleva ki Saul, dakiusi sikai
waina e da pei tea vuvurae-
aua ki naroro.
Nasu ki Yonatan e da mara
doa,
Go lova ki Saul e da liliu rnoli
Pae nada ki tea mari punue-
ana maga kita pae napeletia
ki tea kasua maga.
Saul go Yonatan ero pei tea
dodumiana go tea lo mataki-
ana ragi namauriana adeara
Go ero da pei tea wotaeana
ragi ni namateana adeara.
Ero mari maraverave liu aeto
maga,
Ero casua liu lion.
Nimu Israel natuda nagoroi
maga kuga magi Saul dagi.


Waina e sugoro mu matemate
pia ki tea miala,
Waina e doro napoiana ni cold
e doko sugoro animu maga
25 E dapale sava takuari maga eu
dowo maleoputo ni navakalo !
Awi Yonatan ! tea wokapunue-
ana malo paki elagi anigo
maga.
26 Napopogu e maworawora nala-
kena nigo taigu Yonatan:
Ko maginau pei napopo dogo
matakiana
Nadodumiana anigo paki nau
e pei namagaana,
E liu nadodumiana ki nagoroi.
27 E dapale sava takuari maga eu
• dowo!
Go nearu maga eu mavunu-
vunu!
EU PUSAKE DAVID E PEI KIG
NI ISRAEL.
1 Go © doko edaku ki tea waia,
, naga David e pisuusu paki Ye-
hova, e naga, Aga sake pano
paki te taun ni Yuda sikai
kakada? Go Yehova e noa ki
nia, © naga, pa sake pano. Go
David e noa, Aga sake paki
4 esava 1 Go nae © noa, Paki
Hebron. Go naatamoli maga ni
Yuda eu rumai, go tokora wano-
goe eu pusak© • David kig ni
8 Yuda. Ma Abner natu ni Ner,
mau ni taua naatamoli navakalo
ki Saul e pua Ish-bosheth natu
ni Saul go e piragi a duagoto
pano paki Mahanaim; go e mari
a e pei kig dapau Israel mamau.
10 Ma, nawora ni Yuda eu dausi
11 David. Go ragi waina David e
pei kig doko Hebron dapau
nawora ni Yuda e pei natau
12 larua go atelagi latesa. Go
Abner natu ni Ner go tea suasua
maga ki Ish-bosheth natu ni Saul
eu dave pano melu dua ki
Mahanaim po paki Cibeon pano.
13 Go Yoab natu ni Zeruia, go tea
suasua maga ki David eu dave
pano, go eu duinada sua ra pisari
17 natopu ni Cibeon. Go navakalo
© pavaga sa naleatia wanogoe ; go
Abner e pei tea mari-matua-
kiana nara ma naatamoli maga
ni Israel, nara© ni tea suasua
maga ki David.
1 Navakalo ni nasuraa ki Saul go
nasuma ki David waina eu
duniada mari ra e doko parau
doko: go David © do disu e do
casua, go nasuma ki Saul e do
disu go e do manainai go e do
17 manainai. Go Abner e pasa ki
elder maga ni Israel, e naga, Sala
vea nimu ku laaga David naga

kuga mari a ragi waia: nalakena
Yehova e pasa nalo ni David, e
naga, Aga wo mauti Israel naata-
moli aginau pa dua ki Filistine
maga go tea kokona ki da laapa
pae namelearu ni tea suasua agi-
19 nau David. Go Abner © moro
pasa paki nadaliga ni Benyamin:
go Abner e moro paki Hebron
pano, po pasa paki nadaliga ni
David sara naleo waina Israel eu
punusi a © pia, go paki nasuma
29 mamau ni Benyamin. Tea waina
Abner © umai paki Hebron
punusi David, go naatamoli rua-
lima dua eu marua. Go David e
magi Abner go naatamoli maga
waina eu marua mari nakaniana
21 sikai. Go Abner e noa ki David,
e naga, Aga wo duleana po pano,
go aga wo saisai ki Israel mamau
paki master aginau kig, naga
euga mari navasaparatikiana
sikai paki-go, go naga pa mara-
mara dapau tea laapa waina
napopoiha e masauna. Go David
e dipaki lua Abner pano; go e
pae natamateana pano.
22 Go kuga leo, tea suasua maga
ki' David go ki Yoab eu nimai


pae nacapasiana ni taua naata-
moli navakalo sikai, go eu pua
nalo dape pavakotoana lapalapa;
ma Abner e da sikoti David
Hebron; nalakena e dipaki lua e
pano, go e pae natamateana pane.
23 Ragi waina Yoab go tana naata-
fholi navakalo mamau waina eu
sikoti a eu rumai, eu noa ki
Yoab, eu naga, Abner natu ni
Ner e umai punusi kig, go e
dipaki lua e pano, go e pae nata-
-24 mateana pano. Ragi wanogoe
Yoab e umai punusi kig, e naga,
Ko mari nasava? pa leo, Abner
e umai punusi ko ; e dapale sava
ko dipaki lua e pano, go te pano
25 sua ? Ko atae Abner natu ni
Ner, e umai naga ega sali ko,
naga ega atae nataveana go
namoroliliuana anigo, go naga
ega atae sara naleo waina ko
26 mari a. Go ragi waina Yoab e
melu dua ki sua narae ni David
e dipaki lua tea tautauana maga
dausi Abner, go eu piragi a liliu
pae namata noai ni Sira: ma
27 David e da atae a. Go ragi
waina Abner e liliu paki Hebron,
Yoab e puati a dawasi paki
ihaleoputo ni namata pua naga
ega vasa dalakolako paki nia, go
e dae napelena tokora wanogoe,
go e mate, nalakena nada ni
Asahel taina (waina Abner e
mari punue a).
1 •Go nawora ni Israel eu mamau
puti umai paki Hebron punusi
David, go eu pasa, po - naga, pa
leo, au pei navatuma go napo-
-2 kasiina. Ragi vea maga waina
Saul e pei kig dapau garni e pei
ni go waina ko maraki Israel eu
dave pano po piragi ra liliu: go
Yehova e noa ki-go, e naga, Nigo
pa wo pakale Israel naatamoli
aginau, go nigo pa wo pei tea
3 maramara dapau Israel. Dapale
nogoe elder laapa ni Israel eu
rumai punusi kig Hebron; go
David e mari navasaparatikiana
sikai paki-da Hebron narae ni
Yehova: go eu pusake David kig
4 dapau Israel. Natau ki David
e pei rualima dolu ragi waina e
dalake maramara, go e maramara
5 natau rualima pati. E mara-
mara Hebron dapau Yuda natau
larua go atelagi iatesa: go e
maramara Yerusalem natau rua-
lima dolu tamate dolu dapau
Israel go Yuda.
6 Go kig go naatamoli aneana
maga eu paki Yerusalem pano
dipa Yebusite maga; waina eu
7 pasa ki David, eu naga, pa ta sili
paki tokora waia. Ma David e
dape narati ki paka casua ni
Zion: tea wanogoe e pei taun ki
10 David. Go David edo disu ki
nakasuaana go nawaruaana, nala-
kena Yehova, Supe ni taua ni
nalaapaana e sikoti a.
DAVID E PUA ARK PAKI
ZION, GO E ' PISEI KI
N ADODUMI AN A PAKI NA-
WORA NI SAUL.
1 Go David e ■ moro saisai ki
naatainoli matadoaana laapa ni
Israel, eu pei manu rua-
-2 lima dolu. Go David e dule-
ana, nara ma naatamoli laapa
waina eu sikoti a, eu pae
Baale Yuda, naga euga viragi
ark ki Supe pae asa, waina e pei
tea sosoana ki Nagisa, io, nagisa
ni Yehova ni nalaapaana waina
3 e dasake Kerub maga. Go eu
doro ark ki Supe e doko kart
vaou sikai, go eu piragi a umai
ihelu nasuraa ki Abinadab waina
e doko Cibea: go Uzza go Ahio,
Abinadab natuna dua ero do
6 capasi (tea vua) kart vaou. Go
ragi waina eu paki malo woka-
leileiana ki Nakon, Uzza e sai ki
nanielearuna paki ark ki Supe,


po dap© parati ki nia; nalakena
7 bulok ero mari tausu. Go namae-
toana ki Supe e soro dipa Uzza;
go Supe e pokati a tokora wano-
goe nalakena namarisapoana ane-
ana; go e mate tokora wanogoe
8 pisari ark ki Supe. Go napopo
ni David e sa, nalakena Yehova
e mari casua paki Uzza: go e
soso tokora wanogoe ki Perez-
Uzza pa pa paki masoso waia.
9 Go David e matau ki Yehova
naaleatia wanogoe; go e noa, Ark
ki Yehova ega wo paki kiana ega

nalakena e pasa sa ki tea- vuvu-

NAM ATADO AAN A KI DAVID.

kig dapau Israel.

maga ni Israel, go takuari maga
2 paki Yerusalem. Go kig David
e duleana po lawodu natuana,
go e naga, Kuga rogo au, taigu

NAVASAPOTAEANA KI
SOLOMON.

mauri, go pa ta mari punue a
mau. Go kerua e noa; ega ta pei

ni maramana, euga vei naveani-
ana anigo dakiusi waina ko noa
e pae nagole ni Moses, tea suasua
anigo ragi waina ko piragi lua
tamagami maga eu melu dua ki
Ecipt, O Yehova Supe.
H Tea waina, O Yehova Supe, pa
mara sike ,paki malo maromaro-
ana anigo, nigo go ark ni naka-
suaana anigo: tea viri maga
anigo, 0 Yehova Supe, euga vei
tea sugoroana ki namautiana, go
tea tapu maga anigo euga laelaea
12 nawiaana. O Yehova Supe, pa
ta doa namatama pa dua ki tea
vuvuraeana anigo: pa midoaki
nasaupiaana lapa waina ko
lagasai a paki David tea suasua
anigo.

55 nakoroatelagi. Go ela wo du po

ni Israel ki nadaleo casua, e naga,

ni Moses tea suasua aneana.

pusi gida kita pa dua ki gida:

para ki nia, naga tuga surata

euga toko maladigi ki jTehova

waina e pia ki naaleatia kakana;

mana euga atae naga Yehova aae
61 e pei Supe: tea pota e dika. Tea
waina napopomu ega wia lua
narae ni Yehova Supe anigida,
naga kuga surata pae navasa-
dawanakiana aneana, go naga

masoso waia.
1 Go ragi waina Solomon e
dapasavasa sua, nakapu e pae

nasuma ki Supe.

KYIN NI SHEBA.
1 Go ragi waina kvin ni Sheba
© dogo narogorogoana ni Solomon
nalo ni nagisa ni Yehova, e umai
naga ega mari dogo e ki navasa-
-2 maluluakiana maga. Go e umai
paki Yerusalem, taua naatamoli
laapa eu sikoti a, eu pua kamel
waina eu dape balsam, go cold
nalo lapa, go vatu ni naulu lapa
maga: go ragi waina e po umai
sua punusi Solomon, ero pei woro
po pasa tea ni sara naleo waina
.3 e doko napopona. Go Solomon e
noa ki nia sara navisuusuana ane-

kig pei tea tasurukiana waina e
4da maneana potae a. Go ragi

ii da vagi a, go nakaniana ni tebel
aneana, go toko tokoana ki tea

napua sakesake waina e do sake
paki nasuma ki Yehova asa;
6 namerona e dika. Go e noa ki
kig, e naga, E pei narogorogoana

anigo go namanumatuaana anigo
waina a dogo e navanua aginau.

maga pa pa a umai, go nama-
tagu ero punusi a’: go pa leo, eu
da noa ki nau namagovae pota-
wotaeana pia kakana mau;
namanumatuaana go nasamasa-

anigo eu maro pa, go tea suasua

lelesala naraema go waina eu
dogo namanumatuaana anigo.

ponotia sikai' rualima takuna
dua, go taua lapa ni balsam, go

nalapalapaana. ni balsam dakiusi

mon asa e da moro umai.

hova Supe ki Israel e noa dapale
nogoe, e naga, pa leo, aga wo
duati lua namarakiana ega melu
dua ki namelearu ni Solomon, go
aga tua ko naworawora rualima
sikai (ega vei anigo). Agata
dape lua ki naihelearuna namara-
kiana mamau: ma aga mari a
ega vei tea maramara sara
naaleatia ni namauriana aneana,
nalakena David tea suasua agi-
nau, waina a matadoa e, nala-
kena nae a dape soki natipakiaha

ana aginau maga: ma aga wo

namelearu ni natuna, go aga wo
dua ko asa, io, naworawora rua-
lima sikai. Go aga wo dua
natuna naworaworana sikai maau,
naga David tea 'suasua aginau
ega m aginau pei nasulu vatoko
naraegu Yerusalem, taun waina
a maginau matadoa e, naga aga
toro nagisagu ega toko asa. Go
aga wo piragi ko, go pa wo mara-
mara ega vataka ni tea mamau
waina naatama e masauna, go p&
wo pei kig dapau Israel. Go ega
wo doko, waina ko pe taki dorogo
sara naleo waina a dipaki-go ara,
po surata napua aginau maga, po
mari tea waina e leana namatagu,
naga pa tape soki navasadawa-
nakiana aginau maga go natipaki-
ana aginau maga dakiusi waina
David tea suasua aginau e mari
a, go aga wo sikoti ko, po manigo
davagi nasuma, waina e doko
casua, dakiusi waina a mag l
David davagi a, go aga wo pitua
ki Israel paki-go. Go aga wo
parati nawora ni David nalakena


tea waia, ma ega ta doko mau
(dapale nogoe).

kig ni Ecipt, go e doko Ecipt pa
pa namateana ki Solomon.

ovakiana taun ki David: go

oli a.

KIG DOLU NI YUDA.
21 Go Rehoboam natu ni Solomon
e maramara Yuda. Natau ki
Rehoboam ragi waina e dalake
maramara e pei rualima pati
tamate sikai, go , e maramara
natau rualima sikai tamate larua
doko Yerusalem, taun waina Ye-
'hova e matadoa e melu nawora-
wora laapa ni Israel, naga ega
toro nagisana ega toko asa.
22 Go Yuda e mari tea waina e sa
namata ni Yehova; go eu dape
dakati natotowo-vaka-kasuaana
aneana ki namarinalosaana
adeara maga, waina eu mari ra,
liu sara naleo waina tamada maga
25 eu mari- ra. Go e doko natau
kelima ki kig Rehoboam, naga
Shishak kig ni Ecipt © sake umai
26 dipa Yerusalem : go e dap© lulua
nalo tauakiana maga ni nasuiha
ki Yehova pano, go nalo tauaki-
ana maga ni nasuma ki kig; io,
e dape sua sara naleo pano: go
e dape lua taleva laapa ni cold
30 waina Solomon © mari ra. Go
’ Rehoboam go Yeroboam ero do
dipa navakalo duinada paki-da
31 lelesala. Go Rehoboam e maturu
sikoti tamana maga, go eu ovaki
nia sikoti tamana maga taun ki
David. Go natuna naanoai
Abiyam e maramara du oli a.
Go Abiyam © dalake maramara
dapau Yuda natau kerualima
sikai tamate latolu ki Yeroboam
2 natu ni Nebat. E maramara
3 doko Yerusalem natau dolu. Go
e do surata sara namarinalosaaua
maga ki tamana, waina nae e
mari a pea ki nia: go napopona
© da pia lua sikoti Yehova Supe
aneana (e da), dakiusi napopo ni
4 tamana David. Ma Yehova e
dua e nasulu sikai doko Yeru-
salem nalakena tamana David,
naga ega sike natuna edaku ki
nia, po mari sokisoki Yerusalem:
5 nalakena David e mari tea waina
e leana namata ni Yehova,,© da
dawasi pa dua ki t© navatuna
waina nae e dipaki nia • sara
naaleatia ni namauriana aneana,
ma nalo ni Uria Hitite sikai -
8 maau. Go Abiyam e maturu
sikoti tamana maga; go ©u ovaki
nia taun ki David: go natuna
naanoai © maramara du oli a.
9 Go natau kerualima dua ki
Yeroboam kig ni Israel Asa e
dalake maramara dapatt Yuda.
10 Go e maramara natau rualima
pati tamate sikai doko Yerusalem.
11 Go Asa e mari tea waina e leana
namata ni Yehova, dakiusi tea
waina tamana David e mari a.
24 Go Asa e maturu sikoti tamana
maga, go eu ovaki nia sikoti
tamana maga taun ki tamana
David: go Yehosafat natuna
naanoai e maramara du oli a.
105.
KIG SIGISIGILEO MAGA NI
ISRAEL.
25 Go Nadab natu ni Yeroboam
e dalake maramara dapau Israel
ragi ni natau kerua ki Asa kig ni
Yuda, go e maramara dapau
26 Israel natau dua. Go e mari tea
waina e sa namata ni Yehova,
go e surata napua ki tamana,
go ni namarinalosaana aneana,
waina na© e mari Israel e mari
27 nalo sa asa. Go Baasha natu ni


Ahiya ni nasuiha ni Issakar, e
28 citakita dipa e, po mari punue
29 a, go e maramara du oli a. Go
e doko, ragi waina nae e pei kig,
naga e poka punue tea laapa ni
nasuiha ki Yeroboam; e da magi
Yeroboam doropusi sikaimaau
waina e meromero, pa pa e mari
puoli ki nia, e pataka ni nava-
saana ki Yehova, waina e pasa
pae namelearu ni tea suasua ane-
-33 ana Ahiya ni Shilo. Ragi ni
natau ketolu ni Asa kig ni Yuda,
Baasha natu ni Ahiya e dalake
maramara dapau Israel mamau
doko Tirza, (e maramara) natau
34 rualima dua tamate pati. Go e
mari tea waina e sa namata ni
Yehova, go e surata napua ki
Yeroboam, go pae namarinalosa-
ana waina nae e mari Israel e
mari nalo sa asa.
1 Go navasaana ki Yehova e
umai ki Yehu natu ni Hanani
2 dipa Baasha, e naga, nalakena a
dape dakati ko pa dua ki naihota-
ihota, po mari ko ko pei tea mara-
mara dapau Israel naatamoli agi-
nau; go ko surata napua ki
Yeroboam, go ko mari Israel
naatamoli aginau eu mari naleo
sa, po sike namaetoana aginau
3 dipa namarinalosaana adeara; pa
leo, aga wo sasara lua Baasha go
tea ni nasuiha aneana, go aga wo
mari nasuiha anigo ega takiusi
nasuiha ki Yeroboam natu ni
6 Nebat. Go Baasha e maturu
sikoti tamana maga, go eu ovaki
nia Tirza: ga natuna Ela e mara-
8 mara du oli a. Ela natu ni
Baasha e dalake maramara dapau
Israel doko Tirza natau kerualima
dua tamate latesa ki Asa kig ni
9 Yuda. Go e maramara natau
dua. Go Zimri tea suasua ane-
ana, waina e pei kapten ni nama-
govae ni kart maga aneana e
citakita e (ragi waina) e doko
Tirza, e do munu e pei matama-
luko nasuiha ki Arza, naatamoli
dapau nasuiha aneana doko Tirza.
Go Zimri e paki ekopu, po atugi
apo mari punue a. E pei natau
kerualima dua tamate larua ki
Asa kig ui Yuda, go (Zimri) e
maramara dua oli a. Go e doko,
ragi waina e po doko toko tapu
aneana, e mari punue sua tea
laapa ni nasuiha ni Baasha.
Zimri e maramara naaleatia
larua doko Tirza ragi ni natau
kerualima dua tamate larua ki
Asa kig ni Yuda. Go narei eu
hienaki dipa Cibbethon, waina e
pei tea ki Filistine maga. Go
narei waina eu hienaki doko eu
dogo, eu noa, Zimri e citakita po
mari punue kig: tea waina Israel
eu pusaki Omri, kapten ni naata-
moli navakalo, e pei kig dapau
Israel naaleatia wanogoe waina
eu ko doko naihenakiana doko.
Go Omri e sake pa dua ki
Cibbethon, go Israel mamau eu
sikoti a, go eu kelugoro Tirza.
Go e doko, ragi waina Zimri e
punusi taun e pei tea tape
paratikiana, e sili nasuiha ni
natokoana ki kig, go e daparaki
nasuiha ki kig dapau sa, go e
mate.
Go narei ni Israel eu duihada
mari potae ra eu pei matele dua,
namagovae sikai ni narei eu dausi
Tibni natu ni Cinath naga euga
mari a ega vei kig; go namagovae
kerua eu dausi Omri. Go narei
waina eu dausi Omri eu mari
matua narei waina eu dausi
Tibni: go Tibni e mate, go Omri
e maramara. Go Omri e mari tea
waina e sa namata ni Yehova,
e mari nasigisigileoana liu tea
laapa waina eu pea ki nia. Go
Omri e maturu sikoti tamana
maga, go eu ovaki nia Samaria:
go natuna Ahab e maramara du
oli a.

ELIYA DOKO MALO PALO (108)


29 Go natau kerualima dolu
tamate latolu ki Asa kig ni Yuda,
Ahab natu ni Omri e dalake
maramara dapau Israel: go Ahab
natu ni Omri e maramara doko
Samaria natau rualima dua
30 tamate dua. Go Ahab e mari
tea waina e sa namata ni Yehova
liu tea laapa waina eu pea ki
31 nia. Go e doko, dakiusi waina
e maneana pei nalo palo sikai
naga ega surata pae namarina-
losaana maga ki Yeroboam natu
ni Nebat, naga e pua Yezebel,
natu ni Ethbaal kig ki tea ni
Sidon, ega vei anagoroi, go e
pano go e magi Baal suasua po
32 lotu ki nia. Go e magi Baal sike
wodo sikai nasuma ki Baal, waina
33 e davagi a doko Samaria. Go
Ahab e mari napea; go Ahab e
mari nawosiana waina e sike
namaetoana ki Yehova Supe ki
Israel lapalapa liu kig laapa ni
Israel waina eu pea ki nia.
ELIYA.
1 Go Eliya ni Tisbe waina e pei
naata toko ni Gilead sikai kakada,
e noa Ahab, e naga (E pei
lomau), dakiusi waina Yehova
Supe ni Israel e mauri doko,
waina kinau a lawo du naraena,
nasovaki kita usa seara ega ta
doko natau maga waia, ma ega
2 vataka ni navasaana aginau. Go
navasaana ki Yehova e umai paki
3 nia, e naga, pa ihelu pano, pa
tuinama doa ko paki ist, po doko
loku pisari noai sara ni Kerit,
6 waina e doko ist ki Yordan. Go
raven maga eu maneana pati
umai bred go napokasi malipogi,
go bred go napokasi ragi melu,
7 go e do munu noai sara. Go e
doko edaku ki ragi seara, noai
sara wanogoe e dapo, nalakena
usa e dika (usuraki) navanua.
8 Go navasana ki Yehova e umai
9 paki nia, e naga, pa tuleana, pa
vaki Zarefat pano, waina e pei
matele Sikai ni Sidon, go pa toko
asa, pa leo, a pitipaki nagoroi
malepu sikai tokora wanogoe,
10 naga ega kasua ki-go. Tea waina
e duleana po paki Zarefat pano;
go ragi waina e paki namata ni
natokoana, kuga leo, nagoroi
malepu sikai e doko asa, e do
pilae nakapu kikiriki: go e pioso
paki nia, po noa, pa maginau
piragi umai, a pavarani ko, noai
kiki seara ega toko lasa, naga aga
11 munugi a. Go ragi waina e do
pano naga ega vuati a, e soso e,
po noa, pa maginau, a pavarani
ko asa, puati umai matele kiki
ni navinaga ega do namelearuma.
12 Go nae e noa, E (pei lomau)
dakiusi waina Yehova Supe anigo
e mauri doko, a da peani bred
sikai ma namelearu vura sikai ni
flaur e doko kask sikai, go naroro
kiki sikai e doko jar sikai: go pa
leo, a powotae nakapu dua, naga
aga magi nami ma natugu mari
ihataki nia, naga aroga kani a,
13 po mate. Go Eliya e noa ki nia,
e naga, pa ta mataku; pa vano,
po mari a dakiusi waina ko noa
e: ma pa vea maginau mari bred
kiki sikai asa, go pa tape a umai
dua au asa, po edaku manigo go
14 magi natuiha mari a. Nalakena
Yehova Supe ki Israel e noa
dapale nea, e naga, Kask ni flaur
ega ta dika go jar ni oil ega ta
dapa pa pa naaleatia waina Ye-
. hova e dipaki usa paki navanua:
15 Go e pano po mari a e pataka
ni navasaana ki Eliya: go nara
ma nae, go (tea ni) nasuma ane-
ana eu do ganikani naaleatia
16 laapa. Go kask ni flaur e da
dika, go jar ni oil e da dapa
pataka ni navasaana ki Yehova,
17 waina e pasa asa pae Eliya. Go
e doko edaku ki tea maga waia,


" naga natuna naanoai ki nagoroi
wanogoe, missis ni nasuma, e
kasaria; go nasasanaana aneana e
lapalapa sa, dapale namerona e
18 da more doko asa. Go e noa ki
Eliya, e naga, Aga kasa kigo,
nigo riaatafnoli ki Supe, O? nigo
ko umai paki kiagu naga aga
midoaki namarinalosaana aginau,
. go naga pa mari punue natugu !
19 Go (Eliya) e noa ki nia, e naga,
pa tua au natuiha. Go e dape
lua e ki narumana, go e dape a
sake paki rum waina nae e do
doko asa, po doro © © doko na-
-20 wewele aneana. Go e pioso paki
Yehova, po noa, Yehova Supe
aginau, O, ko piragi umai tea sa
paki nagoroi waina au marua
dokd, waina ko mari punue
21 natuna, kita 2 E dumana sai ki
nia © covagoro nakariki paka

22 liliu paki nia. Go Yehova © daki

ni nakariki wanogoe e moro umai'

nasuma po pitua ki nia paki
pilana; go Eliya e noa, pa vunusi
24 natuiha e mauri doko. Go
nagoroi e noa ki Eliya, e naga,

pei naataiholi ki Supe, go naga

BAAL.
1 Go e doko edaku ki naaleatia
laapa, naga navasaana ki Yehova

2 dipaki usa paki natano. Go

ki Ahab. Go navitoloana e sa
3pa Samaria. Go Ahab 1 e soso
Obedia waina e dapau tea ni
nasuma aneana. Go Obedia e
4 matau ki parua ki Yehova: nala-
kena e doko, ragi waina Yezebel e
tae lua profeta maga ki Yehova,

sikai, go e dasuru ki da rualima
lima go rualima lima eu doko
valea, go e casua ki da ki navi-
-5 naga go noai. Go Ahab e noa
ki Obedia, e naga, pa surata
usuraki navanua, paki sara
namata noai, go paki sara noai
sara, masa tu pe wo pasai te
namenau po mauti hors go myul
euga mauri, naga euga ta marua
6 sua manigida puoli. Go ero
potawotae navanua naga eroga va

pae napua sikai, go Obedia e
masikinia pae napua pota.

44 Go e doko salana kelarua, e noa,
pa leo, napopouru sikai e melu
natasi, © kiki dakiusi namelfearu
ni naatamoli sikai. Go © noa,

goto sua, naga Eliya e noa ki

e noa, Ko datago tea kasua, io,

doko ragi waina ero ko do surata

NARORO KI NAGOROI
MALEPU NI SHUNEM.

natuna maga anagoroi sikai, e cai

BEN-HADAD KIG NI SIRIA E
DIPA NAVAKALO PAKI
ISRAEL.
8- Kig ni Siria e dipa navakalo
paki Israel; go nara ma tea- sua-
sua aneana maga eu pusumaki,
go e noa kida tokora sikai waina
9 e naga euga menaki asa. Go
naataiholi ki Supe e dipaki lua
pa punusi kig ki Israel, e naga,
pa mata matua naga pa ta pae
tokora sikai (waina e noa e) nala-
kena tea ni Siria euga wo siwo
10 paki asa. Go kig ki Israel e


dipaki lua paki tokora waina
naatamoli ki Supe e noa ki nia,
po atu korokoro e asa; go e
dumana mauti a asa, e da pei
paka sikaimaau kita paka dua
11 man. Go napopo ni kig ni Siria
e diri nalakena tea wanogoe; go
e soso tea suasua aneana maga,
go e noa ki-da, Kuga wo da pisei
ki-nau tea anigida sei waina e
12 do silae kig ki Israel ? Ma tea
suasua aneana sikai kakada e
naga, Ee e da dapale nogoe mau,
nawota aginau, kig O: ma
Elisha, profeta waina e doko
Israel, nae e noa sai paki kig ki
Israel navasaana maga waina nigo
ko pasa asa emago maturu anigo.
13 Go nae e noa, Kuga va 1010
tokora waina nae e doko asa,
naga aga tipaki lua po puati a
umai. Go eu noa ki nia, pa leo.
14 e doko Dothan. Tea waina e
dipaki lua paki asa hors maga,
go kart maga, go taua lapa sikai;
go eu rumai pogi, po davivi-goro
15 taun. Go ragi waina tea suasua
ki naatamoli ki Supe e duleana
malipogi sa, po dave pano, kuga
leo, taua lapa sikai waina eu pua
hors go kart eu puagoro taun
doko. Go tea suasua aneana e
noa ki nia, Awi, master aginau !
Tuga mari a ega tapale sava ?
16 Go nae e pasa dara, e naga, pa
ta mataku mau; nalakena tea
maga waina eu sikoti gida eu
laapa liu tea maga waina
17 eu sikoti ra. Go Elisha e

YOASH KIG KI YUDA.
1 Ragi waina Athalia pila ni
Ahazia e punusi naga natuna e
mate, e duleana po mari punue
tea' ’ laapa waina eu pei nawora
2ni kig. Ma Yehosheba Yoram
natuna nagoroi, gore ni Ahazia
e pua Yoash Ahazia natuna
naanoai, e dape lua panako asa
pa dua Id kig natuna naanoai
maga waina eu mari punue ra;
nara ma nagoroi lo parati ki nia,
po doropusi ra emago maturu;
go eu dasuru ki nia ki Athalia,
go waina e da pei tea mari punue-
-3 ana asa. Go Yoash e pei tea
tasurukiana sikoti nagoroi lo
parati ki nia doko nasuina ki Ye-
hova natau e latesa. Go Athalia
e maramara dapau navanua.
4 Go natau kelarua Yehoiada ©
dipaki lua po puati umai tea
maramara dapau ponotia maga
go kapten maga, ro tea vavai,
e piragi ra umai punusi a paki
nasuina ki Yehova; go e mari
navasaparatikiana paki da, go e
dape navasasokisokiana kiada
doko nasuina ki Yehova go e pisei
9ki da kig natuna naanoai. Go
tea maramara dapau ponotia
maga eu mari pataka ni sara
naleo waina Yehoiada tea viri e
10 pitipaki asa: go tea viri maga
eu dua tea maramara dapau
ponotia maga naip go taleva maga
ki David kig, waina eu doko
11 nasuina ki Yehova. Go tea vavai
eu lawo du sara naata kakada e
pua nali kau aneana e doko
namelearuna, pae matele ni
matua ni nasuina paki matele ni
mau ni nasuma, e para ki wodo
go e para ki nasuina, pisari kig
12 davivi ki nia. Go e piragi kig
natuna naanoai paki katama, go
© doro kraun e doko asa, po dua
© nanoasokisokiana, go eu mari a
e pei kig, po pue pusake a, go eu
tapa posawosa po noa, Namauri-
ana agi kig.
13 Go ragi waina Athalia e dogo
nafhaparaeana ki navara vavai go
ki naatamoli e umai punusi narei
14 doko nasuina ki Yehova; go e
1010, go, kuga leo, kig e lawo du
malo tasake, © pataka natomari-
ana ki tea maramara go tea sui


paiga maga pisari kig; go naata-
moli laapa ni navanua eu laelaea,
po sui' paiga maga. Ragi
wanogoe Athalia e sie porae
sugoro aneana maga, go e noa,
namari panavanakoana, namari
15 panavanakoana. Go Yehoiada
tea viri e pitipaki tea maramara
maga ni ponotia waina eu pei tea
toroana eu doko dapau taua
naatamoli navakalo, po noa ki-
da, Kuga vuati a paki katama,
doro e maleoputo ni navara nava-
kalo maga: go te naata waina
e pe sikoti a, kuga mari punue
aki lova: nalakena tea viri ©
naga, Ega ta pei tea maripunue-
-16 ana nasuma ki Yehova. Go eu
maneana man sai napua, go e
pano pae napua waina hors maga
eu do sili asa paki nasuma ki
kig; go tokora wanogoe e pei tea
17 mari punueana asa. Go Yehoi-
ada © mari navasasokiana paki
Yehova ma kig go narei, naga
euga vei naatamoli' ki Yehova,
go e moro mari navasokiana agi
18 kig go narei . Go naatamoli laapa
ni navanua eu pano paki nasuma
ni Baal, go eu dakai a ; eu mari
matua poka peresi wodo go
nasaposapo maga, go eu poka
punue Mattan tea-viri ki Baal
narae ni wodo. Go tea viri e
dipaki tea lo parati ki dapau
19 nasuma ki Yehova. Go e pua
kapten maga dapau ponotia go
kari maga go tea vavai go naata-
moli laapa ni navanua; go eu
piragi kig siwo pae nasuma ki
Yehova, go eu rumai pae namata
pua ki, tea vavai paki nasuma
ki kig, go e sasake iron ki kig
20 maga. Go naatamoli laapa i
navanua eu laelaea, go nataihate
21 e doko taun. Yehoash e pei tea
ni natau larua ragi waina ©
dalake maramara.
E per natau kelarua ki Yehu
waina Yehoash e dalake mara-
mara; .go e maramara doko
Yerusalem natau rualima pati.
Go Yehoash e mari tea waina e
pia narae ni Yehova sara
naaleatia laapa waina Yehoiada
e pei te viri e do pasa pisei ki
nia.
Ma Yehoiada e do pei tea
matua po piu ki naaleatia maga,
go e mate ; natau aneana e pei
ponotia sikai rualima takuna dolu
ragi waina e mate. Go eu ovaki
nia taun ki David sari kig maga,
nalakena e mari e pia Israel go
paki Supe, go paki nasuma ane-
ana. Go edaku ki namateana ki
Yehoiada nawota maga ni Yuda
eu rumai, go eu cusu narae m
kig. Go kig e daki dorogo paki-
da. Go eu pa dua ki nasuma
ki Yehova Supe ki tamada maga,
po magi napea maga go idol©
maga suasua: go namaetoana e
pa parati ki Yuda go Yerusalem,
nalakena natapiriana adeara
waia. Go naata ni Supe e pua
parati ki Zekaria natu ni Yehoi-
ada tea viri; go e lawo du elagi
ki narei, go e noa ki-da, Supe e
noa dapale nea, e naga, Ecasana
ku dapiri natipakiana ki Yehova,
naga kuga mari sa disu pia ?
Nimu ku doropusi Yehova, nala-
kena tea wanogoe Yehova ma e
doropusi mu. Go eu digatigo e,
go eu nadi a ki vatu pae nati-
pakiana ki kig roara ni lina m
nasuma ki Yehova. Dapale
nogo© Yoash kig e da midoaki
nadodumiana waina Yehoiada
tamana e mari a paki nia, go ®
mari punue natuna. Go ragi
waina e mate, e naga, Yehova
ega 1010 punusi a, po siko asa.
Go e doko ragi ni natau matua,
naga navara pule ni Siria eu sake
umai dipa e: go eu rumai paki


Yuda go Yerusalem, go eu mari
punue nawota maga ni narei pae
maleoputo ni narei, go eu dipaki
sara nasaluaana kia-da paki kig
24 ni Damaskus. Nalakeria navara
pule ki tea ni Siria eu sake umai
ki taua kiki sikai, go Yehova e
pitua ki taua naatamoli laapa sa
paki namelearuda, nalakena eu
pa dua ki Yehova Supe ki tamada
maga. Dapale nogoe eu mari
navasapotaeana maga paki
25 Yoash. Go ragi waina eu ihelu
dua ki sua ki nia pano (nalakena
eu doropusi a e doko narogo-
kiteesaana lapa maga) tea suasua
veaniana aneana maga eu diga-
tigo e nalakena nada ni Yehoiada
tea viri natuna maga, go eu
pokati a nawewele aneana, go e
mate: go eu ovaki nia taun ki
David, ma eu da ovaki nia matigo
ki kig maga. Go Amazia natuna
e maramara du oli a.

NAM ATE AN A KI ELISHA.
1 Natau kerualima dua tamate
e dolu ki Yoash natu ni Ahazia
kig ki Yuda Yehoahaz natu ni
Yehu e dalake maramara dapau
Israel doko Samaria, go e mara-
mara natau rualima sikai tamate
2 larua. Go e mari tea waina esa
3 nara© ni Yehova. Go namaeto-
ana ki Yehova e pavaga dipa
Israel, go e pitua ki-da paki
namelearu ni Hazael kig ni Siria,
go paki namelearu ni Ben-hadad
natu ni Hazael, sara naaleatia
4 adeara. Go Hehoahaz e pava-
rani Yehova, go Yehova e daki
dorogo paki nia: nalakena e
punusi nadiesokiana ki Israel,
dapale waina kig ni Siria
5 e diesoki ra. (Go Yehova e dua
Israel tea maum.au sikai, go eu
dave pano pa dua ki eu doko
etano ni namelearu ni tea ni Siria
maga: go Israel natuna maga eu
doko do tapaupau adeara maga
6 dakiusi sala vea. Ma eu da pa
dua ki namarinalosaana ni
nasuma ki Yeroboam waina e
mari Israel eu niari naleo sa, ma
eu do surata asa: go napea ma
7 e doko do Samaria.) Nalakena
e da magi Yehoahaz doro pusi
seara ni narei ma tea vagi hors
rualima lima, go kart rualima
sikai go navarapule manu rua-
lima sikai, tea maga waia mau,
nalakena kig ni Siria a mari puoli
ki-da; go e mari ra eu dakiusi
namotainota ni nawokaleileiana.
9 Go Yehoahaz e maturu sikoti
tamana maga; go eu ovaki nia
Samaria: go Yoash natuna e
maramara du oli a.
14 Go Elisha © sasana ki nasa-
sanaana waina e mate asa: go
Yoash kig ki Yuda e siwo umai
punusi a, go e dagi naraena, po
naga, Awi popo aginau, popo agi-
nau, kart ki Israel, go tea vagi
15 hors maga kakana! Go Elisha
e noa ki nia, e naga, pa vua nasu
go natipa maga. Go e maneana
16 pua nasu go natipa maga. Go e
noa ki kig ki Israel, pa toro
nanielearuma ega toko nasu, go
e doro namelearuna asa. Go
Elisha e doro namelearuna dua
ero doko namelearu dua ki kig.
17 Go e noa, pa savagi namata ni
wido paki ist: go e savagi a. Go
Elisha e noa, pa tipe; go e dipe.
Go e noa, Natipa ni namari-
matuaana ki Yehova, io, natipa
ni namarimatuaana dipa Siria:
nalakena pa mari tea ni Siria
maga Afek pa pa paki waina ko
18 mari puoli ki-da. Go e noa ki
nia, e naga, pa vua natipa anigo
maga: go e puati ra. Go e noa
ki kig ki Israel, pa woka natano :
go e poka natano paka dolu, go
19 e maro. Go naatamoli ki Supe


e maefco ki nia, go e noa, Ko pe
wokati paka lima kita paka
latesa; e pe tapale nogoe, go ko
pe mari Siria pa pa paki waina

mari Siria paka dolu mau.
20 Go Elisha e mate, go eu ovaki
nia. Go navara pule ni Moab eu
do pa sokisoki navanua ragi ni
21 natau vaou. Go e doko, ragi
waina eu do ovaki naatamoli
sikai naga, kuga leo, eu lo pai
navara pule sikai;'go eu nadi ki
naatamoli wanogoe siwo paki
tanoma ki Elisha, go ragi waina
naatamoli wanogoe e kisi dogo
navatu ni Elisha e moro mauri, e
duleana po lawo du.

LUAANA PAKI ASSIRIA.
1 Natau kerua ki Yoash natu ni
Yoahaz kig ki Israel Amazia natu
ni Yoash kig ki Yuda e dalake
3 maramara. Go e mari tea waina
e pia namata ni Yehova: ma e
5 da dakiusi tamana David. Go e
doko, ragi waina namarakiana e
pei tea marisokisokiana doko
nahielearuna, naga e mari punue

6 eu mari punue tamana, kig. Ma
e da mari punue natuda maga
ki tea mari punue maga: e
pataka ni tea waina e pei tea
midiriana tusi ni nawotaeana ki

pitipaki asa, e naga, Tamada
maga euga ta pei tea mari punue-
ana nalo ni natuda maga, go
natuda maga euga. da pei tea
mari punueana nalo ni tamada
maga; ma sara naata ega mate
dipa namarinalosaana aneana.

e Yerusalem: go e sava paki
Lakish: ma eu dipaki lua paki
Lakish, go eu mari punue a

© doko namadu ni hors maga:
go e pei tea ovakiana YerusaJem
sikoti tamana maga taun ki
21 David. Go naatamoli laapa hi
Yuda eu pua Azaria waina natau
aneana eu pei rualima sikai
tamate latesa, go eu mari a e pei
kig du oli tamana Amazia. (Go

ana ki Uzzia, e maramara dapau

dua, go e mari tea waina e pia

aneana, go Shillum, go Mena-

po pei tea veaniana aneana po
4 dua e nasautoga. Go kig m

e dipaki tea tautauana pa punusi

sake umai usuraki navanua
mamau go e kelu-goro Samaria
natau e dolu.

ni Assiria 6 dape parati ki

paki Assiria, go e doropusi ra eu
doko Hala go eu doko Habor
pisari noai sara ni Cozan, go taun
7 maga ki tea ni Media. Go e
dapale nogoe, nalakena Israel
natuna maga eu mari naleo sa
dipa Yehova Supe adeara, waina

go eu matau ki supe pota maga,

hova e capasi lua ra narae ni
13 Israel natuna maga. Ma Yehova
e noa sokisoki sua dipa Israel go

dogo, go eu mari nakau daleoda
eu casua, dakiusi nakau daleo ni
