-16 lomau Yehova, Supe adeara, go
eu pa dua ki natipakiana laapa
ki Yehova Supe adeara, go eu
dumada mari ra nasaposapo
veaniana maga, tea ni kaf dua,
go eu mari napea, go eu lotu ki
nalaapaana ni nakoroatelagi, go
17 eu magi Baal suasua. Go eu
mari natuda naanoai maga go
natuda nagoroi maga eu pano
duaturu nakapu, go eu mari
navasapuaana maga go nakikita
maga, go eu dumada sori ra naga
euga mari tea waina e sa namata
ni Yehova, po paka dali ki nia
18 paki namaetoana. Tea waina
Yehova e maeto sa ki Israel, pa
pua lua ra pa du ki namatana:
seara eu da doko ma nawora ni
19 Yuda masikida. Yuda ma e da
dape soki natipakiana maga ki
Yehova Supe adeara, ma eu
surata pae natawanakiana maga
ki Israel waina nara eu dumada
20 mari ra. Go Yehova e lo doa
nawora mamau ni Israel, go e
parati ra, go e pitua ki da paki
namelearu ni tea salua maga, pa
pa paki waina e nadi ki lua ra
23 pa dua ki namatana: e pataka ni
tea waina e noa sua e pae
namelearu ni tea suasua laapa
aneana profeta maga. Dapale
nogoe Israel e pei tea viragilua-
ana melu dua ki. navanua veani-
ana adeara paki Assiria pa pa
paki naaletia ni masoso.
HEZEKIA.
(Ahaz e maturu sikoti tamana
maga go natuna Hezekia e
maramara du oli a.)
1 Hezekia e dalake maramara
ragi waina natau aneana e pei
rualima dua tamate lima, go e
maramara doko Yerusalem natau
2 rualima dua tamate loviti. Go
e mari tea waina e pia namata
ni Yehova, pataka ni sara naleo
waina tamana David e mari a.
3 Natau vea ni namarakiana ane-
ana atelagi vea kakana e savagi
namata maga ni nasuiha ki Ye-
-4 hova, po mari usi ra. Go e
piragi tea viri maga go Levite
maga umai, po saisai ki-da malo
5 pelewelea matele ni ist. Go e noa
ki-da, Kuga taki dorogo au, nimu
Levite maga ; kuga tumamu dapu
goro mu, go kuga tapu goro
nasuma ki Yehova, Supe ki
tamamu maga, go kuga tape
naloaana pano inelu dua ki malo


6 tapu. Nalakena tamagida maga
eu dapiri, go eu mari tea waina
e sa namata ni Yehova Supe
anigida, go eu doropusi a, go eu
doa namatada pa dua ki malo
8 tokoana aneana. Nalakena
wanogoe namaetoana ki Yehova
e doko Yuda go Yerusalem, go
e pitua ki-da eu pei tea nadikiana
paki sara tokora, e pei namaaga-
ana go namaagapaana, dapale
waina ku punusi a ki namatamu.
9 Nalakena, kuga leo, tamagida
maga eu dowo ki lova, go natu-
gida naanoai go natugida nagoroi
go nagoroi anigida eu pei tea tape
pavakotokiana nalakena tea
18 wanogoe. Go eu sili paki ekopu
punusi Hezekia, go eu noa, Au
po mari nasuma ki Yehova e
30 dautau usuraki. Go kig Hezekia
go nawota maga eu pitipaki
Leviti maga naga euga samani
Yehova ki navasaana maga ki
David go ki Asaf tea gunea. Go
eu lega nasamasamaana ki nalae-
laeaana, go eu cusu ki napauda
po lotu.
1 Go Hezekia e dipaki lua pa
punusi Israel mamau go Yuda,
go e midiri tusi maga ma paki
Efraim go Manasse, naga euga
umai paki nasuma ki Yehova
waina e doko Yerusalem naga
euga mari paaska paki Yehova
2 Supe ki Israel. Nalakena kig go
naatamoli warua aneana maga
go nasaisaiana mamau ni Yeru-
salem eu pusumaki parati ki naga
euga mari paaska atelagi kerua.
3 Nalakena eu ko da mari atae mari
a ragi wanogoe nalakena tea viri
maga waina eu dumada dupugoro
ra eu ko da laapa patakana, go
narei eu ko da saisai Yerusalem.
4 Go naleo wanogoe e pia namata
ni kig go namata ni nasaisaiana
5 mamau. Go eu mari navasa-
dawanakiana naga euga rogorogo
pioso usuraki Israel mamau, pae
Beer-sheba pa pa paki Dan, naga
euga umai mari paaska paki Ye-
hova Supe ki Israel Yerusalem'.
nalakena eu da laapa waina eu
mari a pataka ni namidiri-
6 paratikiana. Go tea tipakilua-
ana eu dave pano, eu pua tusi
maga pae kig go naatamoti warua
maga pa usuraki Israel mamau go
Yuda, go, e pataka ni natipaki-
ana ki kig, e naga, Nimu Israel
natuna maga, kuga liliu paki
Yehova, Supe ki Abraham, Isaak
go Israel, naga nae e pe liliu paki
namagovae kakamu waina ku
sava dua ki nanielearu ni kig
7 maga ni Assiria. Go nimu kuga
ta dakiusi tamamu maga, go
dakiusi taimu maga waina eu
dapiri dipa Supe ki tamada maga,
go e pitua ki-da paki namarisaki-
ana, dakiusi waina ku punusi a.
8 Ragi waia kuga ta pei tea noa
casua, dakiusi tamamu maga ; ma
kuga tuihamu pitua ki mu paki
Yehova, go kuga sili nasuma tapu
aneana, waina e mari a ega vei
tea tapu vatoko, go kuga magi
Yehova Supe animu suasua naga
nameatoana pavaga aneana ega
9 tawasi pa duaki mu pano. Nala-
kena ku pe liliu paki Yehova,
taimu maga go natumu maga euga
wo sua nadodumiana narae ni tea
maga waina eu piragi lua pava-
koto ki-da, go euga wo moro umai
paid navanua waia; nalakena
Yehova Supe animu e pei saupia
go tea dodumi, go ega wo da doa
namatana pa dua ki mu, waina
ku pe tuihamu doa mu paki ma-
lt) Go tea tipakiluaana maga eu sava
pae taun paki taun usuraki
navanua ki Efraim go Manasse,
pa pa eu paki Zebulun: ma eu
muru saudoa ki-da, po paka mala-
-11 mala ki-da. Ma seara ni Asher
go Manasse, go ni Zebulun ,eu


duiliada doro ra paki tano, po
12 nmai paki Yerusalem. Go
namelearu ni Supe e doko Yuda
ma naga ega tua ra popo sikai-
maau, naga euga mari natipaki-
ana ki kig go nawota maga pae
13 navasaana ki Yehova. Go naata-
fholi laapa eu saisai Yerusalem
naga euga mari nakaniana ni
bred waina leven e dika asa
atelagi kerua, nasaisaiana lapa-
14 lapa pia. Go eu duleana po pua
lua wodo maga waina eu doko
Yerusalem, go eu dape lua wodo
laapa ni tea damo 1010, po nadi
ki-da paki noai sara ni Kedron.
15 Go eu mari punue lam ni paaska
naaleatia kerualima sikai tamate
' pati ni atelagi kerua : go tea viri
maga go Levite maga eu malieri,
go eu dumada dapugoro ra, go eu
piragi naviriana maga ni nata-
parakiana umai paki nasuma ki
16-Yehova. Go eu lawodu tokora
adeara pae tagona adeara, e
pataka ni navasatawanakiana ki
Moses naatamoli ki Supe: tea
viri maga eu meseura ki nada
waina eu dape a pae namelearu
17 ni Levite maga. Nalakena eu
laapa doko nasaisaiana waina eu
da duihada dapugoro ra, nala-
kena wanogoe Levite maga eu
dape parati ki nawosiana ni
namarxpunueana ni naviriana m
paaska agi sara naata waina eu
da dautau, naga euga magi Ye-
-18 hova dapugoro ra. Nalakena
nalaapaana ni narei, tea ni
Efraim go Manasse, Issakargo
Zebulun eu ko da dumada mari
ra eu dautau, ma eu gani naviri-
ana ni paaska pano pota ki tea
waina e pei tea midiri paratiki-
ana. Nalakena Hezekia e
madeara dapasavasa, e naga, Ye-
hova wia, pa magi sara naata
19 kakada midoaki korokoro, waina
e doro napopona dapale ega laaga
Supe, Yehova, Supe ki tamana
maga, mi waina e ko da pei tea
mari dautaukiana pataka ni
namaridautaukiana ni nasuma
20 dapu. Go Yehova e daki dorogo
Hezekia, go e mari pauri narei.
21 Go Israel natuna maga waina eu
doko Yerusalem eu mari nakani-
ana ni bred waina leven e dika
asa naaleatia larua ki nalaelaea-
ana lapa: go Levite maga go tea
viri maga eu do lega sikoti tea
tovi nalegaana paki Yehova sara
22 naaleatia. Go Hezekia e pasa
pakavakale paki Levite maga
waina eu mari atae mari mataki
nalotuana ki Yehova. Go eu do
ganikani usuraki nakaniana
naaleatia larua, eu do pitua ki
naviriana maga ni natamateana,
go eu do noa sai (namarinalosa-
ana) paki Yehova Supe ki tamada
23 maga. Go nasaisaiana mamau eu
pasa parati ki nia naga euga moro
doko raki nia naaleatia larua; go
eu moro doko raki nia naaleatia
24 larua ki nalaelaeaana. Nalakena
Hezekia kig ni Yuda e dua nasai-
saiana bulok manu • sikai go
manu larua ni shiip ; go na-
wota maga eu dua nasaisaiana
manu sikai ni bulok go manu
rualima sikai ni shiip; go tea
viri maga waina eu dumada
25 dapugoro ra eu laapa. Go
nasaisaiana mamau ni Yuda,
nara ma tea viri maga go Levite
maga, go nasaisaiana mamau
waina eu dave Israel umai,, go
tea ni nalauna pota maga waina
eu dave navanua ni Israel umai,
go tea maga'waina eu doko Yuda
26 eu laelaea. Dapale nogoe nalae-
laeana lapa e doko Yerusalem;
nalakena pae ragi ni Solomon
natu ni David kig ki Israel tea
dakiusi a e da doko Yerusalem.
27 Ragi wanogoe tea viri waina eu
- pei Levite maga eu duleana po


pasa mataki narei; go nadaleoda
© pei tea rogoana, go nadapasa-
vasaana adeara e sake umai paki
malo tokoana dapu aneana waina
e pei nakoroatelagi.
SENNAKERIB E PA CALAWI
KOKOI Nl NAVANUA.
1 Go © doko natau ketolu ki
Hoshea natu ni Ela kig ki Israel
naga Hezekia natu ni Ahaz kig
3 ki Yuda e dalak© maramara. Go
e mari tea waina e pia namata
ni Yehova, © pataka ni tea laapa
waina David tamana e mari a
4 E dap© lua malo pakilagi maga.
e mari pori nunu maga, go © dae
lua napea, go e mari poriwori
niata ni bras waina Moses e pea

NASASANAANA KI HEZEKIA.
1 Naaleatia maga wanogoe Heze-
kia e sasana paki namateana, go
Isaia profeta natu ni Amos e
umai punusi a, go e noa ki nia,
Yehova e noa dapale nea, e naga,
pa toro melei nalo ni nasuma
anigo; nalakena pa wo mate, go
2pa ta mauri. Go e doa nama-
tana paki namalo ni nasuma, go
o datago paki Yehova, e naga,
3 Ragi waia pa midoaki, Yehova
O, a pavarani ko asa, dapale
waina a surata naraema doko
nalomauana, go ki napopogu
mamau, go a mari tea waina e
pia naraema. Go Hezekia e cai
lapalapa.
4 Go e doko pea ki waina Isaia
e inelu dua ki maleoputo ni taun
naga navasaana ki Yehova e
5 umai paki nia, e naga, pa liliu,
go pa noa ki Hezekia tea maraki
naataiholi aginau, Yehova, Supe
ki tamaina David e noa dapale
nea, e naga, A dogo natatagoana
anigo, go a punusi naririmatama:
pa leo, aga wo mari pauri ko:
naaleatia ketplu pa wo sake paki
6 nasuma ki Yehova pano. Go
aga wo sokari naaleatia anigo
maga ki natau rualima sikai
tamate lima; go aga wo mauti
ko go taun waia pa dua ki
namelearu ni kig ni Assiria; go
aga wo palugoro taun waia nala-
kena kinau go nalakena David
7 tea suasua agina. Go Isaia e
noa, pa tape namolimoliana sikai
ni napuliva. Go eu dape apo
doro e e doko toopu, go e po pia.

Yehova ega wo mari pauri au,
go naga aga sake sili nasuina ki

pei navaivaiana pae Yehova,
naga Yehova ega wo mari tea
waina e noa e (Ko masauna) naga
meluna eg a risu pano vavadu
rualima sikai, kita ega liliu

1 Yosia e pei tea ni natau latolu
ragi waina e dalake maramara,
go e maramara doko Yerusalem
natau rualima dolu tamate sikai,

ni Yehova, o surata pae napua

lagi maga, go ki napea maga, go

maga ki tea maga waina eu mari

raki navatu maga ki tea viri

mari Yuda go Yerusalem e dau-
-6 tau. Go e mari dapale nogoe

ragi waina © mari sua mari

ni taun, go Yoa natu ni Yoahaz

18 hova. Go Hilkia e dua Shafan

NAVIRAGILU’AANA PAKI
BABILONIA.
1 Go naatamoli ni navanua eu
pua Yehoahaz natu ni Yosia, go
eu mari a e pei kig e du oli
2 tamana Yerusalem. Yehoahaz e
pei tea ni natau rualima dua
tamate e dolu ragi waina e
dalake maramara; go © mara-
mara atelagi e dolu Yerusalem.
3 Go kig ni Ecipt e dape lua
naveinawotaana kiana doko
Yerusalem, go e noa nasaraana
paki navanua, euga vitua ki
talenta ni silver ponotia sikai, go
4 talenta ni cold e sikai. Go kig
ni Ecipt e mari taina Eliakam e
pei kig dapau Yuda go Yeru-
salem, go e.salagisana Yehoiakim,
go Neko e pua taina Yoahaz po
piragi lua e paki Ecipt.
5 Yehoiakim e pei tea ni natau
rualima dua tamate lima ragi
waina e dalake maramara, go e
do maramara doko Yerusalem
natau rualima sikai tamate
sikai: go e mari tea waina esa
namata ni Yehova Supe aneana.
6 Nebukadnezzar kig ni Babilonia
e sake umai dipa e, go e soli
parali ki nia ki vakamori ni
kopper, naga ega viragi lua e
8 paki Babilonia. Go Yehoiakin
natuna aneana e maramara du
-9 Yehoiakin e mari tea waina e
10 sa namata ni Yehova. Go natau
matua Nebukadnezzar e dipaki
lua po piragi lua e paki Babi-
lonia pilaki lasa wia maga ni
nasuma ki Yehova. go e mari
taina Zedekia e pei kig dapau
11 Yuda go Yerusalem. Zedekia e
pei tea ni natau rualima dua
tamate sikai ragi waina e dalake
maramara; go e maramara natau
rualima sikai tamate sikai Yeru-
12 salem. Go e mari tea waina e
sa namata ni Yehova Supe ane-
ana, go e da dumana doro e paki
tano narae ni proveta Yeremia
waina e pasa pae nagole ni
13 Yehova. 'Go e moro mari
pauluulu dipa kig Nebukadnezzar
waina e pea mari a e pivisa pae
Supe: ma e letea ki nakau daleo
aneana, go e mari napopona •
casua naga ega ta dumana doa
e paki Yehova Supe ki Israel.


1 Go e doko natau keloviti ni
namarakiana aneana, atelagi
kerualima, naaleatia kerualima
ni atelagi naga Nebukadnezzar
kig ni Babilonia ma navara nava-
kalo aneana, eu rumai dipa
Yerusalem, go eu sike natapau-
pauana dipa e, go eu davagi malo
vavatuana maga davivi ki nia.
2 Go taun e pei tea kelugoroana
pa pa paki natau kerualima sikai
3 tamat© sikai ki kig Zedekia. Go
naaleatia keloviti ni atelagi
kevati navitoloana © po sa pa
doko taun, navinaga ki narei ni
4 navanua © dika. Go eu poka sai
namata sikai paka ni taun, go
naatamoli navakalo laapa eu sava
pogi pae napua ni namata pua
namasova ni nakorovatu dua,
waina e doko pisari carden ki
kig (tea ni Kaldea eu doko dipa
taun davivi ki nia): go kig e
pano pae napua ni naoneone.

animu waina e doko Yerusalem.
18 Go tea waina nimu ma taima
maga kuga vunusi e pia naga
kuga kasa ki silver go cold waina
e ko doko kuga wo mari a ega
vataka ni namasauana ki Supe
9 animu. Go lasa maga waina eu
pei tea vituakiana paki-go, tea
ni nasuma ki Supe anigo, pa
vitua ki-da nara© ni Supe ni
20 Yerusalem. Go te navatuna pota
seara waina ega wo moro pataka
ni nasuma ki Supe anigo, waina

pa vitua ki nia pae nasuma
21 tauakiana ki kig. Go kinau

sogiana paki tea lo narati ki nalo
casua rnaga waina eu doko liu
matele kerua ni noai sara waina

wanakiana ki Supe ni nakoro-
atelagi ega noa ki mu asa ega
vei tea mariana ki namarekare-
22 kaana, pa pa ega vei talenta ni
silver ponotia sikai, go totowo
ni wit ponotia sikai, go wain
pa pa ega vei bath ponotia sikai,

ponotia sikai, go totowo ni
natasimena ega ta pei tea

naleo waina © pei tea vitipakiana
ki Supe ni nakoroatelagi ega vei

nalakena ecasana te namaetoana

natuna naanoai aneana maga ?

25 namuriana ni napua kiada. Go

waina eu atae natipakiana maga
ki Sup© anigo; go te naata waina

26 asa. Go te naata waina e pe ta
suasua mari natipakiana ki Supe

maga, kita navaratiana ni

eu pei tea totowokiana paki
34 nasuma ki Supe anigida; tea

-35 ana ragi wanogoe. Natu ni tea
viragiluaana waina eu po umai

pitua ki naviriana ni nataparaki-
-36 ana paki Supe ki Israel. Go eu
dua satrap maga natipakiana
maga ki kig, go eu moro dua tea
maramara maga ni matele kerua
ni noai sara: go nara eu silae
narei go tea ni nasuma ki Supe.
128.
NATAVAGIANA NI
YERUSALEM.
1 Navasaana maga ki Nehemia
natu ni Hakalia.

natau kerualima dua, ragi waina
2 a doko Shushan palas, naga
Hanani taigu sikai kakada, ©
umai, nara ma te seara ni Yuda;
go a pisuusu ki-da nalo ni Yu
maga waina eu ihelu pano, eu pa
dua ki tea maga waina eu ko
doko, tea viragisokiana maga, go
3 nalo ni Yerusalem. Go eu noa
ki nau, eu naga, Namagovai ni
tea viragiluaana waina eu doko
navanua (wanogoe) eu doko
nasaana warua, go namalieriana :
go paka ma ni Yerusalem e
pevera, go namata pua maga
kakana eu pei tea taparakiana ki
4 nakapu. Go e doko, ragi waina
a dogo navasaana maga waia naga
a doko natano, go a dapasavava
narae ni Supe ni nakoroatelagi po
5 noa, A pavarani ko Yehova, O,
Supe ni nakoroatelagi, waina ko
pei Sup© warua go tea matauki-

go nasaupiaana paki tea maga
waina eu dodumi a go waina eu
dape soki natipakiana aneana

ega taki dorogo go namatama ega
1010 naga pa rogo navavaraniana
ki tea suasua aiiigo, waina a

go pogi, nalo ni Israel natuna

waina au mari naleo sa dipa ko:

ko, nadaligaina ega taki dorogo

tea tape lasa munu ki kig.)
1 Go e doko atelagi ni. Nisan,
natau kerualima dua (ni namara-
kiana) ki kig Artakserkses naga,
ragi waina wain e doko naraena,

kig asa. Ada pea pisigoro susue
2 naraena. Go kig e noa ki nau,
e naga, Ecasana nasusueana e
doko namatama, go ko da
masaki ? Tea waia e da pei tea
3 pota ma napoposusueana. Go a
po mataku sa. Go a noa ki kig,
a naga, Kig ega mauri doko mau;

pua kakana maga eu pei tea
4 taparakiana ki nakapu ? Go kig
e noa ki nau, e naga, K’o masau
nasava ? Go a dapasavasa paki
5 Supe ni nakoroatelagi. Go a noa
ki kig, Kig e pe suasua, go tea
suasua anigo e pe sua nakitamata-
kiana naraema, naga pa tipaki
lua au pa punusi Yuda, paki taun
ni tanonia maga ki tamagu maga,

ki nia (kvin ma e doko pisari a)

seve ragi 1 Go kig e suasua pia
dipaki lua au, go a pasa parati

vavatuana waina e pei tea ni

aga wo doko asa. Go kig e

1 Ma e doko ragi waina San-
ballat e dogo naga au do davagi
paka e maeto, go napopona e
cokona lapa, go e saudoa Yu
2 maga. Go e pasa narae ni taina
maga go, navara navakalo ni
Samaria, go e noa, Yu mamisi
maga waia eu do wosi nasava?
euga tuinada paka-goro ra ? euga
mari naviriana ? euga mari sua
e naaleatia sikaimaau, kita ?
masa euga moro paka mauri ki
vatu maga pakasa ki taua ni
namasogosogo waina eu pei tea
3 taparakiana sua, kita? Go Tobia
nawora ni Ammon e sikoti a
doko, go nae e noa, Nalo ni tea
waina eu davagi a, te foks sikai
e pe sake asa ega wo dakai paka
4 ni vatu adeara. pa rogo, Supe
aginami, O; nalakena au pei tea
mamaragokiana: go pa vua - doa
navasasakiana adeara ega liliu
paki napauda: go pa vitua ki-
da euga vei tea saluaana navanua
sni naviragilua-pavakotoana: go
pa ta kovagoro nasigisigileoana
adeara, go, namarinalosaana
adeara ega ta pei tea kasiluaana
naraefna; nalakena eu mari paka
dali ko narae ni tea tavagi maga.
6 Go au davagi paka; go paka e
pei tea sokiana, e paki lagi e pei
namagovae potawotaana pia
kakana: nalakena e doko napopo
ni narei naga euga wosiwosi.

ballat, go Tobia, go tea ni
Arabia, go nawora ni Ammon,
go tea ni Ashdod, eu dogo naga
paka maga ni Yerusalem eu do
pei tea marisuaana, go naga malo
masai maga ni paka eu pei tea
mariponutiana, eu po maeto sa:

wo umai doko raaleoputo ki-da,
po mari punue ra, po mari
12 nawosiana ega maro. Go e doko,
ragi waina Yu maga waina eu

ki garni paka rualima, eu noa e

inasai maga, io, kinau a doro

maga, eu pua lova maga, naio
14 maga, go nasu maga. Go a 1010
punusi, po ■ duleana, go a noa
ki naatamoli warua maga, go tea
maramara maga, go naatamoli

mau: Kuga midoaki Yehova,
waina e parua go tea matauki-

natumu naanoai maga, go
natumu nagoroi maga, go nagoroi

15 Go e doko ragi waina tea
kokona ki garni eu dogo naga e

16 paki nawosiana aneana. Go e
doko pae ragi wanogoe pano,
naga namagovae ni tea suasua
aginau maga eu do posiwosi ki
nawosiana, go namagovae eu pua
naio, taleva, go nasu, go eu suni
sugoro naunu maga: go tea
maramara maga eu doko nataku
ni nasuma mamau ni Yuda.
17 Tea maga waina eu davagi paka
go tea maga waina eu dapetape
eu dumada pua natapetapeana,
sara naata kakada e posiwosi ki
nahielearuna sikai, go e pua
nalikau ki namelearuna kerua;

napisoana, go e do davagi dapale
nogoe. Go tea waina e do sui
paiga e sikoti au doko.

marisuaana naaleatia kerualima
dua tamate lima ni atelagi Elul
(eu posiwosi asa) naaleatia rua-

doko ragi waina tea kokona ki

ni nalauna pota laapa waina eu
doko davivi ki garni eu punusi a
naviviariana adeara e dowo, nala-
kena eu po midoaki atae naga
nawosiana waia e pei tea mariana
ki Supe aginami.
1 Go nawota maga ki narei eu
doko do Yerusalem: go tea pota

euga viragi sara naatamoli kerua-

koana tapu, go namagovae loviti
euga toko natokoana pota maga.

moli laapa waina eu dumada
pitua ki pia ki-da naga euga toko
Yerusalem.
27 Go ragi ni natapugoroana ni
paka ni Yerusalem eu laaga

1 Go e doko naaleatia maga ki
Ahasuerus (Ahasuerus waia
waine 6 maramara pae India pa
pa paki Etiopia, dapau namara-
maraana ponotia sikai rualima
takuna dua tamate larua).
3 Natau ketolu ni namarakiana
aneana e magi napau nawota
laapa aneana go tea suasua ane-
ana maga mari nakaniana sikai;
4 go e pisei ki nasogolapaana m
namarakiana ni nasamasamaana
aneana go natapetapeana ni
naveinawotaana wia liu aneana
doko naaleatia laapa, e pei
naaleatia ponotia sikai rualima
takuna latolu.
5 Go ragi waina naaleatia maga
wanogoe eu nopu kig e magi
naatamoli laapa waina eu doko
Shushan palas aneana mari
nakaniana sikai, agi tea warua
maga go agi tea kiki maga, e
doko naaleatia larua, e doko
roara ni carden ni palas ki kig;
6 tea likotiana dare, tea, namala-
kesa go tea kesakesa, eu pei tea
likotiana ki natali ni linen wia,
go tea miala kesakesa doko rig
maga ni silver go tipa ni marbel;
nawewele maromaroana eu pei
tea ni cold go silver dpko flor ni
marbel, tea miala, go tea kesa-
-7 kesa, go tea dare go tea loa. Go
eu dua ra eu munu pae lasa ni
cold (sara lasa e pano pota) go
wain ki kig nalo lapa, e pataka
ni navitua-paruaana ki kig.
9 Vashti kviin nae ma e magi
nagoroi maga mari nakaniana
sikai doko nasuma ni namaraki-
ana waina e pei tea ki kig
Ahasuerus.
10 Naaleatia kelarua waina
napopo ni kig e putavuta ki wain,
e dipaki lua tea suasua tana ri ki
H kig Ahasuerus, euga vua Vashti,
kviin umai narae ni kig pilaki
kraun ki kviin, naga ega visei ki
naatamoli maga go napau nawota
maga narae-wiaana aneana, nala-
kena e pei tea lo matakiana pia.
12 Ma kviin Vashti e carai umai pae
natipakiana ki kig pae tea, suasua
tana ri: tea waina kig e maeto
parua, go namaetoana aneana e
13 soro napalauna. Go kig e noa
ki naatamoli manu matua ane-
ana, waina eu atae ragi maga,
15 e naga, Tuga mari dapale sava
paki kviin Vashti waina e pataka
nawotaeana, nalakenae e da mari
natipakiana ki kig Ahasuerus pae
16 tea suasua tana ri maga? Go
Menukan e pasa dara narae ni
kig go narae ni napau-nawota
19 maga, e naga, E pe vei tea
midoaki matakiana ki kig; pa
vitua ki natipakiana ki kig ega
tave asa pano go pa mari a ega
vei tea midiri paratikiana ega
sari navasadawanakiana ki tea ni
Persia go Media, naga ega ta pei
tea mariana ega vano pota naga
Vashti ega ta more umai narae
ni kig Ahasuerus; go kig ega
vitua ki naveikviinana paki tea
pota sikai waina e pia liu-sa.
21 Go navasaana wanogoe e pei
tea rogomatakiana ki kig go
napau nawota maga; go kig e
mari a pataka ni navasaana ki
Menukan.
2 Go tea suasua maga ki kig
waina eu do silae a eu noa ki nia,
eu naga, E pia euga magi kig
laaga naatara loihatakiana
4 maga; go naatara waina e magi
kig pei tea midoakimatakiana ega

wanogoe e pei tea midoakimata-

nogoe.

maga waina Nebukadnezzar kig

tamana kita pilana, go naatara

ana go navasakisogiana ki kig e

nasuma ki kig, paki naloparatiki-
ana ki Hecai, tea tape parati ki
9 nagoroi maga. Go naatara
wanogoe e maneana pei tea
midoaki-matakiana, go e sua
nasaupiaana kiana; go e puati
a ma nagoroi suasua larua ane-
ana paki malo wia liu ni nasuma
10 ki nagoroi maga. Ester eda noa
sai paki naatamoli aneana kita
namatarau aneana: nalakena
Mordekai e pasa parati ki nia

atae Ester e doko dapale sava,

18 oli Vashti. Ragi wanogoe kig e

pei tea likotiana doko nakau: go

tusi namidirisokiana narae ni
1 Edaku ki tea maga waia kig
Ahasuerus e pua dakati Hainan,
tea ni Acac, po dape a sake, po
doro toko aneana liu napau
nawota laapa waina eu sikoti a
2 doko. Go tea suasua laapa b
kig, waina eu doko roara ni

natano, po dapetape Hainan:

ma Mordekai e da suai natano,
3 kita dapetape a. Tea waina tea


suasua maga ki kig, waina eu

5 ra naga e pei Yu sikai. Go ragi

9 inadoko. E pe vei tea kita-
matakiana ki kig, go pa mari a

12 Ragi wanogoe tea midiri maga

1 Ragi waina Mordekai ©po atae
sara naleo waina e pei tea mari-
suaana, Mordekai e sie porai

avu, go © dave pano paki maleo-
puto ni taun, ■go e cai ki
2 nakaiana lapa go madaga; go e

ki kig; nalakena e da pei tea

sili pae namata pua ki kig waina
3 e suni sugoro ni sak. Go sara
matele ni navanua waina nati-
pakiana go navasakisogiana ki


kig e umai asa nalalagarovaana

dua e navasaana paki Mordekai,

TAUA N1 SHIIP KI YOB (131).


1 Go e doko naaleatia. ketolu,
naga Ester e suni sugoro ni
navei-kviin-ana, go e lawo du
roara tukugoroana pitata ni
nasuma ki kig, go kig e dasake
toko tapu aneana nasuma ni kig,
pitata ni namata sili ni nasuma.
2 Go e doko ragi waina kig e
punusi kviin Ester e lawo du
roara ni nasuma, naga e pei tea
midoaki matakiana naraena, go
kig e sai ki septer ni cold waina
e doko namelearuna raki Ester.
Go Ester e disu paki maladigi,
go e cisi dogo namata pagona
ni septer.
3 Go kig e noa ki nia, Ko masau
nasava, kviin Ester ? go nasava
e pei natatagoana anigo ? ega wo
pei tea vituakiana paki-go pa pa
• e pe vei nawotawotapiaana ni
4 namarakiana. Go Ester e noa.
Waina e pe vei tea midoaki mata-
kiana ki kig, e pia kig go Haman
eroga umai masoso waia paki
nakaniana waina a maneaua mari
5 mataki nia. Go kig e nca, Kuga
mari maraverave pua Haman
umai, naga ega vei tea mariana
ega vataka ni tea waina Ester
e noa e. Go kig go Haman ero
umai paki nakaniana waina
Ester e mari mataki nia.
6 Go kig e noa ki Ester ragi ni
nakaniana (waina eu munu wain
asa) Nasava waina e pei natata-
goana anigo ? go ega wo pei tea
vituakiana : go ko masau nasava ?
ega wo manigo pei tea mariana
pa pa paki nawotawotapiaana ni
7 namarakiana. Ragi wanogoe
Ester e pasa dara, po noa,
Natatagoana go namasauana agi-
nau e pei tea waia : waina e pe
vei dapale waina a pe sua
namidoaki iiiatakiana narae ni
kig, go kig e pe masauna naga
ega tua au natatagoana aginau,
go naga ega mari namasauana
aginau, go kig ma Haman eroga
umai paki nakaniana waina aga
madeara mari mataki nia, go
matamai aga wo mari pataka ni
tea waina kig e noa sua e.
9 Naaleatia wanogoe Haman e
dave pano, e laelaea go napopona
e pia; ma ragi waina Haman e
punusi Mordekai e doko namata
ni nasuma ki kig, go e da mane-
ana duleana kita parivari e pura
ki namaetoana dipa Mordekai.
10 Ma Haman e popo soki, po paki
kiana pano; go o dipaki lua, po
soso tana ri maga go anagoroi
11 Zerish. Go Haman e rogorogo
paki-da nasamasamaana ni naso-
golapaana aneana, go nalaapaana
ni natuna maga, go sara naleo
waina kig e dape dakati a asa,
go dapale waina e puati a sake
liu sara napau nawota maga, go
12 tea suasua maga ki kig. Go
Haman e moro noa, lore, go
Ester kviin e da suasua ki to
naanoai ega sili sikoti kig paki
nakaniana waina e mari mataki
nia ma kinau a masikinau : go e
moro pitautau au aga sikoti kig
13 matamai. Ma sara naleo waina
e da maginau pia kite navatuna
ragi waina a punusi Mordekai
Yu waia waina e doko namata
ni nasuma ki kig.
14 Go Zeresh anagoroi go tana ri
laapa eu noa ki nia, pa mari
nakau likoti naatamoli sikai ega
vei tea sikeana waina e paki lagi
kubit rualima lima, go matamai
pa vasa ki kig naga Mordekai
ega vei tea likotiana asa: go pa
wo sikoti kig sili paki nakaniana
ki napopolaolaoana. Go tea
wanogoe e magi Haman pei tea
midoaki matakiana: go e mari
nakau likoti naatamoli e pei tea
mariana.


130.
MORDEKAI E PEI TEA
TAPETAPEANA.
1 Napogi wanogoe kig e mari sa
maturu, go © pitipaki naga euga
viragi umai tusi ni namidiripara-
tikiana ni narogorogoana tuai
maga; go eu per tea veveana paki
2 kig. Go eu pasai e pei tea
midiriana asa, naga Mordekai e
noa sai nalo ni tea suasua dua
ki kig, tea lo parati ki namata,
waina eu laaga naga eroga nadi
ki nahielearuda kig Ahasuerus.
3 Go kig e noa, Seve natapetape-
ana go natape dakatiana e magi
Mordekai pei tea mariana nala-
kena tea waia ? Go tea suasua
ki kig waina eu do silae a eu
noa, Navatuna e da maneana pei
4 tea mariana mau. Go kig © noa,
Sei e doko roara ni esuma ? Go
Haman © po umai paki roara
edaku ni nasuma ki kig, naga
ega vasa ki kig nalo ni waina
ega likoti Mordekai ega toko
nakau likoti naatamoliana, waina
5 e maneana mari mataki nia. Go
tea suasua maga ki kig eu noa
ki nia, pa leo Haman e doko
roara ni esuma. Go kig e noa,
6 Kuga vuati a paki ekopu. Go
Haman © sili paki ekopu. Go
kig e noa ki nia, e naga, Nasava
ega wo pei tea mariana paki
naata waina kig e laelaea dape-
tap© a? Go Haman e noa napo-
pona, Sei waina kig e pe laelaea
7 dapetape a liu au ? Go Haman
e noa ki kig, Agi naatamoli
waina kig e laelaea dapetape a,
8 e pia sugoro ni navei-kig-ana
waina kig e do suni a ega vei tea
viragiana umai, go hors waina
kig e do pSgi nia, go waina kraun
ni navcikigana e doko napauna:
9 go pa mari sugoro go hors ega
vei tea vituakiana paki name-
learu ni nawota liu sikai ki kig,
naga euga sugoro naatamoli asa
waina kig e laelaea dapetape a,
go ega vagi hors duaduru striit
ni taun, go euga vioso naraena,
Dapale nea ega wo pei tea mari-
ana paki naatamoli waina kig e

ki Hainan, pa mari maraverave,
go pa tap© sugoro go hors ega
vataka ni waina ko noa e, go pa
mari ©ga tapale nogo© paki
Mordekai Yu waina, waina e
doko natano narae ni namata ni
. nasuma ki kig; navatuna seara
ni tea waina ko noa e ega ta dowo

go hors, go e sugoro Mordekai
asa, go e mari a e pagi hors dua-

mariana ega tapale nea paki
naatamoli • waina kig e laelaea
dapetape a.

namata ni lina ki kig, Ma
Haman e mari maraverave paki

9 narae ni kig go kviin. Go
Harbona, tea suasua sikai

10 du nasuma ki Haman. Go kig
e noa, Kuga likoti a asa. Go
eu likoti Haman nakau likoti
naataiholiana waina e magi
Mordekai mari mataki nia. Go
namaetoana ki kig e po maro.
1 Naaleatia wanogoe kig Aha-
suerus e dua kviin Ester nasuma
ki Haman tea kokona ki Yu
maga. Go Mordekai e umai doko
narae ni kig ; nalakena Ester e
noa ki sua e tea waina nae e pei
2 paki nia. Go kig e dape lua
rig aneana waina e pua lua e
ki Haman, go e dua Mordekai
asa. Go Ester e doro Mordekai
e doko dapau nasuma ni Haman.
3 Go Ester ,© moro pasa narae ni
kig sala kerua, ’ e suai natano
pisari natuana, po pavarani ki
naririmatana naga ega tape lua
navivilosiana ki Haman, go
namidoaki-dawanakiana waina e
4 midoaki nia dipa Yu maga. Go
kig e sai ki septer ni cold paki
Ester. Go Ester e duleana, po
5 lawo du narae ni kig. Go e noa,
Waina e pe magi kig pei tea
midoaki matakiana, go waina a
pe sua nasaupiaana naraena, go
waina naleo e pei tea midoakiana
naga e leana namata ni kig, go
waina kinau a pe vei tea midoaki-
matakiana naraena, pa mari a
ega vei tea midiri paratikiana
naga letter maga waina Haman
e midoaki dawanaki nia ega vei
6 tea tapedoaana ki kig: nalakena
kinau aga mari atae popo soki po
punusi tea sa waina ega va parati
ki naatamoli aginau maga ? go
aga mari atae popo soki po
punusi namarisasakiana ni nama-
-7 tarau aginau ? Ragi wanogoe kig
Ahasuerus e noa ki kviin- Ester
go ki Yu Mordekai, Koroga leo,
a dua Ester nasuma ki Haman,
go nae e pei tea likoti-sua-ana
nakau likoti naataiholiana, nala-
kena e doro naihelearuna e doko
BYu maga. Nimu ma koroga
midiri paki Yu maga, ega vataka,
ni waina koro. punusi a e pia,
pae nagisa ni kig, po puluti soki
a ki rig ki kig : nalakena te nami-
diriana waina e pei tea midiriana
pae nagisa, ni kig, go e pei tea

1 Namanumatuana e da do

22 Yehova © peani au ragi ni namata

23 A pei tea sikeana pae ragi
vatoko, pea ki waina maramana
24 e doko. A paki lina ragi waina
epua maga eu ko da doko; ragi
waina namata noai maga eu ko

133.
PA MIDOAKI TEA TAWANA
KI-GO.
1 pa midoaki Tea Tawana ki-go
ragi ni navei-tea-vusavusaana
anigo, pea ki waina naaleatia sa
eu ko da umai, go natau maga
eu disu paki maladigi, waina pa
wo noa, a da masau ra mau;
2 waina elo, go namarama, go
atelagi, go masoe maga, eu ko da
do maligo, go napopouru maga
eu ko da liliu edaku ki usa:
3 naaleatia waina tea loparati ki
nasufha euga wo durururu, go
naatamoli casua maga euga wo
cusu, go tea mama navinaga
euga maro, nalakena eu po pisa
mau, go tea 1010 duru windo
4 maga eu do maligo, go namata
pua dua ni striit ero pei tea
kokoroana, waina nadaleo ni tea
mama kom e po kiki, ega sake
dakiusi nadaleo ni sparrow, go
nadaleo ni nagoroi lega maga ega


wo pei tea viragiana paki tano,
5 lore euga wo matau ki nasakesa-
keana, go narururuana e doko
napua; go nagae e puma, go
midiri ega sukasuka pano, go
nawa ni kaper eg a ta more meda-
meda, nalakeua naatamoli e melu
pano paki malo-toko-parauana
aneana, go tea tagi rnaga eu do
6 surata napua : pea ki waina
natali ni silver e makoto, go lasn
ni cold e mawora, kita lasa e
mawora pisari namata noai, kita
7 wiil e mawora pisari wel, go
namotamota e liliu paki natano
dakiusi e doko sala vea, go
naatana e liliu pa punusi Supe
8 waina © pitua ki nia. Napalo-
ana ni napaloana, tea Tapavanau
e noa ©; e pei napaloana mau.
13 Tea waia, e pei nanopuana ni
naleo, tea mamau e pei tea rogo-
ana sua; pa matau ki Supe, po
dogo parati ki natipakiana • ane-
ana maga: nalakena tea waia e
pei tea mamau waina e one naata-
-14 moli one naga ega mari a. Nala-
kena Sup© ega wo pua sara
nawosiana paki navasapotaeana
pilake sara paia, waina e pe wia
kita © pe sa.

15 Nalakena Tea Vakilagi, go Tea

vatoko, waina nagisana e pei

waina naatana © maworawora go
paki tano, naga aga moro paka

3 Eu noa ecasana au pali, go
nigo ko da punusi a ? "Ecasana
au parati naatagami, go nigo
ko da midoaki nia ? Kuga leo,

I .ASA KI TEA WOSI LASA NI
NATANO.
1 Navasaana waina e pae Ye-
liova umai paki Yeremia, e naga,
2 J>a tuleana, go pa siwo pano paki
nasuma. ki tea wosi lasa ni
natano, go tokora wanogoe aga
wo mari ko pa wo dogo navasa-
-3 ana aginau maga. Go a siwo
pano paki nasuina ki tea wosi
lasa ni natano, go, kuga leo, e
mari nawosiana aneana e doko
4 wil maga. Go ragi waina lasa
waina e mari a ki natano e sa
doko namelearu ni tea mari lasa,
e more mari a © pei lasa pota,
e mari a © pataka ni tea waina
5 tea mari lasa e masauna. Go
navasaana ki Yehova e umai paki
nau, e naga, Nasuina ni Israel,
6 O, kinau a mari sa mari a paki-
go dakiusi waina tea wosi lasa

noa e. Kuga leo, dakiusi natano
waina e doko namelearu ni tea
wosi lasa, mmu ma, nasuma ni
Israel, O, ku dapale nogoe doko
7 namelearugu. Waina a pe vasa
nalo ni te nalauna go nalo ni te
namarakiana, naga a pe vaku
lua e, go naga a pe mari porac
a, go a pe mari sa ki nia;
8 nalauna wanogoe nalo ni waina
a pasa sua e pe mara doa pa
dua ki tea sa adeara, kinau aga
midoaki piri nalo ni tea waina
9 a naga aga mari a paki-da. Go
waina a pe vasa nalo ni te
nalauna sikai go nalo ni te
namarakiana, naga aga tavagi a
10 go naga aga lawo soki a; waina
e pe mari naleo sa naraegu,
waina e pe ta dogo parati ki
nadaleogu, go kinau aga midoaki
piri nalo ni tea wia waina a noa
naga aga mari pia ki-da asa.
1 Yehova e noa dapale nea, pa
vano, go pa vacotovi bottel sikai
ni natano ki tea wosi lasa ni
natano, go pa vua elder seara
kakada ni narei, go elder seara

paki napalea ki natu ni Hinon,

sai tokora wanogoe navasaana
maga waina aga wo noa ki-go:

ki Yehova, kig maga, 0, ni Yuda,

-4 gana ega wo ciakia. Nalakena

ni naataiholi maga waina eu

NAVEA-NOASAIANA PAE
YEREMIA. I.
1 Ragi ni natalakeana ni
namarakiana ki Yehoiakim natu
ni Yosia, kig ni Yuda, navasaana
waia e pae Yehova umai,
e naga, Yehova e noa dapale nea:
2 pa lawodu roara vea ni nasuma
ki Yehova, po pasa ki taun laapa
ni Yuda, waina eu do umai lotu
nasuma ki Yehova, navasaana


laapa waina a pitipaki-go naga
pa vasa ki-da asa. pa ta mauti
3 navasaana sikaimaau. Eu pe wo
daki dorogo, go sara naata
kakada e pe wo mara doa pa dua
ki napua sa aneana: naga aga
rmuoaki piri tea sa, waina a
midoaki soki naga aga mari a
paki-da nalakena nasaana ni
4 namariana adeara. Go nigo pa
wo noa ki-da, po naga, Yehova
© noa dapal© nea; Ku pe ta
daki dorogo au, naga kuga surata
pa© natawanakiana, waina a doro
5 e o doko narae mu, naga kuga
taki dorogo navasaana ki tea sua-
sua aginau maga, profeta maga,
waina a dipaki lua ra pa punusi
mu, — ma ku da daki dorogo;
6. go aga wo mari nasuma waia ega
takiusi Shilo, go aga wo mari
taun waia ega vei tea vasasakiana
agi nalauna laapa ni maramana.

niaga go narei laapa eu dogo
Yeremia e pasa navasaana maga
8 waia nasuma ki Yehova. Go e
doko ragi waina Yeremia e pasa
sua sara naleo waina Yehova e
dipaki nia naga ega vasa asa
paki narei, naga tea viri go pro-
feta maga go narei laapa eu pua
parati ki nia, eu noa, Lomau
9 nigo pa wo mate. Ecasana ko
profesai pae nagisa ni Yehova,
po noa, Nasuma waia ega wo
dakiusi Shilo, go taun waia ega
wo pei malo palo, naata toko
euga wo dika ara ? Go naata-
moli laapa eu saisai dipa Yeremia
nasuma ki Yehova.
10 Go ragi waina nawota maga ni
Yuda eu dogo tea maga waia, eu
sake umai pae nasuma ki kig
paki nasuma ki Yehova; go eu
doko natano malo sili ni namat.i
vaou ni nasuma ki Yehova.

profeta maga eu pasa ki nawota

namateana; nalakena © profesai

waina © pia go leana namatamu.

Yob eu pe toko asa (e pei lomau),

pe ta mauti natuda naanoai ki
natuda nagoroi; euga wo mauti
namauriana adeara niau ki
namarinaleoleanaana adeara.
1 Navasaana ki Yehova e moro
2 umai paki nau, e naga, Nimu
ku midoaki nasava, waina ku do

e pei tea aginau: naatana waina

namarinalotageleana, go waina e

navasapotaeana aginau maga, go
© surata navasapotaeana aginau
maga, nae ega wo da mate dipa
namaritageleana ki tamana, nae
ega wo mauri lomau.
19 Ma nimu ku naga, Ecasana
natuna ega ta dapetape nasigi-
sigileoana ki tamana ? Ragi
waina natuna e mari a pae
natipakiana go tea waina e
leana, go e dape soki sara
navasadawanakiana aginau maga,
go e mari ra, nae ega wo
20 mauri lomau. Naatana waina
e mari naleo sa, nae ega
wo mate: natuna ©ga wo da dape-
tape namaritageleana ki tamana,
go tamana ega wo da dapetape
namarinaleosaana ki natuna:

ega wo doko asa, go nasigisigileo-
ana ki tea sigisigileo ega wo doko

doa pa dua ki sara namarinalosa-

aginau maga po mari a pae nati


pakiana go waina e leana, nae
e'ga wo mauri loraau, ega. wo da
22 mate mau. Natapiriana aneana

pei tea midoakiana dipa e mau:
nae ega wo mauri doko namarina-
loleanaana aneana waina © mari
23 ra. Namateana ki tea sigisigileo
e maginau pei tea kitamatakiana,
kita ? Yehova Supe e noa e: ma
a masauna naga ega liliu pa dua
ki napua aneana maga, po mauri.
24 Ma ragi waina tea leana e mara
doa melu dua ki namarinaloleana-
ana aneana, po mari namarina-
leotageleana, go e mari pataki ni
sara namamaragokiana maga
waina naatamoli marinalotagele e
do mari a, nae ega wo mauri,

waina © mari sua ra seara ©uga
wo da pei tea midoakiana; nae

aneana. waina e dapiri asa, go
doko namarinalosaana waina e

30 Tea waina aga wo pasapotae
mu, nasuma ni Israel, O, sara
naata ega vataka ni napua ane-
ana maga, Yehova Supe e noa e.
Kuga liliu, po dumamu doa mu
pa dua ki natapiriana animu
maga; naga nasigisigileoana ega

NOAI NI NAMAURIANA.
1 Go e puati au liliu paki namata
ni nasuma; go kuga leo, noai
maga eu putaputa umai pae melu
ni nakau vacalawi paki ist, nala-
kena nasuma e 1010 paki ist; go
noai maga eu siwo umai pae
etano, pae matele ni matua, paki
2 south ni wodo. Go e puati au
dave pae namata pua. ni north,
go e piragi au paki matele kerua
pae napua. edaku paki namata
pua waina e 1010 paki ist; go kuga
leo, noai maga eu sara dave
3 matele ni matua. Ragi waina
naatamoli wanogoe e dave paki
ist natali dotovvo e doko namele-
aruna, e dotowo ■ manu sikai ni
kubitj- go e mari au a pae noai
maga, noai maga waina ,eu sake

moro dotowo manu sikai, go e
mari au a pa© noai maga, noai
maga waina eu sake paki napa-
tuagu. Go e moro dotowo manu
sikai, go e moro mari au a pa©
noai maga, noai maga waina eu
5 sake paki nawaregu. Edaku ki
nia e dotowo manu sikai; go e
pei noai sara sikai waina a mari
sa surata duagoto asa: nalakena
noai maga. eu sake, noai maga eu
pei tea avaana asa, noai Sara
sikai waina e da pei tea tuagoto-
-6 ana mau. Go e noa ki nau, e
naga, Naatamoli natuna, ko
punusi tea waia, kita ? Go e
puati au, go e mari au a liliu
7 paki- nadigi ni noai sara. Go
ragi 'waina a liliu, kuga leo,
■nakau -laapa eu doko nadigi ni
noai sara, matele sikai go matele
8 kerua; go nae e noa ki nau, Noai
maga waina eu dave pano paki
matele ni ist, go euga wo siwo
paki malo palo: go euga wo paki
natasi pano; noai rnaga waina
euga wo paki natasi pano; go
noai maga euga wo pei tea mari-
-9 ana euga mami. Go ega wo doko,
naga sara tea tawanakiana mauri
waina © do parivari, sara tokora
waina noai - sara maga eu paki
asa umai euga wo mauri; go ega
wo pei nalaapaana lapa ni naika :
nalakena noai maga waia eu
rumai paki asa, go 1-uku ni natasi
ega wo pei tea mariana ega mami,
go sara naleo ega wo mauri sara
tokora waina noai sara e umai
10 paki asa. Go ega wo- doko naga
tea vua naika maga euga wo doko
pisari a; pae En-gedi pa pa paki
En-eglaim ega wo pei tokora
sikai waina euga wo doro kuti-
kuti maga; naika maga kakana


euga wo pae sara naworada, euga
takiusi naika ni natasi lapa, euga
11 wo laapa sa. Ma malo ni nalepa,
go malo ni natano inanainai euga
wo da pei tea mariana euga
mami ; euga wo pei tea vituaki-
-12 ana paki natasimena. Go sara
nakau tea kaniana euga wo pora
nadigi ni noai sara matele waia
go matele kerua, waina nauluna
ega wo da goruta, go nawana
kakana ega wo da dika; ega wo
daua ki nawana vaou sara
atelagi, nalakena noai kakana
maga eu dave nasuma tapu pano
go naiva nakau kakana ega wo
pei tea kaniana, go naulu kakana
ega wo pei tea ni namaripauriana.
DANIEL GO TANA RI DOLU.
1 Natau ketolu ni namarakiana
ki Yeboiakim kig ni Yuda Nebu-
kadrezzar kig ni Babilonia e umai
paki Yerusalem, po kelu goro e.
2 Go Nawota e pitua ki Yeboiakim
kig ni Yuda paki namelearuna,
go namagovai ni lasa, maga ni
nasuiba ki Supe; go e puati ra
paki navanua ni Shinar paki
nasuma ki supe aneana: go e
dape lasa maga wanogoe paki
nasuma ni natauakiana ni nalo
3 kasua maga ni supe aneana. Go
kig e pasa ki Ashpenuz napau
ni atavau aneana maga, naga ega
viragi umai paki ekopu Israel
natuna maga seara kakada, tea
ni nawora ni- kig go ni nawota
4 maga; natureai maga waina te
wotu e da doko ara, ma waina eu
pei tea lomatakiana, go tea
midoakiatae nalo ni sara namanu-
matuaana, po atae naataeana, po
pei tea midoakiatae naataeana,
go waina eu peani namariataeana
naga euga doko palas ki kig; go
naga euga vasapisei ki-da nami-
diriana go navasaana ki tea in
6 Kaldea. Go maleoputo ni' tea
maga wanogoe, tea ni Yuda
natuna maga, Daniel, Hanania,
7 Mishael, go Azaria eu dokd. Go
napau 'ni atavau maga e dua ra
nagisa maga: go e dua Daniel
nagisa ni Belteshazzar, go e dua
Hanania nagisa ni Shadrak; go
e dua Mishael nagisa ni Meshak;
go e dua Azaria nagisa ni Abed-
-17 neco. Go natureai pati wanogoe,
Supe e dua ra naataeana go
namidoakiataeana nalo ni sara
namidiriana go ni sara namanu-
raatuaana : go Daniel e midoaki-
atae nalo ni sara navunusiana go
18 ni sara napereaana. Go ra;
waina naaleatia maga waina kig
e noa e naga ega viragi ra paki
ekopu eu nopu, napau ni atavau
maga e piragi ra paki ekopu
19 narae ni Nebukadnezzar. Go kig
e pasa ki-da; go tea sikai e da
doko maleoputo ni tea laapa
kakada waina e dakiusi Daniel,
Hanania, Mishael, go Azaria;
nalakena wanogoe (eu pei tea
toroana) eu doko narae ni kig.
20 Go sara naleo ni namanumatua-
ana go ni namidoakiataeana,
waina kig e pisuusu paki da asa,
e pa sai ra eu paka rualima pia
liu tea midiri tapu maga go tea
kikita laapa waina eu doko
namarakiana mamau aneana.

ni airon, go namagovai ni

kiana’ ega wo casua,' go nama-
govai kakana ega wo manainai.

DANIEL DOKO PALUA NI
LAION.
1 E pei namasauana ki Darius
naga ega vusake satrap ponotia
sikai rualima takuna dua dapau
namarakiana, go waina euga toko
2 usuraki namarakiana ; go e doro
tea vea dolu dapau ra, Daniel ©
•pei sikai kakada; naga satrap
maga wanogoe euga arusi paki-
da, go naga kig ega ta sua
3 natapepuolikiana mau. Ragi
wanogoe Daniel wanogoe e liu tea
vea maga go satrap maga, nala-
kena naatana tatapau sikai e doko
asa; go kig e midoaki nia naga
ega tore e dapau namarakiana
4 mamau. Ragi wanogoe tea vea
maga go satrap maga eu laaga
naga eu pe vasai te nalakena dipa

eu mari sa pasai te nalakena kita
namariana waina ©da pia; nala-
kena nae e pei lomau, go te
namarisapoana kita te namariana
sa © da pei tea vasaiana asa mau.
5 Ragi wanogoe naatamoli maga
waina eu noa, wo da pasai
te nalakena dipa Daniel waia,
waina tu pe ta pasai a dipa e
nalo ni nawotaeana ki Supe ane-
-6 aha’. Ragi wanogoe tea vea maga
wanogoe go satrap maga eu saisai
pa punusi kig, po noa' ki nia


dapale waia, eu naga, Kig Darius,
7 pa mauri doko tnau doko. Tea
vea maga laapa ni namarakiana,
tea maramara oli maga go satrap
maga, tea vusumaki maga; go tea
maraki namagovai maga, eu
pusumaki dumada paki-da naga
euga tawanaki natawanakiana
sikai ki kig, po lawo soki nati-
pagoroana sikai naga te naata e
pe tatago kite natatagoana sikai
paki te supe sikai kita paki te
naatamoli sikai te naaleatia sikai
pa pa paki naaleatia rualima
dolu, ma ega tatagovi ko, kig O,
ega wo pei tea nadikiana paki
8 palua ni laion maga. Ragi waia,
kig O, pa lawo soki natipagoro-
ana wanogoe, go pa midiri soki
namidiriana wanogoe, nagd ega
ta pei tea mariana ega vano pota
mau, ega tapale nawotaeana ki
tea ni Media go tea ni Persia
waina e da pei tea risugiana mau.

e midiri soki namidiriana wano-
goe go natipagoroana wanogoe.

naga namidiriana wanogoe e pei
tea midiri sokiana sua, e paki
ekopu ni nasuma aneana (go
windo kakana maga ni emago
aneana eu masai doko 1010 paki
Yerusalem) ; go nae e diti patua
paka dolu, po dapasavasa, po
pasa dodumataki narae ni Supe
aneana, dakiusi waina e do mari
11 a sala vea. Go naatamoli maga
wanogoe eu saisai, go eu punusi
Daniel e do dapasavava po
datago nasaupiaana narae ni
J. 2 Supe aneana. Ragi wanogoe eu
rumai paki iualadigi, po pasa
narae ni kig nalo ni natipagoro-
ana ki kig; eu naga, Ko da midiri
soki natipagoroana sikai, naga
sara naatamoli waina euga wo
datagovi te supe sikai kita te
naatamoli sikai te naaleatia pa pa
naaleatia rualima dolu, ma euga
tatagovi ko, kig tea
nadikiana paki pald£ ni Taion
maga, kita ? Kig e pasa dark po
noa, Naleo wanogoe e pei lomau,
pae nawotaeana ki tea nr Media
go ki tea ni Persia waina eu da
13 pei tea risugiana mau. Go eu
pasa dara po noa narae ni -kig,
eu naga, Daniel waina, waina e
pei tea ni tea viragiluapavakoto-
ana maga ni Yuda, e da dodo
parati ki-go mau, - kig O, go ki
natipagoroana mau waina ko
midiri soki a, ma e do datago
natatagoana aneana paka dolu
14 naaleatia sikai. Ragi wanogoe
kig, ragi waina e dogo navasaana
wanogoe, e dogo sa ki parua ki
nia, go napopona e doko Daniel
naga ega vua lua e: go e posi-
wosi pa pa elo a.musu naga ega
15 vua lua e. Ragi wanogoe naata-
moli maga wanogoe eu saisai pa
punusi kig, po noa ki kig, pa
atae kig 0, naga e pei nawotae-
ana sikai ki tea ni Media go ki tea
ni Persia, naga te natipagoroana
kita te natawanakiana waina kig
e dawanaki nia ega ta pei tea
16 risugiana mau. Ragi wanogoe
kig e pitipaki, go eu piragi
Daniel pano, po nadi ki nia paki
palua ni laion maga. Kig e pasa
ki Daniel, po noa, Supe anigo
waina ko do maneana suasua sara
ragi, nae ega wo pua lua ko.
17 Go vatu sikai e pei tea viragi-
ana umai, po pei tea toropusiana
namata ni palua; go kig e pulu
soki a ki tea vuliisoki aneana, go
tea vulusoki ki nawota maga ane-
ana; naga te navatuna ega ta
pei tea mariana ega vano pota
nalo ni Daniel mau.
18 Go kig e paki palas ane-
ana pano, po doko napogi-
ana wanogoe,. e da ganikani
mau, go e da piragi tea
tovi naleo ni nalegaana maga


seara umai paki ekopu punusi a
mau : go namaturuana e sava dua
19 ki nia pano. Go kig e duleana
ragi ni namakotokotoana ni mali-
pogi, po pano inaraverave paki
20 palua ni laion maga. Go ragi
waina e umai paki maladigi ki
palua punusi Daniel, e pioso ki
nadaleo ni nasusueana sikai: kig
e pasa po noa ki Daniel, e naga,
Daniel O, tea suasua ki Supe
mauri, Supe anigo, waina ko do
maneana suasua sara ragi, e mari
atae pua lua ko pa dua ki laion
21 maga, kita ? Go Daniel e pasa
paki kig, e noa, Kig O, pa mauri
22 doko mau doko. Supe aginau e
dipaki lua agelo aneana umai, po
mari goro nagole ni laion maga,
go eu da mari sa ki nau mau:
nalakena e punusi namarinalosa-
ana e da one au, go nigo ma ko
punusi a, kig O, naga a da mari
23 te namariana sa. Ragi wanogoe
kig e laelaea lapalapa nalakena
nae, po pitipaki naga euga viragi
Daniel ega sake melu dua ki
palua. Go Daniel e pei tea
viragiana sake melu dua ki
palua, go te uamarisakiana e da
doko asa, nalakena e pavatu Supe
aneana.
24 Go tig e pitipaki, go eu piragi
naataiholi maga wanogoe waina
eu pasa dipa Daniel, go eu nadi
ki da paki palua ni laion maga,
nara, natuda maga, go nagoroi
adeara maga, go eu ko da paki
tano sua ragi waina laion maga
eu mari matua ki-da, po cati-
poroworosi sara navatuda.
25 Ragi wanogoe kig Darius e
midiri paki narei laapa, paki
nalauna laapa go paki tea ni
sara navasaana, waina eu doko
maramana mamau; e naga nata-
mateana lapalapa paki mu.
26 Navasakisogiana sikai e pei tea
vituakiana melu au, naga naata-
moli maga ni namarakiana
mamau aginau euga durururu po
mataku pa dua ki narae ni Supe
ki Daniel: nalakena nae e pei
Supe mauri, go e pei tea lake-
toko pa pa ega tu du po mau
du, go namarakiana aneana e pei
tea waina ega wo da pei tea
maripuolikiana mau, go naveina-
wotaana aneana ega wo doko pa
27 pa paki ragi edaku mau ; e do
pua lua po mauti eu mauri doko,
go e do mari navaivaiana maga
nakoroatelagi go maramana;
waina e pua lua Daniel pa dua
ki nakasuaana ni laion maga.
28 Go Daniel wanogoe e disu pia
namaramaraana ki Darius, go
namaramaraana ki Sirns tea ni
Persia.
151.
NADALEO NI SUPE.
1 Israel O, pa liliu paki Yehova,
Supe anigo; nalakena ko dowo
ki namarinalotageleana anigo.
2 Kuga tape navasaana ega vilake
mu, go kuga liliu paki Yehova:
kuga noa ki nia, pa tape lua
sara namarinalotageleana, go pa
viragi tea waina e pia: go auga
wo dua ko dakiusi eu pe vei
bulok maga uavituaana ni nawili
3 ni nagolegami. Asshur ega wo
da mauti garni; auga wo da pagi
hors maga, go auga wo da moro
noa ki nawosiana ni namelearu-
gami, Nimu ku pei supe aginami
maga: nalakena natuda malepu
eu pasai nadodumiana ako.
4 Kinau aga mari pauri navara-
saililiuana adeara, aga rodumi ra
ki napopowiaana: nalakena
namaetoana aginau e pei tea
5 roaana nielu dua ki nia. Aga
wo magi Israel dakiusi nasau (ni
malipogi): nae ega wo puma
dakiusi lili, po sai ki nakoana
6 dakiusi Lebanon. Ega wo pitosi
arana, go ualomatakeana aneana


ega wo dakiusi nakau oliva, go
dainona ega wo dakiusi Lebanon.
7 Tea maga waina eu doko meluna
euga wo liliu: euga wo moro
mauri dakiusi korn, go euga wo
puma dakiusi vain: dainona ega
wo dakiusi wain ni Lebanon.
8 Efraim! Aga wo moro casa ki
■ idole maga ? Kinau a pasa dara,
go aga wo midoaki nia: kinau
a dakiusi siprus malakesa sikai;
natawiana anigo ega wo pae au
umai.
1 Euga rogo nalalagarova-ana
waina a dape dakati a ualakena
nimu, nasuma ni Israel O!
2 Naatara ni Israel e dowo; ega ta
moro duleana: e pei tea silakiana
paki natano aneana, te naata e
da doko waina ega sike a.
3 Nalakena Nawota Supe e noa
dapale nea: Taun waina e dave
pano manu sikai, ega wo peani
ponotia sikai waina eu ko doko,
go tea waina ponotia sikai eu
dave asa, ega wo peani rualima
sikai waina eu ko doko, agi
4 nasuma ni Israel. Nalakena Ye-
hova e noa dapale nea paki
nasuma ni Israel, Kuga laaga
5 au, go kuga wo mauri: ma kuga
ta laaga Beth-el, go kuga ta sili
Cilcal, go kuga ta duagoto paki
Beer-sheba, nalakena lomau Cil-
cal ega wo paki nadapepavakoto-
kiana pano, go Beth-el ega wo
6 paki naveikalanaana pano. Kuga
laaga Yehova, go kuga wo
mauri; e pe wo pa parati ki
nasuma ni Yosef dakiusi nakapu
po gani sua e, go te naata e da
doko Beth-el waina ega va punue
7a. Nimu waina ku pua doa
nasavapotaeana paki nakau
kokona, po nadi ki namarinalo-
-8 leanaana paki natano; kuga
laaga tea waina e dawanaki
Pleiade (inasoe larua) go Orion,
go waina e doa melu ni namate-
ana po mari a e pei malipogi, go
e mari aleati e maligo ki pogi;
nae waina e soso luku ni natasi,
po da ki nia paki namata ni
navanua; nagisana e pei Yehova;
9 c piragi namarisakiana rnarave-
rave e pa parati ki tea kasua, go
namarisakiana e pa parati ki
10 malo vavatuana. Eu pilosi tea
waina e doko namata po pasa
doa, go eu mamarago ki naata
11 waina e pasa leana. Tea waina
nalakena ku pasi tea tika paki
natano, po dape nasautoga ni wit
ki-ana: ku davagi nasuma maga
ni vatu taeana, ma kuga wo da
doko ara; ku lawo roara lo-
ihatakiana ni vain, ma kuga wo
12 da munu wain kakana. Nala-
kena a atae nalaapaana ni nama-
rinalotageleana animu maga, go
nalapalapaana ni namarinalosa-
ana animu maga; ku pa soki tea
leana, ku dape ruku, go ku capasi
lua tea tika namata pa dua ki
13 naleanaana. Nalakena wanogoe,
naata waina e midodoa ega
vonuta ragi dapale nea, nalakena
14 e pei ragi sa. Kuga laaga tea
wia, go kuga ta laaga tea sa,
naga kuga maurigo Yehova
Supe ni nalaapaana maga ega wo
sikoti mu, dakiusi waina ku do
15 noa e. Kuga karai sa ki tea sa,
kuga rodumi tea wia, kuga mari
. soki navasapotaeana doko na-
mata: e pe wo doko naga Ye-
hova, Supe ni nalaapaana, e pe
wo sau pia ki namagovae ni
Yoseph.
1 Awi ki tea ni Zion waina eu
do midoaki tea sa ega wo da
umai, go tea ni tava ni Samaria
waina eu pavatu kiada, tea
warua maga ni tea vea ni nalauna
maga, waina nasuma ni Israel eu
2 rumai punusi ra! Kuga tuagoto
paki Kalne, po punusi, go kuga
vae asa paki Hamath tea warua:
go kuga si wo paki Cath ki Filis


tine' maga: nara eu pia liu
nalauna maga wanogoe, kita ?
kokoi adeara e lapalapa liu kokoi
3 animu, kita? Nimu waina ku
doro naaleatia sa paki uvia, go
ku doro malo tokoana ni namari-
4 casuaana. paki maladigi; waina
ku maturu nawewele ni aivori,
po dumada porugi ra toko parau
adeara, go eu gani shiip vusavusa
pa dua ki navata, go kau natuna
maga pa dua ki nasuina ni tea

nalegaana palo sikoti (nadaleo)
ni tea dovi nalegaana; waina eu
dumada midoaki naloriki waina
eu mari nalegaana asa; dakiusi
6 waina David e maria; waina eu
do munu wain pae siloa maga,
go waina eu dumada puvurai ki-
da ki naroro ni damo wia liu
maga; napopoda eu da madaga
nalakena nadogokiteesaana ki
7 Yosef. Nalakena tea wanogoe
ragi waia euga wo pei tea sikoti
tea vea maga waina eu pei tea
tapepavakotokiana, go nama-
paraeana ki tea maga waina eu
dumada porugi ra ega wo makoto.
8 Nawota Supe e pasa sokisoki
durhana paki nia, Yehova Supe
ni nalaapaana maga, e noa, a
inamarago ki nawialuaana ki
Yakop, go a pilosi nasuma warua
maga aneana: nalakena tea
wanogoe aga wo pitua ki taun
pilake tea laapa waina eu doko
asa.

YONA
1 Navasaana ki Yehova e umai

nalakena nasigisigileoana adeara
3 e sake umai naraegu. Ma Yona
e duleana naga ega sava paki
Tarshish pa dua ki narae ni Ye-
hova; go e siwo pano paki Yoppa,
go e pa sai ship sikai waina e
naga ega vaki Tarshish: e paco-
tovi pasas kakana, po siwo asa,
naga ega sikoti ra pane paki
Tarshish pa dua ki narae ni
Yehova.

lapa sikai paki natasi, go e pei
nalagi atu lapa sikai e doko
natasi, go e dakiusi ship ega
5 mavora. Go selor maga eu
mataku, go sai'a naata kakada e
pioso paki supe aneana; go eu
nadi Id nalo musagiana paki
natasi, naga ega madeara mari a
ega malaulau. Ma Yona e siwo
sua paki napalau ni ship; go e
6 one, po maturu casua. Go
kapten e umai punusi a, po noa
ki nia, Ko midoaki nasava, tea
maturu ? pa tuleana, pa vioso
paki Supe anigo, e pe wo doko
naga Supe e pe midoaki gida
7 naga tuga ta mate. Go sara
naata kakada e noa paki tana,
pa umai, go tuga nadi ki gole,
naga tuga atae sei e pei nalakena
tea sa waia e pa parati ki-gida.
Go eu nadi ki gole, go gole e
8 dowo Yona. Ragi wanogoe eu
noa ki nia, pa noa ki garni, au
pavarani ko, sei e pei nalakena
tea sa waia e pa parati ki-gida;

ko pae esava ? seve tea e pei
navanua anigo? go ko pei tea ni
9 seve narei ? Go e noa ki-da, A
pei Hebru sikai; go a matau ki

waina e mari natasi go navanua

noa sua ki-da asa.

1 Go navasaana ki Yehova e
umai ki Yona sala kerua, e naga,
2 pa tuleana, po paki Ninive pano,

4 uaaleatia dolu. Go Yona e

noasaiana usuraki Ninive pae

e p 6 wo mara doa po midoaki

Go e da mari a.
1 Ma Yona e da midoaki mataki
tea wanogoe mau, go' e maeto.
2 Go e datago paki Yehova, po
noa, a pavarani ki, Yehova O,
tea waia e da pei navasaana agi


nan, ragi waina a ko doko nava-
nua aginau ? Nalakena tea
wanogoe a mari niaraverave sava.
paid Tarsliish: nalakena a atae
naga nigo ko pei Supe sau pia,

purasa maeto, go ni nasaupiaana
lapalapa, go waina ko midoaki

O, a pavarani ko, pa tape lua
namauriana aginau ki agu; nala-
kena e pe wia ki nan naga aga
mata, liu naga a pe mauri.

mari a e pia waina ko maeto,
5 kita ? Go Yona e dave taun, go

ega vunusi tea waina e pe toko

Yona, naga ega vei melu dapau
napauna, naga ega mari mataki
napopona. Go Yona e laelaea

naga Supe e mari nalagi vivi-

Yona paki napauna, waina e do

waina a maeto pa pa paki

Ko dodumi gurd, waina ko da
posiwosi raki nia mau, go ko da
mari a e ulna, waina e sake

maim rualima latesa waina eu da

doko a-sa ?
153.
NAVEANOASAIANA KI
ZEKARIA NALO NI KRISTO.
12 Yehova ni tana lapa maga e
noa dapale nea, e naga, pa leo,
naatahioli waina nagisana e pei
Ara; go nae ega wo sirisiria pae
tokora aneana, go nae ega wo
13 davagi tempel ki Yehova; iore,
nae ega wo davagi tempel ki Ye-
hova, go nae ega wo pilake nasa-
masamaana, go ega wo tasake po
maramara doko toko aneana; go
nae ega wo pei tea viri sikai doko
toko tapu aneana: go navusu-
makiana ni natamateana dumada
paki-da ega wo doko asa.
9 pa laelaea lapalapa, Zion
natuna nagoroi, O; pa vioso,
natuna nagoroi O ni Yerusalem:
pa leo, kig anigo e do umai
punusi ko : nae e leana, go e dape
namautiana ; e matemate, e pagi
as sikai, e pei kolt natu ni as
10 sikai. Go nae ega wo pasa nata-
mateana paki nalauna pota
maga; go namarakiaua aneana
ega wo doko pae natasi paki
natasi, go ega vae Noai sara paki
namata pagona mau maga ni
maramana.
1 Naaleatia wanogoe namata
noai sikai ega wo masai doko agi
nasuma ki David, go agi naata
toko maga ni Yerusalem, tea ni
namarinalosaana naloaana.
7 pa leo, lova O, dipa tea lo
parati ki shiip aginau, go dipa
naatamoli waina e pei tea mala-
digi ki nau, Yehova ni taua lapa
maga e noa e : atugi tea lo parati
ki shiip, go shiip euga wo pei
tea taperaverakiana ; go aga wo
doa naihelearugu paki tea kdd
maga.


9 Go Yehova ega wo pei kig
dapau maramana mamau: naale-
atia wanogoe Yehova ega wo pei
tea sikaimaau go nagisana sikai-
maau.
154.
MALAKIA E PEA-NOASAI
KRISTO.
1 Kuga leo, a dipaki tea tautau-
ana aginau, go nae ega wo mari
niataki napua pea ki naraegu;
go Nawota, waina ku laaga asa,
ega wo umai niaraverave paki
tempel aneana, iore, tea tautau-
ana ni navasasokiana, waina ku
cita niataki nia: kuga leo, nae
e do umai, Yehova ni taua lapa
2 maga e noa e. Ma sei e mari
■ atae doko naaleatia ni naumai-
ana aneana? nalakena nae e
dakiusi nakapu ki tea mari
madu; go e dakiusi sop ki tea
3 vivitae ni luva: go nae ega wo
doko natano dakiusi tea mari
ihadu go tea mari dautau ki
silver; go ega wo mari Levi
natuna maga euga tautau, go ega
wo pakatarumi ra dakiusi cold
go silver, go euga wo pitua ki
naviriana maga ni namarinalosa-
ana paki Yehova.
1 Nalakena, kuga leo, naaleatia
ega wo umai, e do soro dakiusi
vuvu ni nakapu ; go tea popo
paki lagi laapa, go tea laapa
waina eu posi nasigisigileoana,
euga wo pei napologana: go
naaleatia waina e do umai ega
wo daparaki-da, Yehova ni taua
lapa maga e noa e, naga ega da
madeara doro nakoa kita ara.
2 Ma nimu waina ku matan ki
nagisagu, elo ni namarinaloleana-
ana ega wo manimu sake pilake
namaripauriana doko navaruna
maga; go kuga wo midiraki
dakiusi kau natuna manugunugu
3 maga. Go kuga wo pasi tea
sigisigileo maga paki natano;
nalakena euga wo pei natano avu
mclu ni namele natuamu naleatia
waina kinau aga mari a, Yehova
ni taua lapa maga e noa e.
4 Kuga midoaki natipakiana ki
Moses, tea suasua aginau waina
a magi Israel mamau pitipaki
paki nia Horeb, iore, navasa-
dawanakiana maga go navasa-
-5 potaeana maga. Kuga leo aga
wo manimu dipaki Eliya proveta
pea ki naumaiana ni naaleatia
warua go tea ni namatakuana ki
6 Yehova; go nae ega wo doa
napopo ni tamada paki natuda,
go napopo ni natuda maga paki
tamada maga; naga aga ta atugi
maramana ki navasasakiana.
